Job Description:
A Roto Artist, short for Rotoscope Artist, is a professional involved in the visual effects (VFX) industry, specifically in the process of rotoscoping
Rotoscoping is a technique used to create realistic visual effects by manually tracing and isolating specific elements or objects in a video or film footage frame by frame
The primary role of a Roto Artist is to meticulously extract or separate the foreground elements from the background, often known as creating a matte or mask, to enable further manipulation or compositing in post-production
Here is a comprehensive job description for a Roto Artist
Rotoscoping: Utilize industry-standard software, such as Adobe After Effects, Nuke, or Silhouette, to accurately trace and extract specific elements or objects from video footage frame by frame
This involves creating detailed mattes or masks for individual frames to isolate the desired elements or remove unwanted elements
Tracking: Implement tracking techniques to match the movement and perspective of the rotoscoped elements with the camera movement of the original footage
This ensures seamless integration and realistic motion of the composited elements within the scene
Quality Control: Perform quality checks on the rotoscoping work to ensure accuracy, precision, and consistency throughout the project
This includes reviewing and refining the mattes or masks to achieve the desired visual effect while maintaining the integrity of the original footage
Communication and Collaboration: Collaborate closely with other VFX artists, such as compositors, matte painters, and CG artists, to ensure smooth integration of the rotoscoped elements into the final composite
Effective communication skills are crucial to understand and implement the artistic vision and direction provided by supervisors and clients
Time Management: Adhere to project deadlines and milestones, managing time efficiently to deliver high-quality rotoscoping work within the given timeframe
Prioritize tasks effectively and communicate any potential issues or delays to the production team
REQUIRED SKILLS
Bachelor/Master's degree in Animation/Multimedia/VFX
2+ years of experience as Roto Artist
Experience with Digital Matte Paint and Compositing will be an added advantage
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Keywords: Post production, Visual Effects, Time management, Animation, VFX, Manager Quality Control, Adobe After Effects

Job Description:
Job Overview:
As a Motion Graphics Designer, you will be responsible for creating visually stunning and compelling animations, motion graphics, and video content that align with our brand identity and messaging. You will collaborate with our creative team and other departments to deliver engaging video content for various platforms, including social media, web, advertising, and presentations.

Key Responsibilities:
1. Design and Animate: Create captivating motion graphics and animations that communicate our brand messages effectively.
2. Storyboarding: Develop visual narratives and storyboards that outline the creative vision for video projects.
3. Video Editing: Edit and enhance video footage to ensure a seamless and visually appealing final product.
4. Visual Branding: Ensure that all motion graphics adhere to our brand guidelines and maintain a consistent visual identity.
5. Collaboration: Work closely with the creative team, content creators, and project managers to meet project goals and deadlines.
6. Software Proficiency: Utilize industry-standard software such as Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, Illustrator, and Photoshop for motion graphic creation and editing.
7. Animation Techniques: Implement a variety of animation techniques, including 2D, 3D, typography, and kinetic typography.
8. Sound Design: Incorporate sound design, music, and voiceovers to enhance video content when needed.
9. Feedback and Revisions: Be open to feedback and make revisions as required to meet project goals and client expectations.
10. Research and Trends: Stay updated on industry trends and emerging technologies to bring fresh and innovative ideas to the team.
11. End-to-End Project Ownership: The role extends beyond motion graphics design. We are looking for a self-starter who takes ownership of projects from conception to completion. You will actively contribute creative ideas and solutions throughout the project's lifecycle. Your adaptability and willingness to learn quickly are highly valued, as you may be required to take on new challenges and expand your skill set to meet the evolving needs of our projects. Your proactive approach in delivering results and your ability to think beyond the immediate task will be instrumental in your success in this role.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Animation, or a related field (or equivalent work experience).
- Proven experience as a Motion Graphics Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing diverse projects.
- Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, particularly After Effects, Premiere Pro, Illustrator, and Photoshop.
- Knowledge of video editing and post-production techniques.
- Strong creative and conceptual thinking, with an eye for design aesthetics.
- Strong communication and collaboration skills.
- Ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple projects simultaneously.
- Understanding of video formats, compression, and delivery methods.
- Knowledge of 3D animation and modeling is a plus.
- Familiarity with sound design and video editing software.

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits package.
- Opportunities for professional development and training.
- A creative and collaborative work environment.
- The chance to work on exciting and diverse projects.

Job Description:
A Roto Artist, short for Rotoscope Artist, is a professional involved in the visual effects (VFX) industry, specifically in the process of rotoscoping
Rotoscoping is a technique used to create realistic visual effects by manually tracing and isolating specific elements or objects in a video or film footage frame by frame
The primary role of a Roto Artist is to meticulously extract or separate the foreground elements from the background, often known as creating a matte or mask, to enable further manipulation or compositing in post-production
Here is a comprehensive job description for a Roto Artist:Rotoscoping: Utilize industry-standard software, such as Adobe After Effects, Nuke, or Silhouette, to accurately trace and extract specific elements or objects from video footage frame by frame
This involves creating detailed mattes or masks for individual frames to isolate the desired elements or remove unwanted elements
Tracking: Implement tracking techniques to match the movement and perspective of the rotoscoped elements with the camera movement of the original footage
This ensures seamless integration and realistic motion of the composited elements within the scene
Quality Control: Perform quality checks on the rotoscoping work to ensure accuracy, precision, and consistency throughout the project
This includes reviewing and refining the mattes or masks to achieve the desired visual effect while maintaining the integrity of the original footage
Communication and Collaboration: Collaborate closely with other VFX artists, such as compositors, matte painters, and CG artists, to ensure smooth integration of the rotoscoped elements into the final composite
Effective communication skills are crucial to understand and implement the artistic vision and direction provided by supervisors and clients
Time Management: Adhere to project deadlines and milestones, managing time efficiently to deliver high-quality rotoscoping work within the given timeframe
Prioritize tasks effectively and communicate any potential issues or delays to the production team
Keywords: Post production, Supervisor, Visual Effects, Usage, Time management, VFX, Manager Quality Control, Adobe After Effects

Job Summary: We are seeking a creative and highly skilled Video Editor & Video Animator to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating visually engaging and compelling video content that aligns with our company's objectives. This role involves editing raw footage and creating animations to produce high-quality videos for various purposes, including marketing, advertising, training, and entertainment.

Job Responsibilities:
Video Editing: Edit and assemble raw video footage to produce high-quality video content.
Cut, trim, and arrange clips to ensure a seamless and visually appealing final product.
Enhance video quality through color correction, audio adjustments, and other post-production techniques.

Video Animation:
Create animations and motion graphics to add dynamic elements to video content.
Design and produce engaging visual effects to enhance storytelling and captivate the audience.
Collaborate with the creative team to develop animated concepts that align with project goals.
Content Creation:
Work closely with the content creators, Graphic team, or clients to understand project requirements.
Contribute to script development and storyboarding to ensure the video's narrative and visual elements align.

Software Proficiency:
Utilize video editing and animation software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Final Cut Pro) to achieve project goals.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and software updates to maintain proficiency.

Quality Control:
Review final videos for errors, discrepancies, or improvements and make necessary adjustments.
Ensure videos meet the company's standards for quality, style, and branding.

Deadline Management:
Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet project deadlines.
Communicate progress and potential roadblocks to the team or clients to ensure timely delivery.

Asset Management:
Organize and maintain video and animation assets, including footage, graphics, and sound files.

Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in film, animation, multimedia, Diploma or a related field is preferred.
Proven experience in video editing and animation, with a strong portfolio showcasing previous work.
Proficiency in video editing and animation software, as well as a good understanding of motion graphics and visual effects.
Strong creative and artistic skills, with the ability to think visually and tell compelling stories through video.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills to work effectively within a team or with clients.
Attention to detail, time management, and the ability to work under pressure to meet deadlines.
Knowledge of industry trends and the ability to adapt to evolving video and animation techniques.

Location: Work From Home

How to Apply: Interested candidates are encouraged to submit their resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining their qualifications and relevant experience to mujeem@enthusionz.in
WhatsApp: 09379714519
Keywords: Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Motion Graphics, VFX, Animation, Adobe After Effects, 3D Animation, Final Cut Pro

Job Description:
As a Video Editor at our company, you will be responsible for capturing, editing, and producing photos and videos for internal and external purposes.
Responsibilities:
Manipulate and edit film pieces in a way that is invisible to the audience Take a brief to grasp production team s needs and specifications Review shooting script and raw material to create a shot decision list based on scenes value and contribution to continuity
Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film Input music, dialogues, graphics and effects
Create rough and final cuts
Colour grade flat footage on occasion
Consult with client on occasion from production to post-production process Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry s best practices to maximise efficiency
Be able to work in a flexible schedule, which may include evenings or weekends as needed
Work with Head of Content and designers to recognise the graphics assets needed for a particular edit
Requirements & Skills:
Proven work experience as a Video Editor
Professional understanding of Adobe Premiere Pro
Intermediate knowledge of Adobe After Effects
Basic knowledge of Adobe Photoshop
Strong timeline organisation skills
Familiarity with special effects, 3D and compositing
Strong storytelling skills, ranging from 60 second videos to 30 minute docu-style video pieces
Basic understanding of sports and editing sports footage Strong knowledge of video production and post-production workflows, including colour grading, sound design and visual effects
Should be flexible working on shifts
Keywords: Graphics, Post production, Visual Effects, 3D, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editor, Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, Raw material

Job Description:
1. Edit and assemble raw footage into a polished, cohesive video product, ensuring logical
sequencing and smooth transitions.
2. Collaborate with the production team and clients to understand project requirements and
objectives.
3. Trim, organize, and condense video content to create engaging and visually appealing
videos.
4. Enhance videos with effects, graphics, music, and sound design to elevate the overall quality
and impact.
5. Manipulate and adjust color, lighting, and audio to achieve the desired mood and tone.
6. Ensure video projects are delivered on time, meeting all deadlines and requirements.
7. Continuously explore and implement new editing techniques, trends, and tools to improve
the quality and efficiency of video production.
8. Stay up to date with industry standards, best practices, and emerging technologies in video
editing and post-production.
9. Maintain organized and efficient file management systems for all project assets.
10. Collaborate with other team members, such as videographers, animators, and graphic
designers, to create cohesive multimedia projects.
Qualifications:
1. Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role.
2. Proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or Avid Media
Composer.
3. Strong understanding of video editing principles, including storytelling, pacing, and visual
composition.
4. Familiarity with visual effects, motion graphics, and color grading.
5. Proficient in audio editing and mixing.

6. Excellent attention to detail and ability to work independently or collaboratively in a fast-
paced environment.
7. Strong organizational and time management skills to handle multiple projects
simultaneously.
8. Creative mindset with the ability to think critically and problem-solve.
9. Strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with team members and clients.
10. Portfolio of previous video editing work showcasing technical skills and creativity.
Keywords: Graphics, Post production, Visual Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Time management, Management systems, Video Editor, Video editing, Audio editing

Job Description:
Collaborate with the marketing team to conceptualize and create visually appealing graphics,videos, animations, and other multimedia content that align with brand guidelines and campaign objectives.
Develop engaging and dynamic video content for various platforms, including social media, websites, email campaigns, and presentations.
Design and produce marketing materials such as banners, posters, info graphics, and other promotional assets to support different marketing initiatives.
Bring concepts to life by combining typography, imagery, motion, and audio to create visually captivating videos.
Edit and enhance existing video content, including color correction, audio adjustment, and visual effects to ensure high-quality final products.
Stay current with design trends, industry best practices, and emerging technologies to continuously elevate the quality and impact of our design and video work.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously, ensuring deadlines are met and deliverables are of the highest quality.

Any Bachelors degree or preferred in Graphic Design, Multimedia Design, Visual Communication, or a related field.
Understands South Indian languages - preferably Kannada
Some experience in graphic design and video editing. Share portfolio of previous work
Proficient in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Canva) and video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro, imovies, or equivalent).
Strong portfolio showcasing a range of graphic design and video projects, highlighting creativity, technical skills, and an understanding of visual storytelling.
Solid understanding of design principles, typography, color theory, and layout composition
Familiarity with motion graphics and animation techniques is a plus.
Excellent communication skills and the ability to effectively present and explain design concepts to team members.
Detail-oriented mindset with a commitment to delivering high-quality work on time.
Strong multitasking and time management skills to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
A proactive and collaborative attitude, willing to give and receive constructive feedback.
Knowledge of marketing and branding principles, and how design contributes to overall business goals.

Competitive salary and benefits package
Opportunity to work with a growing and innovative company
Chance to make a real impact on the growth of the Lokal App business

Female Candidates Only

Online Tutoring position - US/UK/Canada/Aus/NZ School Levels - Science, Maths & English

We are a well-reputed & established online tutoring company (established in 2012. with 300+ tutors) with clients primarily in the U.S., Canada, the U.K., Australia, and New Zealand. Due to our continued growth, we want to strengthen our Academics team.

Job Description:
About CheQ

CheQ is a fintech startup, the newest & noisiest on the block! We aim to help customers understand, manage and leverage credit in ways that augment their lifestyle choices. And while doing that, make the experience fun and rewarding.
Founded by Aditya Soni, CheQ has raised $10 Mn in seed funding led by marquee investors like Venture Highway, 3one4 Capital, Multiply Ventures, Marshot Ventures and Veda VC. We are also backed by angel investors like Naveen Kukreja (CEO, PaisaBazar), Shailaz Nag (Founder & CEO, Dotpe) among others.


What youll be doing

We are seeking a talented and experienced Visual Designer to join our team and contribute to our product & marketing efforts. As a Visual Designer, you will be responsible for creating end-to-end designs for various marketing channels, including blogs, social media, newsletters and in-app banners.
Additionally, you will showcase your skills in motion graphic design through captivating 2D animations and video editing.
Create visually appealing designs for marketing collaterals, including but not limited to blogs, social media posts, newsletters, and in-app banners.
Develop engaging 2D animations and motion graphics to enhance our marketing materials and convey key messages effectively.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, content creators, and product managers, to understand project requirements and deliver visually compelling designs.
Take ownership of design projects from concept to completion, ensuring consistency and high-quality output.
Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in design, motion graphics, and video editing techniques.
Maintain a strong understanding of our brand guidelines and ensure all designs align with our visual identity.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously, prioritize tasks, and meet deadlines consistently.
Continuously seek opportunities to optimize and improve our design processes and workflows.

What youll need

Like us, youll be deeply committed to delivering impactful outcomes for customers.
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Design, Fine Arts, or a related field.
Minimum 3-6 years of experience in visual design at a consumer brand or mainline creative agency.
Solid understanding of design principles, typography, layouts with strong command of tools like Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator.
Proficiency in motion graphic design and video editing, with a strong command of tools such as Adobe After Effects, Premiere Pro, or similar software.
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles and the ability to translate business requirements into visually appealing designs.
Strong attention to detail, ability to prioritize tasks, and deliver high-quality work within deadlines.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively present and articulate design concepts.

Job Description:
Alongside the Compositing Supervisor and VFX Supervisor, evaluate creative and technical approach for assigned shots
Perform all tasks associated with the Compositing process, including 2D tracking, matte extraction, layering of elements, and colour grading on moderately difficult to very difficult shots
Maintain the overall look, colour balance, and quality for assigned shots and sequences to create uniformity in all finished work
What We re Looking For
Ability to work collaboratively with artists from other disciplines
Strong knowledge of Nuke
Strong aesthetic skills in judging photo-realism and color
Self-sufficient and able to work gracefully under pressure to meet deadlines
Strong sense of composition, color and design
Preferred Skills / Competencies:
The ideal candidate has strong fine arts foundation skills, such as photography and photographic lighting
Familiarity with using Unix systems preferred
Ability to write Nuke gizmos and/or plugins is a plus
Python and/or C++ experience a plus
At least 3 years relevant professional VFX experience and at least a college level diploma in computer graphics, fine arts, design, or photography, or related field; OR, at least 5 years relevant professional VFX experience

Job Description:
Job Description




Job Summary / Overview
Working in a collaborative and engaging virtual environment, employee will be the eyes and ears for the team handing customer inquiries. Employee will be required to communicate with customers and your managers via telephone, e-mail, video, social media and chat.

Key Responsibilities and Accountabilities (may perform other duties as requested not specifically addressed in this document)
Transmit Teleperformance and our client values in every interaction
Handle and carefully respond to all customer inquiries before, during and after their buying cycle by building excellent rapport & confidence, identifying their needs, and taking strategic action in a timely manner
Provide excellent customer support through active listening on every interaction while adjusting support approach to accommodate all levels of customer experience
Work with confidential customer information and treat it sensitively
Use software to source and input customer data accurately as related to the inquiry
Completes all training and development activities in timely manner.
Understanding of escalation handling procedure.

Key Performance Indicators (subject to change)

First contact resolution
Customer Satisfaction (CSAT), including measures of competence and friendliness
Post contact NPS
Service Levels (speed to answer) across all contact channels (voice, email, chat, social media)
Sales Conversion (Contact to Sale ratio)
Shift Adherence

Profile Brief:

Employee is reliable and autonomous with a large amount of discipline.
Candidate should have a strong social network around them and be experienced with building sustainable relationships with people they never physically meet by using telephone, e-mail, video, and social media channels. This is to combat loneliness and isolation that may arise working from home.
Employee is confident, accurate, ambitious, flexible, and well organized as there are less hand-holding opportunities as compared to brick and mortar.
Employee should not be afraid to contact their supervisor for help and be open to feedback and coaching.


Main Job Requirements

Education and Specific Training
Graduate in any stream.
Successful completion of internal training program and testing
24*7, Rotational shifts.

Work Experience
Experience with dealing professionally with people you only speak to via telephone, e-mail, chat and social media
TSE / CSE experience is a plus
Preferable experience with valid documents.
Fresher

Working Environment
Dedicated internet connection during working hours
Dedicated, closed and quiet workspace.
Dedicated systems

Required Skills
Technical Skills
Computer Skills:
Computer Navigating Skills
Ability to use Internet applications
Intermediate knowledge of MS Office
Language Skills:
English
Tools knowledge:
Customer or function specific programs, at home tooling Social media savvy

Competencies obligatory

Communication skills (Verbal and Written)
Reliability
Self-Motivation
Social skills
Self-awareness
Integrity
Teamwork
Commitment
Stress Tolerant
Achievement Oriented
Problem solving ability

Competencies Preferred
Planning & Organization
Customer oriented
Time Management
Analytical Ability
Interpersonal Skills
Creativity
Initiative

Office Address:
Asmita House, Asmita Township, Naya Nagar, Mira Road East, Thane - 401107.
Landmark - 5 to 10 mins walking distance from Mira Road East Railway Station.

Shift Timings 10.00 am to 6.00 pm.
Working Days - Monday to Saturday. (2 Saturdays Off)
Company Website - www.asmitagroup.com
Latest Project - https://asmitaindiarealty.com/projects/asmita-grand-maison/

About Us:

Asmita Group is a diversified conglomerate that has been operating since 1985. The group's core business is real estate, where it has established a reputation for quality, innovation and customer satisfaction. The group also owns and manages an organic farm company that produces and sells fresh, healthy and natural products through retail and e-commerce platforms. In addition, the group runs a club that offers a range of facilities and services for fitness, wellness and recreation, such as a gymnasium, swimming pool, steam & sauna, table tennis, badminton, dietician and nutritionist. The group is also committed to social responsibility and philanthropy through its two trusts: The Educational Trust, which operates three schools and a college that provides quality education to students from diverse backgrounds; and the Umrao Institute of Medical Science & Research, which provides health care to the underprivileged sections of society. Asmita Group is driven by a vision of excellence, integrity and sustainability in all its endeavors.

Job Description:
Footage Selection: Video editors review and select the best footage from raw video material or filmed content, considering factors like quality, composition, and overall suitability for the project
Video Editing: They use video editing software (such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve) to arrange and edit video clips, combining them into a coherent and visually appealing story
This includes cutting, trimming, and arranging clips to create a seamless narrative
Audio Editing: Video editors often work on the audio as well, which involves adjusting and enhancing sound quality, adding music and sound effects, and synchronizing audio with video
Transitions and Effects: They use transitions, text overlays, and visual effects to enhance the overall video quality and storytelling
This can include adding titles, captions, and special effects
Color Correction: Video editors adjust the color balance, saturation, and brightness to create a consistent and visually appealing look throughout the video
Storyboarding: In some cases, editors may work with directors or producers to create a storyboard or shot list to guide the editing process
Keywords: Visual Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Storyboarding, Video Editor, Video editing, Audio editing

Job Description:
Paint Artists work with Compositors to help them integrate all elements of an image, including CG and live action, to create film visual effects shots. They remove unwanted items from plates, such as; wires, rigs, crew, mocap people and tracking markers. They clean up the backgrounds of live action-footage ready for the effects to be layered onto it by the compositor.
Prep artists will be responsible for;
Deliver mid or senior level paint tasks (dependent on level) within bid days or below bid days for seniors
Experience in Marker, wire and complex rig removal, artifact clean-up and bg. Plate restoration.
Ability to composite procedures such as grading, wrapping, morphing and distortion.
Degrain plates
Create HDRI stitches from on set HDRI photography
Submit shots for review and follow through with notes and feedback if required
Meet schedules and show deadlines, maintaining the highest standards
Have ongoing communication with Production and Lead regarding schedules and deadlines
Work within the Framestore pipeline and adhere to naming conventions
Work efficiently as part of a team, or independently, to complete assigned shots
Continue to become familiar with new tools, software, data and other related technology
Advise more junior members of the team on correct methodologies in paint tasks
Host training sessions and create training material
QC work for in house artists and outside vendor
Essential Skills
An Arts or Science degree in a moving picture or art related subject
Prior experience in a Junior Paint and Roto role
Having expertise in working with software Nuke, Photoshop.
Desirable Skills
Using 3D cameras for projections
Planar and point tracking software experience
Prior knowledge of a Linux based operating system
A general understanding of the VFX production and comp workflows
A knowledge of photography, lenses and practical lighting
A working knowledge of Roto is an added advantage
Able to use expressions within Nuke to help aid paint work
Have an understanding of the 3D environment within
Nuke, being able to use geo data to project clean plates and understanding how to use UV projections
3D Mava interface experience
Have an understanding of Python scripting and how to use this to create and edit gizmos
Keywords: Photography, Visual Effects, 3D, Usage, Linux, VFX, Vendor, Photoshop, Python, Scripting

Job Description:
About Info Edge

InfoEdge's mission is to create world-class platforms that transform lives by continuously innovating. Our products and services are built keeping our customers in mind. We always delight our customers by delivering superior value through enhanced offerings on the internet and other platforms. Through our continuous investment across various businesses, especially in cutting-edge technology, machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI), we have built a robust system that constantly increases our predictive powers on customer behavior, and optimizes and improves our systems. Our various teams tirelessly work together to solve problems, innovate, and create something to empower our customers.
At Info Edge, people are our core competitive advantage and we will continue doing all that is needed to attract and retain the best available talent.

About BU: JobHai

We are a strategic portfolio within IEIL with a clear focus on creating large-scale opportunities for blue collared jobseekers to get aligned to potential employers across geographies with a mission of creating a robust digital ecosystem with simplification of hiring needs.
With our pilot launch in 2019, we have created our presence across markets, with a 100+ strong team and 7.5 million+ traffic, 5 million+ jobseeker database, 160k+ active listings across 14 cities, 100k+ recruiter base, 10 million+ monthly actions on platform and overall, 10x growth over the last 12 months.

Role Objective:

With the business poised for the next phase of growth, we are at a juncture where developing the brands visual language would be crucial in driving differentiation in the users mind. To that end, this role will be the ultimate custodian for owning & driving the design charter for the brand. Our aim is to create a brand that speaks to the pain & passion points of our users (in a visually compelling manner) that resonates with them. So if you are somebody that thrives on tapping into human emotions via semiotics & likes to add a dash of creativity to every piece of communication no matter how big or small then this role is the right fit for you.

Job Description

You will be the owner of the entire design charter as part of the brand team & will be responsible for crafting & executing the brand design systems (in line with the newly developed brand positioning) across all touchpoints
You will be responsible for design & delivery of all marketing collaterals for our digital/growth campaigns across channels
You will work closely with copy/product/marketing automation teams & be responsible for all owned media channels including email, push notifications, SMS, WhatsApp communication, etc.
You will liaise with copy & social to ideate & develop content for digital & social campaigns
You will be interfacing with senior stakeholders from across functions (product, growth, digital/performance marketing, etc.) & be responsible for managing all design workflows & meeting timelines

Desired Experience:

Skilled Graphic designer with a strong handle on Adobe Photoshop & Illustrator (should have experience designing creatives for diverse digital platforms like GDN/Meta universe, etc. static, carousel, across specs). Strong handle on Motion Graphics is an absolute must (we would want to create high quality videos for our digital/social campaigns internally so this will be an important skillset to have)

As the VFX Artist, you will work closely with the production teams in India, the US and the UK to create exceptional real-time effects for a diverse range of titles and genres
This is an exciting opportunity to contribute to the creation of amazing in-game effects, including weaponry, vehicle destruction, magic spells, large-scale rigid body simulations, and environmental effects, for some of the best loved game titles world-wide


Experience and a strong portfolio showcasing proficiency in creating real-time visual effects for video games.
In-depth knowledge and understanding of real-time physics, fluid systems, and tools (such as Houdini) used in VFX creation.
Proven expertise in using industry-standard tools, including but not limited to UE4, Niagara, Unity, Maya, and Photoshop, to create in-game VFX content.
Fluent in English with excellent written and verbal communication skills, enabling effective collaboration with team members and clients.

Proactive and self-driven with a focus on achieving exceptional results and ensuring client satisfaction.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with other artists within the studio across various projects.
Ensure compliance to clients requirements as well as internal best practices across all projects.
Work with the Lead VFX Artist to develop and document technical specifications and pipeline.
We offer the opportunity to work on some of the best-known game titles in the world.
We offer competitive salaries and annual performance-based bonuses.
Experienced artists may get the opportunity to work remotely.
We offer generous paid time off. You get 26 Annual leaves and additional paid time off at the year-end (from 25th December to 1st January).
We cover Term Insurance and Personal accidental insurance for you.
Benefit from our free Employee Assistance Program (EAP) for mental and emotional wellbeing.
You can also avail our Special Education Assistance Scheme to further develop your career.
And a lot more

Job Description:
Compositing artist is responsible for the visual quality of shots for the animated film. The artist is responsible for the integration of 2D & 3D scenes while respecting the technical rules and artistic vision established on the project. He performs numerical compositing tasks at all steps of the production pipeline.
Desired Skills : Software Knowledge : Nuke, Photoshop, Silhouette and any tracking software is an added advantage.
  Responsibilities :
Constructing the final image by combining layers of previously-created material, including rendered computer animation, FX, graphics, and static background plates
Ensure that the levels combine together seamlessly, and creating mattes where necessary. Enhance the lighting, match blacks and other colour levels, add grain where required, add motion blur where required, and create convincing shadows.
Work closely with the FX and Lighting Artists to develop compositing strategies and achieve an aesthetically balanced overall look.
Understanding of various composition techniques.
Knowledge of the cinematography principles including depth of field, density, use of filters
Ability to light characters and environments, interior and exterior, different times of day, etc.
Good technical knowledge of how 3D lighting works in order to understand the 'multi passes' that the Lighters create.
Integrate 3D elements in compliance with a high standard of visual effects feature film production; Ensure that the shots meet the requirements of the rendering processes; Work with relevant departments in relation to compositing;
Seamless integration of live action, Blue/Green screen, CGI sources.
Work closely with the supervisors in house and with different locations.
Communicate well with the team and leads to overcome any delay in tighter deadline.
Work collaboratively with other members of the Compositing team and other VFX department.
A strong creative eye and problem-solving attitude.
Understanding of linear work flow would be a plus.
Experience preferably in Hollywood VFX.
Must have a willingness to learn new tools, a proven ability to be detail-oriented, and problem solving skills.
Ability to work under tight deadlines and to work efficiently within a production environment.
Completes the allotted project within the given man days as per client requirements and maintaining quality standards set by the company
Good team player and help team members to learn and grow Self-motivated, initiator and results-oriented
Should be able to take ownership of the project and complete the same before deadline
Able to understand the clear instruction from client and provide the desired output
Does Self-review/quality checks for accuracy
Strong communication and time management skills
Good problem solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively with other artists
Accurately assess the length of time necessary to generate high quality work
Flexibility to work in swing Morning / Evening shifts.
Able to finish the tasks without any handholding/supervision
Accountable for meeting productivity and quota targets on time
Keywords: Graphics, Visual Effects, 3D, Quality standards, CGI, Time management, Animation, Workflow, VFX, Photoshop

Job Description:
The Role The Repair Service Attendant role is responsible for providing upbeat customer service as a contact center representative to assist current voice and high-speed internet customers. Troubleshoots service-related issues including hardware and software configurations. All contacts are inbound and are technical support only, NO SALES REQUIREMENTS. The Main Responsibilities
Works with customers to identify service-related needs and offers the most appropriate solutions while providing world-class customer service.
Diagnoses and resolves basic network and modem functionality issues, including landline troubleshooting.
Walks customers through common phone hardware and software configurations to maximize service functionality.
Provides solutions and resolution resources for customer repair problems.
Interfaces with customers over the phone providing status updates and ensuring service has been restored.
Schedules a technician dispatch for on-site service calls when necessary.
Escalates appropriate technical issues to upper-level technical support when needed. What We Look For in a Candidate
Ability to multitask in a Microsoft Windows environment and utilize multiple programs for troubleshooting.
Requires customer contact and the ability to effectively communicate over the phone with both internal and external customers
Must be a consistently flexible, independent, self-motivated problem solver who enjoys working in a fast-paced environment
Demonstrated strong interpersonal communication skills when working with both internal and external customers.
Ability to work flexible hours including evenings, weekends, holidays, and overtime is required
Experience with common internet software is preferred.
Preferred but not required: 6 months experience in technical support, help desk, and/or contact centers. Work From Home System Requirements:
Must subscribe to High-Speed Internet Service with minimum speed of 10 mbps (No VoIP service is allowed).
PC must be physically connected to modem/router using Ethernet cable (ie computer cannot be run on a wireless connection)
You are responsible for establishing a dedicated workplace in your home or work location.
The workplace must have adequate work surface and be free of background noise and distractions.
During assigned work hours you must make arrangements for childcare and ensure that pets or others cannot be heard by customers. Education Competencies
Innovation Agility Meets Definition: Approaches work with a continuous improvement mindset; takes a creative approach to problems or opportunities; can work effectively under ambiguous circumstances; applies alternative solutions; leverages multiple sources for new ideas; keeps the needs of the business and customer in mind.
Accountability Ownership Meets Definition: Makes clear connections between individual accountability and success of the company; avoids a victim mindset and transference of responsibility; follows through to resolve issues even when they are beyond immediate job responsibilities; takes ownership for downstream results. Demonstrates a high level of commitment and perseveres in the face of challenges or setbacks.
Communication Self Awareness Meets Definition: Approaches all communications with honesty and openness; ensures that information is timely and relevant; provides clear, concise oral and written communications; actively asks for feedback, input and checks for mutual understanding; adapts communications to the audience; gains agreement to support ideas; leverages ideas and information from others; maintains respect for fellow employees and understands how personal behaviors impact others.
Customer First Meets Definition: Has a customer centric mindset; places all work and accountabilities in context with the needs of external or internal customers; meets or exceeds expectations and service requirements; acts promptly to resolve issues; looks for opportunities to add value for the customer; maintains relationships based on honesty, trust, and respect.
Urgency Courage Meets Definition: Distinguishes items of key importance and applies the appropriate action timely; responds with an insistent character; possesses the conviction and fortitude to face difficult situations through rational, balanced means.
Collaboration Alignment Meets Definition: Maintains productive relationships within and outside the team; understands key stakeholder; shares important or relevant information; can find common ground, facilitates cooperation and teamwork; proactively addresses issues and problems to achieve common objectives.
Celebration Have Fun Meets Definition: Demonstrates gratitude and thankfulness through interactions with co-workers and customers; recognizes and responds quickly to exceptional work with proclamations of praise appropriate to the individual; actively finds enjoyment in their role and encourages those around them.
Effective Decisions Meets Definition: Applies expertise, experience and judgment to reach good decisions; accurately determines the types and levels of information required; takes appropriate risks, manages conflicting priorities; moves quickly from problem to resolution and has a "fail fast" mentality where needed; maintains momentum and recovers quickly from setbacks; understands how individual and team responsibilities and performance impact the overall success of the Company, process, system; empowers, enable and trusts others to make decisions.

Job Description:
tudentsdoubtsSubject Matter Expert (SME) - Content Fixer
Department: Chegg Portal (STA Project)
Location: Work from Home
Summary:
We are seeking highly motivated and experienced Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) to join our team as Content Fixers. In this role, you will be responsible for reviewing and revising existing solutions on the Chegg portal to ensure that they are accurate, comprehensive, and aligned with the latest guidelines. You will also be responsible for fixing the content of existing solutions to improve their clarity, precision, and accuracy. All Solutions must be typed on the portal with proper tool usage.
Responsibilities:
Review and revise existing solutions on the Chegg portal to ensure that they are accurate, comprehensive, and aligned with the latest guidelines.
Fix the content of existing solutions to improve their clarity, precision, and accuracy.
Identify and correct any errors in existing solutions.
Improve the overall quality of existing solutions by making them more clear, concise, and easy to understand.
Collaborate with other SMEs to ensure consistency in the quality of solutions.
Qualifications and Available Subjects:
Chemistry - M sc in Chemistry
Statistics and Probability - M sc in Math/Statistics
Accounting - M com
Physics - M sc/B Tech
Economics - B com (Economics)
Finance - M Com. F A
Math - M sc (Maths)
Biology - M sc (Biology)
Computer Science - B Tech (Computer Science)
Operations Management - MBA
Mechanical Engineering - B Tech (Mechanical )
Electrical Engineering -B Tech (Electrical)
Civil Engineering - B Tech (Civil)
Earth Sciences - M sc
Earning Potential : 10k to 60k by solving students doubts on portal.

Specific Tasks:
Carefully read and understand the existing solution.
Identify any errors or inaccuracies in the solution.
Make the necessary corrections to the solution, using appropriate terminology and notation.
Improve the overall quality of the solution by making it more clear, concise, and easy to understand.
Proofread the solution carefully to ensure that it is free of errors.
Guidelines:
Always make sure that your solutions are accurate, comprehensive, and aligned with the latest guidelines.
Write your solutions in a clear and concise manner, using appropriate terminology and notation.
Proofread your solutions carefully to ensure that they are free of errors.
Be respectful of students and other SMEs.
If you wish to apply provide details on the below link
https://forms.gle/ZPtBxgs3AiJLVYes5

or you can also mail your resume along with your subject at hr@endeavoracademy.co.in

Job Description:
A wedding video editor plays a crucial role in turning raw footage from a wedding into a beautifully crafted and memorable video that captures the essence of the day. Here are the typical jobs and responsibilities of a wedding video editor:

1. **Footage Review:** The editor starts by reviewing all the raw footage captured by the videographers. This includes ceremony footage, reception shots, interviews, and any other relevant content.

2. **Storytelling:** Crafting a compelling narrative is one of the most important aspects of wedding video editing. The editor must select the best clips and arrange them in a way that tells a coherent and emotional story of the wedding day. This may involve cutting, rearranging, and adding transitions.

3. **Color Correction and Grading:** Adjusting the colors and tones to create a consistent and pleasing visual style is essential. This ensures that all clips in the video match and look their best.

4. **Audio Editing:** The wedding video editor must ensure that the audio is clear and balanced. This includes adjusting the levels of speeches, vows, and ambient sounds. Background music is often added to enhance the emotional impact of the video.

5. **Adding Special Effects:** Depending on the couple's preferences, the editor may add special effects such as slow-motion, text overlays, filters, or other creative elements to enhance the video.

6. **Syncing and Timing:** Making sure that the video is well-timed with the music and that the audio syncs correctly with the visuals is crucial for a professional result.

7. **Transitions:** Adding smooth transitions between clips helps maintain the flow of the video and makes it visually appealing.

8. **Title and Credit Sequences:** Creating and adding titles, credits, and other text elements that provide context and information about the wedding.

9. **Client Interaction:** Communicating with the couple to understand their preferences and vision for the video. Revisions and feedback from the couple may also be part of the job.

10. **File Exporting and Compression:** Preparing the final video in various formats suitable for online sharing, DVD, or other distribution methods. This may involve compressing the video to reduce file size while maintaining quality.

11. **Backup and Storage:** Ensuring that all project files and assets are properly backed up and stored securely to prevent data loss.

12. **Stay Updated:** Keeping up with the latest video editing software and techniques to continually improve the quality of work.

13. **Deadlines and Time Management:** Meeting deadlines and managing time efficiently, especially during the busy wedding season, is crucial to deliver the final product on time.

14. **Portfolio Development:** Continuously building a portfolio of wedding videos to showcase your skills and attract new clients.

Overall, a wedding video editor is responsible for taking the raw footage captured at a wedding and transforming it into a visually stunning and emotionally engaging video that the couple will cherish for years to come. Effective communication with the clients and a strong creative eye are essential skills for this role.
Keywords: Davinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, FCP, Adobe Premiere Pro

Job Title: Team Lease For Providing Service To client
Job Description:
Job Description :-
ECA will be allocated at local dealer counter.
The ECA is to approach the consumers who walk-in to the store and inquire about their painting requirements.
The consumers who already have a contractor for executing the painting job need to be pitched only the Color Consultancy/Color Visualization on the Ezycolour Kiosk and taken through it.
TheÃÂÃÂ consumers who dont have a contractor for executing the painting job need to be pitched the Paint Right Service apart (from Color Consultancy/Color Visualization on the Ezycolour Kiosk).
As part of the Paint Right Service, the ECA needs to visit the consumer at his house at the appointment date & time.
On the first visit, the ECA is to do Site Evaluation and Site Measurement using the Paint Right Evaluation Kit, fill the Site Evaluation & Site Measurement formats and hand them over to the consumer.
Post the same, the ECA is to provide Product Consultancy based on the Site Evaluation. Up selling (Special Effects, Luxury Emulsions) and Cross Selling (Smart Care, Wood finishes) would be the priority in Product Consultancy.
After product consultancy, the ECA shows the profiles of Ezycolour Trained Contractors along with their contact numbers OR pitches the Complete Painting Service as per the Dealer Capability.
In case the consumer wants to go for Complete Painting Service, the ECA can show the Rate Card, the Terms & Conditions of the Service and ask the consumer to speak with the dealer for taking it forward.
The ECA will visit the consumer hous for Site Supervision atleast once or more (as agreed upon with the dealer) while the site is in Work-In-Progress stage. There might be a final Site Closure visit after the completion of work (as agreed upon with the dealer).
The ECA will have to fill the DailyÃÂÃÂ Work Report for every day of the week and share the same with the Team Leader every Saturday without fail.

Note : Candidate must have Two wheeler (Preferbly male)
Keywords: Customer Relationships, Retail Sales, Customer Handling

Job Description:
We are looking for a Registered Nurse to join our nursing staff in providing excellent health care to our patients
Your duty of caring for the patients coming into our facility include tasks like creating and maintaining accurate patient records, administering medication and monitoring for side effects, recording vital signs, and reporting symptoms and changes in patient conditions
A Bachelors degree in nursing and a state license are essential requirements for consideration
You will also need to be trained in BLS/CPR and be ACLS-certified
A professional, friendly attitude and effective communication skills are the keys to becoming successful in this role
Responsibilities
Maintaining accurate, complete healthcare records and reports.
Administering medications to patients and monitoring them for side effects and reactions.
Prescribing assistive medical devices and related treatments.
Recording patient vital signs and medical information.
Ordering medical diagnostic and clinical tests.
Monitoring, reporting, and recording symptoms or changes in patient conditions.
Administering non-intravenous medications.
Assessing, implementing, planning, or evaluating patient nursing care plans by working with healthcare team members.
Modifying patient health treatment plans as indicated by patient conditions and responses.
Requirements
Bachelor degree or master degree in nursing.
Pass the National Council Licensure Examination or NCLEX-RN.
Current state licensure as a registered nurse and BLS certification required.
American Heart Association BLS/CPR
ACLS certification
Ability to effectively communicate with patients, families, physicians and hospital staff.
Basic computer skills.
Professional, friendly attitude.
Experience in home health care.
Experience in an emergency room or intensive care.
Keywords: Administration, SIDE, Medical devices, Nursing, Nursing Staff, Acls, Registered Nurse, Bls, Healthcare, Monitoring

Job Title: Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd | Video KYC Officer (V-KYC) | Noida & Thane-W
Job Description:
Urgent hiring for Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. For the Post of Video KYC Officer (V-KYC) for Noida & Thane-(West) Locations.

=> This is permanent job on roles of the Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. with fixed salary + high incentives.
=> Be part of fastest growing digital sales channel in financial services industry.
=> This will be permanently working from office only (Not a Work From Home).

=========================================================================

Job Designation: Video KYC Officer (V-KYC)
Role Category: Customer Services (Inbound- Video Call & Voice Process)
Job Grade: Assistant Manager M-1 / Deputy Manager M-2
Job Locations: Thane -West (Wagle Estate) And Noida (Sec-16 & Sec-125) Location.
Payroll: This is Permanent Bank Payroll job of the Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.


Eligibility/Experience Criteria:
# Candidate must be carrying at least 1.0 year to 5.0 year experience in Customer Service (Inbound) & KYC along with sales into Banking & BFSI sectors.
# Other than Banking or BFSI like any Customer Service Inbound & Outbound with Sales, Branch Sales or relevant to our this Job Deception also can apply.
Note: Freshers with good communication skills also can apply.


Job Description & Responsibility:
Handle inbound Video calls of the customers to complete the full KYC.
Verify the details submitted by the customer while opening the account and Documents submitted are matching.
Ensure KYC is completed by the right party only.
Should maintain a good relationship with the customer throughout the KYC process.
Cross-sell other banking products.
Give complete and correct information on all the products pitched to the customer.
Take call backs in case the customer is busy and ensure the follow up is done on time.
Responsible for quality communication and customer servicing within laid down productivity and service benchmarks.
Meet targets on conversion and Cross selling as defined from time to time.
Ensure customer delight and consistent service experience, including timely resolution of customer queries/issues.
Adherence to Information Security norms & quality process norms.
To be aware of and comply with any updates about the process.
Act on the feedback given by Team Leader/Team Coach or Quality or on the coaching provided to the team as guidelines for improving performance.

Shifts Timings & Offs:
=> Working Day-: 6 Days working in a week.
=> Weekly offs: One fixed off on Sunday and 2nd & 4th Saturday rotational off.
=> Shift Timing for Male-: Any of 9 Hours Shifts can be offered from 7.00 AM to 11.00 PM. (No Night Shift).
=> Shift Timing for Female-: Any of 9 Hours Shifts can be offered from 7.00 AM to 8.00 PM. (No Night Shift).
=> This is "Contact Centre Branch" (Non-Branch Banking) based Job,
=> This is completely In-house / Office-based profile, No customer Visit, No face to face interaction, No field work.

Candidate Desire Profile:
Must be Good Communication skills Verbal & Written.
Good listening skills and strong communication abilities.
Flexible to get scattered 6 Week Offs in a month with 9 hours with late evening shifts.
Freshers with communication skills also can apply.
Age should be 20-30 years only (Male & Female Both can apply).
Be Confident and willing to learn with a flair for knowledge. Possess an upbeat, positive can-do attitude & works with integrity.
Team Player, collaborative Self-motivated person including the ability to act as a role model within the organization.
Should be able to establish rapport quickly with peers, managers & customers.
Team player Candidate must be able to work effectively with all levels of the organization.

Salary Package:
=> Annual CTC of Rs.2.75 to 3.50 Lac per annum plus performance based high Incentives.
(Monthly In-hand/Net Salary would be 19000/- to 24000/- per month.
=> Plus PF, Gratuity and Mediclaim & Insurance cover (as per policy).

=> Post Graduate with any stream.

Job Description:
A wedding video editor plays a crucial role in preserving and enhancing the memories of a couple's special day. Their responsibilities encompass various tasks, including video editing, communication, and creative input. Here is a list of roles and responsibilities for a wedding video editor:

1. **Video Editing:**
- Edit raw footage to create a cohesive and engaging wedding video.
- Organize and trim clips to create a seamless narrative.
- Color correction and grading to enhance the overall look and mood of the video.
- Audio editing, including syncing and balancing audio tracks (speeches, music, ambient sound).
- Add transitions, overlays, and effects to enhance the visual appeal.
- Create highlight reels, full-length videos, and other requested formats.

2. **Storyboarding and Storytelling:**
- Understand the couple's vision and preferences for the video.
- Create a storyline that captures the essence of the wedding day.
- Select the most compelling moments and shots to tell a coherent and emotional story.

3. **Communication:**
- Collaborate closely with the couple or wedding planner to understand their expectations and preferences.
- Communicate progress and share drafts to gather feedback and make necessary revisions.
- Be responsive to emails, calls, and meetings throughout the editing process.

4. **Technical Proficiency:**
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve).
- Familiarity with color grading software and audio editing tools.
- Stay updated on the latest editing techniques and trends.

5. **File Management:**
- Organize and maintain a structured file system to manage video assets efficiently.
- Ensure backups and data security to prevent loss of footage.

6. **Creativity and Artistic Input:**
- Apply creative techniques to make the video visually appealing.
- Use music, sound design, and special effects to evoke emotions.
- Suggest ideas and concepts to enhance the video's quality.

7. **Efficiency and Time Management:**
- Work efficiently to meet deadlines and deliver the final video on time.
- Prioritize tasks and manage workload effectively, especially during peak wedding season.

8. **Client Interaction:**
- Maintain a professional and courteous demeanor when interacting with clients.
- Address client concerns and revisions promptly and professionally.

9. **Quality Control:**
- Review the final video for errors, glitches, or inconsistencies.
- Ensure that the video meets the agreed-upon standards of quality.

10. **Legal and Ethical Considerations:**
- Respect copyright laws when using music, images, or other third-party content.
- Obtain necessary permissions and licenses for any copyrighted material used.

11. **Continuous Improvement:**
- Stay up-to-date with industry trends and technology advancements.
- Seek feedback from clients and peers to improve editing skills.
Keywords: Davinci Resolve, Final Cut Pro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Photoshop

Job Description:
Role & responsibilities
ECA will be allocated at local dealer counter.
The ECA is to approach the consumers who walk-in to the store and inquire about their painting requirements.
The consumers who already have a contractor for executing the painting job need to be pitched only the Color Consultancy/Color Visualization/ Royale Play Design/ Stencil/ Signature/ Ext. Wall Art on the Ezycolour Kiosk / Booklet and taken through it.
TheÃÂÃÂ consumers who dont have a contractor for executing the painting job need to be pitched the Paint Right Service apart (from Color Consultancy/Color Visualization on the Ezycolour Kiosk).
As part of the Paint Right Service, the ECA needs to visit the consumer at his house at the appointment date & time.
On the first visit, the ECA is to do Site Evaluation and Site Measurement using the Paint Right Evaluation Kit, fill the Site Evaluation & Site Measurement formats and hand them over to the consumer.
Post the same, the ECA is to provide Product Consultancy based on the Site Evaluation. Up selling (Special Effects, Luxury Emulsions) and Cross Selling (Smart Care, Wood finishes) would be the priority in Product Consultancy.
After product consultancy, the ECA shows the profiles of Ezycolour Trained Contractors along with their contact numbers OR pitches the Complete Painting Service as per the Dealer Capability.
In case the consumer wants to go for Complete Painting Service, the ECA can show the Rate Card, the Terms & Conditions of the Service and ask the consumer to speak with the dealer for taking it forward.
ECA has to do the recce, track and maintain potential upcoming painting sites and consumer details nearby his local shop
The ECA will visit the consumer house for Site Supervision at least once or more (as agreed upon with the dealer) while the site is in Work-In-Progress stage. There might be a final Site Closure visit after the completion of work (as agreed upon with the dealer).
The ECA will have to fill the DailyÃÂÃÂ Work Report for every day of the week and share the same with the Team Leader every Saturday without fail.

Engineers will not be considered

Job Title: Subject Matter Expert - Quality Check, Chemical Engineering
Job Description:
Authoring Solutions for advanced questions from Chemical Engineering textbooks.
Online answering of Chemical Engineering questions posted by students globally on Chegg Website.
Quality review of solutions submitted by external answerers.
Content feedback fixing
Practice Content creation & review
Video Content Reviews
Work on the domain specific Ad-hoc Projects.
Requirements:
B. Tech Chemical Engineering /M. Tech Chemical Engineering.
Candidates (0- 3 Years Experience) with experience in Learning service industry/teaching industry or freshers with strong subject skills can apply.
Knowledge of softwares like ChemDraw, Serif Draw will be added advantage.
Excellent in communication skills, both oral and written.
Willing to work in rotational shifts.
CHEMICAL ENGINEERING SYLLABUS
Fluid mechanics:
Mass, energy and momentum balance, fluid friction in pipes, flow in chemical engineering equipment, differential equations of fluid mechanics, solution of viscous-flow problems, Laplace equations, irrotational and porous media flows, boundary layer and other nearly unidirectional flows, turbulent flow, bubble motion, two-phase flow, and fluidization. Non-Newtonian fluids, microfluidics and electrokinetic flow effects, Introduction to computational fluid dynamics and flow lab, COMSOL Multiphysics for solving fluid mechanics problems.
Separation process principles (chemical and biochemical operations):
Separations by phase addition or creation (absorption, distillation, extraction, distillation), separations by barriers and solid agents (membrane separations, adsorption, ion-exchange, chromatography, electrophoresis), separation that involve a solid phase (leaching, crystallization, evaporation, drying of solids), mechanical separation of phases.
Analysis, synthesis, and Design of Chemical processes:
Conceptualization and analysis of chemical processes, engineering economic analysis of chemical processes, synthesis and optimization of chemical processes, analysis of process performance, impact of chemical engineering design on society. Chemical process safety, CAPCOST and CHEMCAD.
Chemical reaction engineering:
Mole balance, conversion and reactor sizing, rate laws and stoichiometry, isothermal reactor design, collection and analysis of rate data, multiple reactions, reaction mechanisms, pathways, bioreactions and bioreactors. Steady state non-isothermal reactor design, Unsteady state non-isothermal reactor design, catalysis and catalytic reactors, external diffusion effects on heterogeneous reactions, diffusion and reaction, distributions of residence times for chemical reactors, models for nonideal reactors.
Chemical engineering thermodynamics:
Mass and energy conservation, entropy balance, liquefaction, power cycles and explosions, thermodynamic properties of real substances, equilibrium, and stability in one-component systems. Thermodynamics of multicomponent mixtures, Gibbs energy and fugacity of a component in mixture, vapor-liquid equilibrium in mixtures, other types of phase equilibria in fluid mixtures, mixture phase equilibria involving solids, chemical equilibrium, balance equations for chemical reactors and electrochemistry.
Chemical process calculations:
Orsat analysis of flue gas, percentage of conversion, percentage of excess air, material balance, Bypass, Recycling to the reactor, Crystallization, Energy balance, balances on non-reactive process and reactive process, heat of reaction, Drying, Flame temperature and excess air, Heat released from a reaction, Conversion in an exothermic reaction, maintaining Isothermal operation of the reactor.
Heat Transfer:
Conduction, convection, radiation, boiling and condensation, heat exchangers, Evaporation, Fouriers law of heat conduction, Conduction through a flat slab or wall, composite slabs, hollow cylinders, hollow spheres, multilayer cylinders, Critical thickness of insulation, conduction through materials in parallel, Lumped heat analysis, Dimensional analysis in heat transfer, Forced convection heat transfer inside pipes, Heat transfer outside various geometries in forced convection, natural convection heat transfer, Fouling factors, View factors in radiation for various geometries.
Mechanical Operations:
Size analysis, Size reduction, Size separation, filtration, agitation, Surface-volume mean diameter of particles, work index, Energy consumption in Crushing, Specific rate of grinding, speed of ball mill, the diameter of roll crusher, Classification based in terminal settling velocity, speed of agitator, washing time.
Process Dynamics and Control:
Laplace transforms, Linear open loop systems, Response of first-order systems, Response of first-order systems in series, Higher order systems- second order and transportation lag, Control systems, controllers and final control elements, closed-loop transfer functions, Transient response of simple control systems, stability, root locus, Frequency response, control valves
Keywords: Thermodynamics, Fluid mechanics, Fluid dynamics, Energy conservation, Control valves, Conceptualization, Process safety, Engineering Design, Heat exchangers, Chromatography

Job Description:
Job Description

Roles & Responsibilities

We are seeking a talented Multimedia Graphic Designer to join our Marketing team at DailyUse Matrix Technologies . As a Multimedia designer, you will be designing and producing high-end visuals, static and dynamic content and promotional materials that are required by the business. To ensure success, this candidate should have a background in digital design, content capturing, time management skills, and the ability to collaborate on projects to ensure deadlines are met. The candidate should be ready to adapt to a fast paced environment.
Multimedia Designer is responsible for executing the creative conceptualization, design and execution of all artwork and graphic content for various campaigns and collaterals utilized across multiple platforms. The designer will work hand in hand with the Marketing team to conceptualize and design marketing materials and assets used throughout ATL and BTL channels.
Create user-centered designs for both print and digital platforms that include in-store collaterals such as flyers, tent cards, signages, roll-up banners, etc. as well as web layouts and banners, presentations, newsletters, social media creatives, in mall branding, OOH branding, compelling logos, and video animations.
Collaborate mainly with the marketing team but also with multiple teams within the organization for creative tasks.
Be fast paced with resizing and editing existing designs and collaterals and have strong time management skills and the ability to prioritize tasks to meet project deadlines.
Have an innovative and creative mindset with the ability to think outside the box and use market research to execute campaign assets.
Have an in-depth understanding of typography, color theory, composition, and layouts with a keen eye for detail.
Edit images and create dynamic content for further usage on digital channels.
Ensure projects and campaigns are completed with high quality and in the timely manner.
Prioritize and manage multiple projects within design specifications.
Conceptualize and create captivating designs for digital and print media, including product packaging, websites, social media, advertisements, brochures, and more.
Collaborate with the marketing and sales team to understand project requirements and objectives.
Produce visual content that aligns with the brand guidelines and style.
Continuously research design trends and industry best practices to stay current and innovative.
Contribute to the development of design strategies that enhance brand recognition and customer engagement.

Requirements:
Proven experience as a Graphic Designer or in a similar role.
A strong portfolio showcasing a variety of design projects.
Proficiency in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign), Animation, Adobe After Effects, Figma etc.
Strong knowledge of typography, color theory, and layout design.
Understanding of digital marketing, social media, and website design trends.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
Time management and organizational abilities to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects.
Bachelor's degree in graphic design or a related field is a plus.

Perks and Benefits
1. Future Onsite Opportunity to UAE and UK

Job Description:
We donÃÂÃÂt have just designers, copywriters, product designers, illustrators, and 3D artists, we have ÃÂÃÂthinkersÃÂÃÂ.
Your job will not be to get from point A to point B, it would be about how interesting you can make that journey.
Work with a group of fun individuals who work hard, and play harder.
What you will do :
Design and create high-quality, real-time visual effects that add dynamism, realism, and excitement to the game. A
As environments, characters, and gameplay elements.
Design diverse in-game particle systems (explosions, fire, smoke, water, magic spells and more) adhering to technical and artistic specifications.
Collaborate with game artists and animators to seamlessly integrate visual effects with character movements, attacks, and interactions to achieve a cohesive and polished look.
Optimize visual effects for performance while maintaining visual fidelity across multiple gaming platforms. Stay abreast of industry trends, tools, and emerging technologies to enhance visual effects techniques and push the
boundaries of real-time rendering.
What you will bring :
Thou shall bring cookies every day, and apart from that, hereÃÂÃÂs what we need:
Proven experience as an FX Artist in the gaming industry, with a portfolio showcasing impressive real-time visual effects work in AAA games.Thou shall bring cookies every day, and apart from that, hereÃÂÃÂs what we need
Proficiency in industry-standard visual effects software and tools, such as Unity, Unreal Engine and Houdini.
A keen eye for detail and a creative mindset to design visually stunning effects that enhance gameplay and evoke emotions in our players.
Strong understanding of real-time rendering constraints and optimization techniques for visual effects in video games.
Ability to adapt to the artistic style and to rapidly learn and work with new tools and pipelines.
A genuine passion for gaming and a strong appreciation for the role of visual effects in creating immersive and engaging player experiences.
What can you expect:
A high-performance high-velocity environment, that encourages the use of cutting-edge technology for growth in the online gaming industry.
An empowering culture which encourages ownership, sharing ideas, and growth, not just ours but yours too.
Continuous peer learning and upskilling via brown bag sessions from in-house and industry leaders.
Employee-centric culture with best-in-class ESOP program. The better the company ets, the more rewarding it gets for you.
What we believe in :
The design function of Gameskraft is responsible for every "communication that goes out to our players and therefore, we always keep the needs of the user first.
We believe our words and design should be simple enouAh to understand but attractive enough to catch the attention.
Everyone has their own pace ,style and flair, we respect that, and we want you to keep yours. We believe that a diverse team is the Aateway to a brilliant one.
Feedback is a positive thing. The more minds you can pick to improve your idea or design, the better it Is.
Authentic - no matter what we do, we do it ourselves. Yes,we take inspiration but what we create is always unique.

Job Description:
Collaboration with Director: Working closely with the director to understand their artistic vision and translate it into visual storytelling
Shot Composition: Planning and setting up shots to create visually appealing and meaningful scenes that enhance the narrative
Camera Selection and Setup: Choosing the appropriate cameras and lenses for each shot and setting up the camera equipment for optimal image quality
Lighting Design: Designing and executing lighting setups to create the desired mood and atmosphere for each scene
Camera Movement: Deciding on camera movements, such as pans, tilts, dollies, and steadicam shots, to add dynamism and emotional impact to the visuals
Framing and Blocking: Working with actors and the director to block the movements and positions of characters within the frame for each shot
Lens Choice: Selecting lenses that achieve the desired depth of field, perspective, and visual effects
Color Grading: Collaborating with the post-production team to ensure the intended color and visual tone are achieved during the editing process
Camera Crew Management: Leading and directing camera operators, camera assistants, and other crew members to execute the cinematographic vision
Location Scouting: Visiting and assessing shooting locations to determine the best angles and setups for filming
Keywords: Post production, Visual Effects, Lighting design, Director, Management

Job Description:
We are looking for an Angular Developer responsible for the client side of our service. Your primary focus will be to implement a complete user interface in the form of a mobile and desktop web app, with a focus on performance.
Your main duties will include creating modules and components and coupling them together into a functional app.
The artistic design will be delivered to you, together with a few HTML templates, but we will ask for your help in regard to animations, CSS, and final HTML output.

Job Description:
Description: The Creative Designer will be responsible for developing visually appealing advertisement designs and videos that align with the digital marketing campaigns. This role involves translating marketing concepts into compelling visual content.

Responsibilities:

Visual Content Creation: As a Creative Designer, your primary responsibility is to create visually appealing and engaging advertisements, including both static designs and videos. These should be in alignment with the ongoing digital marketing campaigns.
Concept Visualization: You will be tasked with the exciting challenge of translating marketing concepts and strategies into compelling visual content. This involves taking abstract ideas and transforming them into visually powerful and communicative designs.
Team Collaboration: Collaboration is at the heart of this role. You'll work closely with the marketing and creative teams to understand campaign goals, messaging, and target audience insights. Effective teamwork is essential for achieving campaign success.
Brand Consistency: Maintaining brand consistency is a key aspect of your work. This means ensuring that all visual content adheres to the established brand guidelines, including logos, color schemes, and typography.

Qualifications:

Educational Background: A bachelors degree in graphic design or a related field is preferred, as it provides a solid foundation in design principles and techniques.
Proven Creative Design Experience: Demonstrated experience in creative design, preferably within marketing or advertising contexts. A strong portfolio showcasing your previous work is a requirement for this role.
Software Proficiency: You should have a high level of proficiency in design software, such as Adobe Creative Suite (e.g., Photoshop, Illustrator), as well as video editing tools (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).
Visual Storytelling Skills: Your ability to convey a compelling story through visuals is crucial. Creativity and an eye for aesthetics are essential in making a memorable impact.
Attention to Detail: Precision and an acute attention to detail are critical to ensure the quality and accuracy of your design work.
Keywords: Communication Skills, Content Designing, Content Creation, Creative Direction, Creative Designing, Creative, Design Skills, Creativity
