Job Description:
Dear Candidate,
Greetings from ConcertAI ! This is an opportunity for you to be part of a world class team!

Concert AI (https://www.concertai.com/) is transforming healthcare with next generation real world data and AI. Our mission is to improve patient outcomes and accelerate needed new innovations by building a system of definitive real-world data, advanced AI insights, leading outcomes & data science talent, within a leading clinical cloud solution. Concert AI is the leader in clinical outcomes analytics, clinical data abstraction services, and PRO technologies and services. We are the fastest growing companies in Oncology Tech.

Position & Role Description Medical Data Abstraction (Across Levels) | Experience: 0-4 Years | Location: Bangalore (Whitefield) The Data Abstractor navigates electronic medical record systems and other medical databases, reviews medical records, and abstracts medical record data related to specified disease and project requirements.

Responsibilities
Access electronic data systems for review of medical records and enter specific data into congruent electronic data systems.
Review project specific documents, as needed, to develop familiarity with project goals and with the Abstractor tasks in each project.
Use other resources as needed to gain the knowledge required to perform Abstractor work on new projects.
Share medical knowledge and project-specific procedural knowledge with other Data Abstractors as needed.
Contribute to/Update the Abstractor meeting agenda for periodic meetings, as needed.
Respond promptly to queries issued by the Lead Data Abstractor, Operations Manager or other project personnel.
Ability understand the Inclusion, Exclusion criteria, adverse event, hospitalization data, medications details and categories the data accordingly.
Ability to understand the diagnostic, pathology and other reports and obtain the required exact information.
Conduct additional duties as assigned, including review of selected medical records to assess eligibility for new projects.

Experience & Education, Training :
Experience: 0 to 4 Years
BDS, MDS ( Oral Pathology, Oral Medicine, Public Health Dentistry only ), BAMS, BHMS, B. Sc (Nursing), M. Sc (Nursing) only.
Medical knowledge is mandatory (Homeopathy, Ayurveda, Dental, etc.)
Oncology experience is preferable; familiarity with how cancer is treated from diagnosis through treatment & recovery & an understanding of cancer terminology.
Experience in entering the data or review of data in other therapeutic areas like, cardiovascular, immunology, Metabolic diseases are also considered.
Experience in reading of Medical records or reports or any patient treatment related data is desirable.

Skills
Excellent critical thinking, organizational and time management skills mandatory.
Flexibility in coping with changing work assignments, changing project requirements, varying training meeting schedules, and database resources that may not ways function optimally.
Computer skills are required, as 90% of work activity involves working with a computer. Comfort with technology, and willingness to learn new software programs is highly desirable.
Ability to make independent judgments in abstracting medical data and the knowledge of when to seek input from other staff.

Other details
Working hours : 8 AM to 5 PM
Working Days: Monday to Friday
Address : Address: Sattva Knowledge Court - 3rd Floor, 7th Cross Rd, Green Domain Layout, EPIP Zone, Brookfield, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560048.
Work from home : No (All 5 days work from office).

If interested kindly revert with your updated CV to sdhamangi@concertai.com.
Reference would be highly appreciated.

Thanks & Regards,
Soumya Dhamangi
ConcertAI
Keywords: medical records, electronic data, cancer, EMR, oncology, EHR, abstracts medical record

Job Description:
Job Description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Graphic and Motion Designer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be passionate about visual storytelling and have a strong ability to blend creativity with technical skills. As a Graphic and Motion Designer, you will play a pivotal role in creating visually compelling content that engages our target audience across various platforms.

Key Responsibilities:

1. Graphic Design:
- Conceptualize, design, and produce high-quality visuals, including but not limited to: logos, brochures, marketing collateral, infographics, and digital ads.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop creative concepts that align with marketing objectives and brand guidelines.
- Create and edit images and graphics for use on websites, social media, and other digital platforms.

2. Motion Design:
- Design and animate motion graphics for videos, presentations, and other multimedia projects.
- Create visually appealing animations that enhance the overall viewer experience.
- Collaborate with other designers and editors to seamlessly integrate motion graphics into video content.

3. Brand Identity:
- Ensure consistency and adherence to brand guidelines in all design projects.
- Contribute to the development and evolution of the company's visual identity and branding.

4. Multimedia Content:
- Assist in the creation of multimedia content, including interactive presentations, animations, and other engaging visual assets.

5. Software Proficiency:
- Utilize industry-standard design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Figma, Illustrator, After Effects, Autodesk Maya, Blender, etc.) to execute design and motion projects effectively.

6. Stay Current:
- Keep up-to-date with design and motion design trends, tools, and technologies to continuously improve and innovate our creative output.

Qualifications:

- Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Motion Design, or a related field (or equivalent experience).
- Proven experience as a Graphic and Motion Designer, with a portfolio showcasing a diverse range of creative projects.
- Proficiency in industry-standard design and animation software.
- Strong understanding of design principles, typography, and layout.
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.
- Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
- Time management skills to handle multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines.
- Knowledge of video editing and post-production processes is a plus.

Benefits:

Benefits such as healthcare, annual bonus, flexible work arrangements, 5 working day, etc.
Keywords: Design, Banner Designing, Posters, Adobe Premiere, Adobe Premiere Pro, Banners, Logo Design, Brochure Design, Indesign, Flyers, Brochures, Motion Graphics, Illustrator, Corel Draw, Adobe After Effects, Graphic Designing, Photoshop, Adobe Creative Suite

For HoD: First Class MA in Kannada (FullTime) Plus Doctorate in Kannada Specialization. Atleast 5 years experience working as Professor / Associate Professor.

For Professor: First Class MA in Kannada (FullTime) Plus Doctorate in Kannada Specialization. Atleast 3 years experience working as Associate Professor.

For Associate Professors: First Class MA in Kannada (FullTime) Plus Doctorate in Kannada Specialization.

For Assistant Professors: First Class MA in Kannada (FullTime).

Only applicants who are interested to work from Institution Campus (Offline) need to apply.
Teaching Demo and Technical Interview will be held Online or Offline in Bengaluru Campus.
Shortlisted Applicants need to join us immediately (or max within 30 days).
Shortlisted Applicants should be ready to Work from College (or Work from Home in case of any future Covid 19 Lockdown) as per directions from Institution Management.
Applicants looking for only Online / Work from Home Opportunities permanently (Even when there is no Covid - 19 Lockdown in Bengaluru) will not be considered for this role.
This is a scheduled Interview drive (Online and Offline Interview). The final round of discussion will be Offline (Face to Face) only if the applicant is a resident of Karnataka. For Outstation candidates it will be Online Interview.

Note: All HoD, Professors, Associate Professors, Assistant Professors, Teaching Assistants are recruited on the payroll of the Institution.

Recruitment is done directly and also through Consultants.

Candidates need not pay any Fee / Charges to any Consultant for Registration / Placement fee.

Job Title: Subject Matter Expert (SME) - Accounting, Economics, Statistics
Job Description:
Subject Matter Expert (SME) - Accounting, Economics, Statistics

Job Overview:
We are seeking highly skilled and knowledgeable Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) to join our team. As an SME, you will be responsible for creating and solving subject-specific problems (questions/exercises) on an online portal. Your expertise and attention to detail will be crucial in providing accurate and high-quality solutions for varying levels of complexity. The ideal candidate should have a passion for the subject, possess exceptional problem-solving abilities, and demonstrate a strong commitment to maintaining academic integrity.

Primary Responsibilities :
Create and solve subject-specific problems (Questions/Exercises) in a detailed step-by-step manner on the online portal, adhering to specific duration, productivity targets, and quality parameters.
Strictly follow the zero-tolerance policy on plagiarism and project-specific guidelines to ensure the originality and authenticity of the content.
Utilize proficient computer skills, including MS Word, Excel, and web browsing to efficiently perform tasks and use technological tools effectively. Must have exceptional typing skills.
Display adaptability by learning and adapting to new tasks or platforms based on dynamic project requirements.
Demonstrate the ability to quickly grasp and understand new, unknown, or critical subject concepts.
Collaborate with other SMEs/peers to enhance the accuracy, language proficiency, and overall quality of solution content created by your team for the benefit of students.
Possess the flexibility to work in different shift timings as needed.

Job Requirements:
(1) SME - Accountancy
Education : A Master of Commerce is required; Candidates who have cleared CA/ CMA/ CS/ ICWA / Mcom / MBA will be preferred. Both experienced professionals and fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.
Subject Knowledge : Strong and in-depth expertise in specific subject matter, including a profound understanding of complex concepts. Candidates must have in-depth knowledge in accounting topics such as managerial accounting, intermediate accounting, financial accounting, cost accounting, corporation accounting, auditing, payroll accounting and international accounting. Candidates with knowledge in the following U.S. taxation/accounting/auditing standards will be preferred: Tax estate planning, tax accounting, tax law, tax research and practice, legal aspects of tax accounting, federal estate tax, international taxation, and trust and estate taxes.

(2) SME - Economics
ducation: M.Sc. Economics / MBA or any related and equivalent discipline is required. Both experienced professionals and fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.
Subject Knowledge: Strong and in-depth expertise in specific subject matter, including a profound understanding of complex concepts.

(3) SME Statistics
Education: M.Sc. Statistics/M.Sc. Statistics with Computer Applications/M.Sc. Applied Statistics/M.Sc. Bio Statistics or any related discipline is required. Both experienced professionals and fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.
Subject Knowledge: Strong and in-depth expertise in specific subject matter, including a profound understanding of complex concepts. Candidates must be familiar with R language, MINITAB and Excel.Candidate must be familiar with Regression and other types of regression, Multivariate analysis, Stochastic, Design of experiments.
(4) SMS Physics
Education: A masters degree in physics or a suitable equivalent is required. Both experienced professionals and fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.
Subject Knowledge: Strong and in-depth expertise in specific subject matter, including a profound understanding of complex concepts. Candidates with knowledge in advanced physics topics such as quantum mechanics, modern physics, nuclear physics, and condensed matter physics will be preferred.
(5) SMS Chemistry
Education: M.Sc. Chemistry (General) or any related discipline is required. Both experienced professionals and fresh graduates are encouraged to apply.
Subject Knowledge: Strong and in-depth expertise in specific subject matter, including a profound understanding of complex concepts.


Other Requirements :
Problem-Solving Skills : Ability to solve any given subject-specific problems (Questions/Exercises) in a detailed step-by-step manner within time constraints on the online platform.
Communication Skills : Proficiency in breaking down, explaining, enhancing, and developing solution content in a manner that facilitates better understanding for students.
Teamwork : Capability to work with and help other SMEs to improve content accuracy, language proficiency, and overall solution quality; Ability to quickly learn and master new knowledge from peers and other resources.
Learning Skills : Ability to quickly learn and master new subject knowledge through research and peer help.
Shift : 6.00 AM to 2.00 PM, 2.00 PM to 9.00 PM & 10.00 AM to 7.00 PM
Interview : Rounds: 3 Rounds (This includes the assessment round)
Work from : Home option (Candidates should have laptop & good internet facility)
Keywords: Economics, Training Need Analysis, Subject Matter Expertise, Statistics, Accounts, Chemistry, Content Development, Research And Development, Physics

Job Description:

2) Take a brief to grasp the production team s needs and specifications

Keywords: Graphics, Post production, Software packages, Technology consulting, Video Editor, Consulting, Manager Technology, Raw material

Job Description:
1. Creating 3D Models: Use software like Blender, 3ds Max, Maya, or Cinema 4D to craft detailed 3D models based on the project requirements.

3. Lighting: Set up lighting in scenes to mimic natural or artificial light sources.
4. Rendering: Use rendering software to create the final image or animation with attention to rendering techniques and quality output.
5. Post-Processing: Enhance images or animations with effects or corrections in software such as Photoshop or After Effects.
6. Collaboration: Work with architects, designers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and receive feedback.
7. Revision: Make changes to models, textures, and lighting based on feedback.
8. Animation: In some cases, create animations or walkthroughs of 3D models.
9. Quality Control: Ensure all visuals are up to a high standard and meet technical specifications.
10. Staying Updated: Keep up with the latest trends in 3D design, technology, and software updates.
11. Project Management: Manage timelines and deliverables for multiple projects simultaneously.

Job Description:
Job Description:
As a Sound Engineer for our community radio station, you will play a pivotal role in ensuring high-quality sound production and smooth broadcast operations. You will work closely with our experienced team of radio professionals and have the opportunity to learn and grow in a supportive environment. This position is specifically designed for individuals with a minimum 03-year professional experience but a strong interest in sound engineering and radio broadcasting.
Responsibilities:
Assist in the setup and maintenance of audio equipment, including microphones, mixers, headphones, and other studio components.
Support the production team in recording and editing audio content, including interviews, shows, and other programming elements.
Monitor and control audio levels during live broadcasts, ensuring optimal sound quality and clarity.
Conduct regular checks on studio equipment to ensure functionality and troubleshoot minor technical issues as they arise.
Assist with basic audio editing tasks, such as trimming, cleaning, and organizing audio files using editing software.
Collaborate with the production team to brainstorm and develop creative ideas for engaging radio content.
Assist in the coordination of guest interviews and live performances, ensuring proper setup and sound requirements.
Participate in on-air productions, including operating audio consoles, managing sound effects, and adjusting audio levels as needed.
Maintain a clean and organized studio environment, including equipment storage and inventory management.
Adhere to station guidelines and industry regulations regarding sound quality, content standards, and broadcast schedules.
Operate audio equipment during recording sessions and live events, ensuring smooth transitions and maintaining appropriate sound levels.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends, emerging technologies, and advancements in sound engineering techniques.
Adhere to project timelines, meet deadlines, and contribute to an efficient workflow throughout the audio production process.
Collaborate effectively with team members, actively participating in meetings and discussions, and maintaining clear communication.
Qualifications:
Strong passion for radio broadcasting and sound engineering, demonstrated through personal projects or relevant coursework. Bachelors degree in Sound Engineering / Music Production / Radio Production.
Knowledge of basic audio recording and editing principles, including familiarity with editing software (e.g., Pro Tools, Logic Pro, Ableton Live, Audacity, Adobe Audition).
Excellent attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality sound production.
Good problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot basic technical issues independently.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively within a team.
Flexibility to work non-standard hours, including evenings and weekends, as required by the station's programming schedule.
Eagerness to learn, adapt, and take on new responsibilities in a dynamic and evolving radio environment.
Prior experience with community radio or involvement in student radio organizations is a plus, but not mandatory. A portfolio or examples of personal projects demonstrating your passion and skills in sound engineering (if available).
Familiarity with local community issues and an understanding of the target audience's preferences and interests is advantageous.
If you are a motivated individual with a passion for sound engineering and radio broadcasting, we invite you to apply for the position of Sound Engineer at our newly inaugurated community radio station 90.8 FM Radio Manipal Jaipur. Join our team and contribute to the growth and success of our station while gaining invaluable experience in the field.
Keywords: Sound Editing, Media Production, Audio Editing, Dubbing, Mixing, Special Effects, Recording

Job Description:

Candidates will run prospects through the entire sales cycle, including developing new leads, educating new leads and turning interested shoppers into long-term customers
You will be working from home, transmitting orders, reports and sales analyses to your office
In view of all the travel you re likely to do, it s generally important to have a driving license and follow the mandatory government rules
Generally your working hours will be flexible considering the monthly targets to be achieved
This job is completely incentive based
The major earning will be from the sales targets achieved by you

Close new deals at the best rate.

Maintain records of all sales leads and/or customer accounts and provides daily progress reports.
Educate customers on how products or services can benefit them in context to their health and wellness.
Monitor the company s industry competitors, new products and market conditions.
Represent the company and brand during the various events, meets, programs and summits.
Be responsible and accountable for meeting targets.
Giving feedback to management.
Must be willing to travel up to 50 percent of the time
Qualification:
Qualified field sales representative should have a high school diploma and typically hold a bachelor s degree/diploma in business, communications, marketing, economics, commerce, arts or a similar field.
At our company, however, skills and experience outweigh education when it comes to qualifying candidates, especially because product expertise is typically learned on the job.
Experience:
0 to 2 years of experience in field sales job with related product .
Skills:
Comfortable on the phone conversations.
Competitive, extreme polite and positive attitude
Sharp sales chops
Good in speaking Gujarati, Hindi and English language.
The ability and desire to sell
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Strong commercial awareness
A confident and determined approach
Resilience and the ability to cope up with rejection

Job Description:
Educational qualification :
Any Engineering Diploma, B.E/ B. Tech, BSc / MSc graduated in 2018, 2019, 2020 with no prior work experienc
Roles and Responsibilities:
Understanding structural data such as Digital Geospatial Maps and Engineering Designs /Documents etc
Understanding un-Structural data such as text, logs, spreadsheets information, PDFs, Images etc.
Apply critical thinking and problem solving skills on geospatial maps and engineering designs analysis and interpretations
Quickly Learn and adopt any CAD/GIS tools ( AutoCAD,ArcGIS.QGIS, Smallworld PNI/EO /GDO and Client Applications, IP Tools, and MS-office )
Creates/ or Modifies or update geospatial based network and engineering designs and relevant data as per client guidelines
Meet the client/ established project specific production and quality performance
Performs project related work and additional duties as needed
Compensation :
INR 1,50,000 per annum
First 6 months: INR 11,000 per month
Next 6 months: INR 12,000 per month
Bonus: INR 6,000 after completion of first 6 months, INR 6,000 after completion of 12 months
Potential Career Path:
Based on performance during 12 months, you will be converted as a permanent employee
After gaining experience on domain, tools, applications and multiple projects, you would have the potential to lead a team or play a key role as subject matter expert
On upskilling / reskilling on technologies which CYIENT is working on, you will be able to apply for open opportunities through internal job postings
Work Shifts:
Need to work in any of the below 3 shifts as per the project requirement:
First shift - 06:00 AM to 03:00 PM
Second shift - 03:00 PM to 12:00 AM
General shift - 09:00 AM to 06:30 PM
Working days :
Monday to Friday. Occasionally there may be a need of additional work on weekends based on project demand
Mode of work :
On-job training at office premises for initial 4 weeks is a must and work from home given on successful completion of training
Post the situation gets better (from Pandemic), will have to work from office
Documents to be produced for joining:
Educational copies (from SSC to Highest Degree)
Individual memos or Consolidated marks memo
Provisional certificate
AADHAAR card PAN card
Keywords: GIS, Mining, Semiconductor, AutoCAD, Aerospace, CAD, Telecommunication, Healthcare, Microstation, MS Office

Job Description:
Role Description
This is a full-time on-site role for a Graphic Designer. The Graphic Designer will design graphics, logos, branding materials, and typography. The Graphic Designer will also create and maintain the visual identity of brand materials across various marketing channels, such as websites and social media platforms.

Job Description: SocialChamps is seeking a talented and motivated Graphic Designer to join our creative team. As a Graphic Designer, you will play a crucial role in creating visually appealing and engaging content for our clients. You will have the opportunity to work on a variety of projects and collaborate with a diverse range of clients, making this role both exciting and challenging.

Key Responsibilities:
Designing Creative Assets: Create high-quality, visually appealing graphics for digital marketing campaigns, social media, websites, and other marketing materials.
Branding: Ensure that all designs align with the client's branding guidelines and maintain a consistent visual identity.
Collaboration: Work closely with the marketing team to understand project requirements and contribute creative ideas.
Project Management: Handle multiple projects simultaneously, meet deadlines, and manage time efficiently.
Image Editing: Edit and enhance images for various digital platforms, including retouching and resizing.
Typography: Select and apply appropriate fonts to enhance the overall design.
Feedback: Accept and incorporate feedback from team members and clients to improve designs.

Qualifications:
Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design or a related field.
1-4 years of professional graphic design experience.
Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign.
Strong understanding of design principles, layout, and typography.
Knowledge of current design trends and best practices.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Strong attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
Experience working with a variety of clients and industries is a plus.
Keywords: Graphic Designing, Video Editing, Visual Effects, Adobe Premiere, Motion Graphics, Illustrator, Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, Indesign

A collaborative team player who thrives in a fast-paced, creative environment.

Job Description:
Job Description:

As a Storyboard and Animatics Artist you'll help make our anime-style videos come to life.

Key Responsibilities:

Visual Storytelling: Develop storyboards that show how our animations will look, including scenes, camera angles, and character actions, in line with the project's vision.
Blueprint for Animation: Create animatics, which are like blueprints for our final animations. This includes timing for character movements, camera changes, and sound.
Collaboration: Work closely with our animation team, directors, and writers to make sure the storyboard and animatics match the project's vision.
Feedback Integration: Actively take in feedback from the creative team and make adjustments to storyboards and animatics as needed.
Attention to Detail: Pay close attention to elements like character expressions, camera angles, and pacing to create a captivating story.
Quality Control: Maintain high-quality standards and stick to project timelines to ensure our final animations match the approved animatics.

Requirements:

Professional Experience: You should have experience in roles like Storyboard Artist or Visualizer within the creative industry.
Digital Skills: You need to be skilled in using digital tools and software for creating storyboards and visualizations.
Storytelling Expertise: You should have a strong grasp of how marketing stories work, including pacing and visual storytelling techniques.
Communication Skills: Excellent communication abilities are a must. You should be able to work well with others and express your creative ideas clearly.
Attention to Detail: Being detail-oriented is important. You need to capture the essence of ideas and concepts through your visuals.
Problem-Solving: Creative problem-solving skills are essential to come up with innovative solutions that align with our creative goals.
Bonus Points: While not required, having knowledge of mobile games and digital marketing is a plus.
Keywords: Storyboarding, Animatics, Animatics Production, Storyboard Creation, Storyboard, Visualiser, Staging, Concept Sketches

Collaborating with the director or client to understand their creative vision and making suggestions for how to best achieve it

Excellent technical skills in video editing, including proficiency in non-linear editing, color correction, and special effects

Job Description:
Role & responsibilities

Develop and create high quality 3D models, animations, and visual effects based on project requirements.
Collaborate with clients, art directors, and design teams to understand project goals and translate concepts into compelling visual representations.
Utilise 3D modelling, texturing, lighting, rigging and animation to achieve desired results.

Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in graphic design, 3D animation, or a related field.
Proficiency in industrystandard 3D modelling and animation software, such as Blender, Autodesk 3ds Max, Maya, Cinema 4D.
Strong artistic and visual design skills, including a solid understanding of colour theory, composition, and lighting.
Knowledge of texturing, shading, and rendering techniques to create realistic and visually appealing 3D graphics.
Experience in creating 3D models along with rigging and animation.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to deliver highquality work within project deadlines.
Strong problemsolving skills and ability to adapt to changing project requirements.
A portfolio showcasing a range of 3D design and animation work.

Job Description:
The role of a video editor is to take raw video footage and create a polished and professional finished product that aligns with the company s branding and messaging.
Here are the key roles and responsibilities of a video editor:
Video Editing: The primary responsibility of a video editor is to edit the raw footage into a finished video product that tells a story and engages the target audience. This includes cutting and splicing footage, adding transitions and effects, and selecting music and sound effects.
Colour Correction and Grading: Adjust the colour and lighting of the footage to create a cohesive and polished look.
Audio Editing: Work with sound engineers to ensure high audio quality and that any music or sound effects are appropriately balanced with the video.
Collaboration: Work closely with other members of the marketing and creative teams, such as designers and copywriters, to ensure that the video aligns with the company s overall branding and messaging.
Creative Input: Provide creative input and suggestions for the direction of the video based on their knowledge of the medium and the target audience.
Project Management: Manage timelines and deadlines and work with other team members to ensure the project is completed on time.
Software Proficiency: Should be proficient in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro and be able to learn new software as needed.
Overall, a video editor is responsible for creating a polished and professional finished video product that tells a story and engages the target audience. They work collaboratively with other members of the marketing and creative teams, provide creative input and suggestions, manage their own timelines and deadlines, and be proficient in video editing software.
Requirements
BSc degree in film studies, cinematography or other related fields.
Proven work experience as a Video Editor.
Solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages (e.g Premiere, After Effects and Final Cut)
Demonstrable video editing ability with a strong portfolio.
Thorough knowledge of timing, motivation and continuity.
Familiarity with special effects, 3D and compositing.
Creative mind and storytelling skills.
Keywords: Adobe Premiere Pro, Software packages, Social media, Project management, Video Editor, Video editing, Audio editing, Management, Analytics

Job Description:
Need a fresher to one year experienced candidate , very proficient with 3dsmax software, sketchup or both.
Need a fresher to one year experienced candidate , very proficient with 3dsmax software, sketchup or both.

Position Overview:
A 3D Visualizer, also known as a 3D Artist or 3D Rendering Artist, is a creative professional responsible for transforming concepts, designs, or blueprints into realistic and visually appealing three-dimensional images or animations. They play a crucial role in various industries, including architecture, interior design, product design, video games, film, advertising, and marketing.

Job Duties and Responsibilities:

3D Modeling: Create detailed and accurate 3D models of objects, environments, or characters based on provided specifications, reference materials, or blueprints.

Texturing and Materials: Apply textures, materials, and shaders to 3D models to achieve realistic and aesthetically pleasing visuals.

Lighting: Set up and manipulate lighting to enhance the realism and ambiance of the 3D scenes.

Rendering: Utilize rendering software to generate high-quality images or animations from 3D models.

Animation: If required by the project, create dynamic and smooth animations of 3D models, characters, or objects.

Visualization and Conceptualization: Transform design concepts, architectural plans, or product ideas into stunning visual representations that effectively communicate the intended message or purpose.

Collaboration: Work closely with designers, architects, project managers, and other stakeholders to understand their vision and incorporate feedback into the visualizations.

Quality Control: Ensure the output meets the highest standards of quality, realism, and accuracy.

Software and Tools: Stay up-to-date with the latest 3D modeling and rendering software, tools, and techniques to improve efficiency and productivity.

Project Management: Manage multiple projects simultaneously, meet deadlines, and prioritize tasks effectively.

Problem Solving: Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to 3D modeling, texturing, rendering, and animation.

Portfolio Development: Continuously develop and update a portfolio showcasing the best examples of completed projects.

Skills and Qualifications:

Proficiency in 3D modeling software (e.g., Autodesk 3ds Max, Maya, Cinema 4D, Blender) and rendering engines (e.g., V-Ray, Corona, Arnold).

Strong understanding of texturing, shading, and lighting techniques.

Knowledge of animation principles and techniques (if animation is part of the job requirements).

Familiarity with design and architectural concepts for accurate representation.

Excellent artistic and creative skills, with a keen eye for detail and aesthetics.

Ability to work collaboratively and receive constructive feedback from project stakeholders.

Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot technical issues.

Time management skills to meet project deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

Knowledge of other graphic design software and post-production tools may be beneficial (e.g., Adobe Photoshop, After Effects).

Education and Experience:

A bachelor's degree in Computer Animation, Graphic Design, Architecture, Interior Design, or related fields is typically preferred, although a strong portfolio and relevant work experience may also be considered. Practical experience in 3D modeling, rendering, and animation is highly desirable.

Certifications in specific 3D modeling or rendering software can be advantageous and may vary depending on the industry and employer's requirements.

Overall, a 3D Visualizer plays a critical role in transforming abstract concepts into visual reality, enabling better understanding, decision-making, and communication in various fields and industries.
very proficient in the softwares and can work independently
Keywords: 3D visualization, 3ds Max, film advertisement, interior designing, marketing, 3D rendering, product designing, 3d modelling, 3D artist

Job Description:
Competitive compensation + shift allowances
Attractive benefits (security, flexibility, support and well-being)
Engaging employee programs
What youll be doing:
The Helpdesk Supervisor coordinates and supervises the daily activities of Helpdesk staff, sets priorities for the team to ensure task completion; coordinates work activities with other supervisors
Responsible for establishing, maintaining and enhancing customer business through effective implementation and/or support of the company products and services
Manage the professional response to customer support requests in an accurate and timely manner, with input from the Manager, Customer Care.
Determine appropriate action to ensure customer satisfaction while protecting the Customer Care divisions financial responsibility.
Ensure that all customer contacts are fully documented into the call management system and the required databases.
Manage the team to assist Customer Care Specialists/Representatives by identifying problem areas within product lines as they occur.
Manage the collection and documentation of data necessary for problem areas to be researched appropriately.
Responsible for assisting the QC analyst with any recommendations that are needed to be implemented within their team.
Accurate, regular and timely reporting to the Manager, Customer Care.
Define standard procedures according to the company standards.
Manage, motivate and evaluate team to meet expected standards and procedures.
Set, work on and reach Success Factor Goals related to future planning for the group as agreed upon with the Manager, Customer Care.
Provide leadership through the coaching and supporting of team members
Provide consistent, ongoing feedback to maintain and improve the team s performance.
Responsible for one-on-one meetings to be held at a minimum of once a year that should take place prior to the year-end Success Factors process, including writing the Success Factor Year End Review for their team.
Use communication skills as a tool to build excellent relationships with customers and colleagues and use cross-departmental communication to improve synergy effects, discuss and resolve issues.
Act as a back-up performing Customer Care Representative/Specialist tasks as needed (anticipated at up to 30% of the time)
Sets high standards of performance for oneself actively applies feedback received to daily work and strives to improve performance and regularly displays a positive attitude
Take a broad view of the business by supporting initiatives in other departments as well as supporting new product lines.
Provides reports upon request to the Manager, Customer Care as it pertains to the daily operating function of the Customer Care Department.
Responsible for any special projects that may be assigned as needed by the Manager, Customer Care.
The supervisor will provide updates to the status of the assignment, about differences in given deadlines, the measures taken and generally about all business-related aspects.
What were looking for:
Degree educated in electronics, information technology, engineering or similar
Fluent in spoken and written English.
Prior experience of managing a customer care or helpdesk team
Experience providing support and service of technical or medical equipment
Strong team work experience
Demonstrates flexibility in daily work; available for off hours support during the course of the work week; required to be on-call during a rotating schedule for the weekends.
Demonstration of self-composure in all customer relations, strong persuasion skills with customers
Ability to work independently and effectively in given areas of responsibility
Able to develop efficient problem solutions, business management techniques.
Strong working knowledge of safety/security protocols, company policies, quality, ERP, CRM, office package and assigned products.
Keywords: ERP, Helpdesk, Clinical trials, Support services, Customer support, Customer service, Management, Technology solutions, Information technology, CRM

Job Title: Content Writers (SEO)- USA Based Digital Magazine - Open To Freshers
Job Description:
Job description Work from Home Job Opportunity A digital magazine based in Los Angeles, USA. We're looking for writers to work remotely (from home). Ideal candidate is flexible, self-motivated, and interested in learning all aspects of helping in the growth of the magazine.We are looking for highly motivated Content Writers to join our team. The ideal candidate possesses a passion for writing and strong research skills. This is an opportunity for an influential content writer who enjoys developing engaging SEO-focused content.

Fresher content writers can apply. Should have great command over English. Grammatically correct English is one of the most important requirements for this job. Candidates should be comfortable covering a variety of topics relevant to celebrity, entertainment, fashion, beauty, health, runway, business, Finance, AI, crypto etc. We expect the candidate to be able to write about any topic that is delegated to them. A background in journalism is a plus.

We want the candidate to understand it's a Full Time job opportunity, please do not apply if you are looking for part time work. Availability to work from home five days a week.

Responsibilities
You should be able to work independently, exercise excellent judgment, and manage projects from start to finish with minimal guidance.
Background in fashion & business writing.
Proven work experience as a content writer.
Strong storytelling skills that create engaging business content.
Highly proficient research and writing skills.
Data-driven with a high attention to detail.
A demonstrated interest in the fashion, beauty, lifestyle, business, entertainment space.
0-5 years of journalism and writing experience, ideally with a reporting background
A strong voice and innovative ideas
Pitch-perfect news judgement
Excellent research skills
Write between three to four articles per shift in keeping with our magazines voice and style
Write snappy and creative headlines
Create SEO-focused content
Meet tight deadlines without exception
Work on strict deadlines and prioritize your tasks
Proven ability to manage several projects simultaneously

Qualifications:
MUST BE proficient in English
Comfortable taking on complex research assignments
Can provide writing samples of web content or blog articles
Possess a work hard/play hard attitude

Additional requirements:
At least some content writing experience
Minimum qualification - Graduated from a prestigious university
Flawless grammar, spelling, and usage
A basic understanding of Photoshop and HTML (more than basic is a plus)

Benefits Offered:
Work from home

Schedule:
Monday to Friday
Keywords: Content Writing, SEO Writing, Creative Writing, Content Editing, Canva, Articles, Proof Reading, Web Content Writing, Article Writing, Editorial

Job Description:
We are looking for Video Editor. The Video Editor is responsible for the creation, editing and audit of video editing deliverables. These deliverables include advertising video creatives, assets for interactive displays and preparing image assets. The Video Editor works integrated with a larger team and is capable of handling mid to complex video editing projects efficiently under minimum supervision from a Design Lead.
In this role you will:
Create, produce, edit and audit, video graphics, video templates, layouts, video edits for digital advertising campaigns, social media, broadcast, TCV, Retail Media and digital OOH.
Provide and manage design, video graphics and video editing documentation and specifications.
Work closely with team members to ensure high standards of graphic design, video graphics, and video editing brand consistency.
Communicate design, video graphics and video editing rational clearly with internal and external stakeholders.
Collaborate with account managers, peers and leadership to deliver high-quality, scalable, on-brand video solutions to build a superior vendor, as well as customer, experience.
Communicates effectively with production design team members, project managers and production design leads and clients when required.
Provides excellent quality assurance on all of his/her deliverables.
Stays up to date with recent design trends and new technologies.
Maintains a solid working knowledge of the latest design tools, platforms and technologies in the industry.
You should have:
2+ yrs. experience in advertising agencies, digital agencies, design agencies, and/or startups.
Experience working in production design teams in the following areas: video editing, digital marketing, digital animation, preferably for international clients and global brands.
Solid understanding of motion design principles, trends, systems and structures.
Ability to handle complex video editing projects independently.
Understanding of digital marketing, digital production and online advertising.
Understanding of interactivity, animation principles and best practices.
Advanced proficiency in Premiere Pro.
Proficient knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator).
It s a plus if you have:
Basic knowledge of 3D software.
Experience working with Adobe After Effects, QuickTime, Open Shot
Strong knowledge of productivity tools: MS Office (Word, Excel, Outlook),
Knowledge of remote collaboration tools (Slack, Zoom, Drive, Box, Paper, Evernote) and workflow management tools (Jira, Trello, Asana, Basecamp).
Academic Background
Bachelors degree in Motion Design, Graphic Design, Visual Design, Advertising Design or related field or equivalent experience in advertising and/or digital production agencies or startups.

Job Description:
We are looking to bring more animators and video editors into our network. CrowdPharm is a network of nearly 4,000 healthcare, medical, apharmaceutical-focused talent in 100 countries and we re looking for new talent to help us provide our clients with an abundance of the freshest ideas.
Here s some more information about CrowdPharm. We are not a job site. We are a global community of on-demand talent ready to jump on client work and earn a little extra money. Our projects put your expertise to the test, help grow your portfolio, and allow you to get paid fast and at the going market rates. And, as a member, you choose to accept work invitations and challenges that best fit your expertise and schedule. If you haven t already, check out the Q&A on our website.

Job Description:
It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout
The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English
Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy
Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like)

Sanofi Global Hub (SGH) is an internal Sanofi resource organization based in India and is setup to centralize processes and activities to support Specialty Care, Vaccines, General Medicines, CHC, CMO, and R&D, Data & Digital functions. Also to provide support on infographic animation, video publication articles, video editing, sound editing, removing background noise from audio clips, promotional videos, animated icons, PowerPoint slide decks, scientific posters, redrawing scientific images, interactive PPTs, Infographics, newsletters, e-mailers, flyers, brochures, handouts and e-learning modules as per the provided guidelines and specifications.
People: (1) Maintain effective relationships with Content Enhancement team and Scientific Writers in SGH (and globally stakeholders, based on the project requirement) with an end objective to ensure preparing in scientific communication materials are developed to meet stakeholder requirements.
Performance: (1) Provide publication/medical education material (slide deck, abstract, poster, manuscript etc) as per agreed timelines and quality and (2) Extend support to work on digital and interactive deliverables (newsletters, annual reports, e-mailers, patient education materials, video animation / editing, and other deliverables) based on the need.

Job Description:
The Layout Artist is responsible for the story-telling, shot sequence continuity, and presentation as part of the VFX pipeline for feature film and/or high-level television. Utilizing assets from the modeling department and/or camera track from the matchmove department, they create a rough pass of the shot as a whole as well as packages necessary components for use in later departments. While camera animation and composition is the main objective, a Layout Artist may be required to create simple animation, lighting, and FX in order to convey key story points.
  KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Creates visually striking composition based on the shot description and/or storyboard
Matches references such as previs and/or images
Supplement shots with simple but convincing animation, lighting, and FX to aid story-telling
Stitches plate-based shots into a full CG environment and vice versa
Assembles the correct combination of assets in a shot for use in downstream departments
Includes proof of scale and continuity in a virtual layout set up
Debugs technical problems and escalate issues as needed
Takes directions and applies notes from supervisors
QUALIFICATIONS & SKILLS
Three (3) to five (5) years of layout experience in visual effects for feature film or television (required)
Bachelors degree or Diploma in the field of arts, film, and/or animation (preferred)
Advanced software skills in Maya (required)
Basic to Intermediate skills in 3ds Max, Photoshop, Shotgun, Nuke, and Scripting (preferred)
Extensive skillset in-camera animation, staging, and set dressing
Great sense of presentation via lighting, texturing, and/or FX
Solid animation grounding for story-telling purposes
Background or experience in traditional Fine Arts demonstrating a thorough understanding of framing and composition
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills; a team player with a great attitude
Great eye for detail with excellent and consistent quality assurance
Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving skills
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision
Keywords: Visual Effects, Interpersonal skills, Manager Quality Assurance, Texturing, Maya, Animation, VFX, Photoshop, Troubleshooting, Fine arts

Job Description:
A Senior Specialist in Neurology is a medical professional who specializes in diagnosing and treating disorders related to the nervous system
Neurology is a branch of medicine that focuses on the study and treatment of conditions affecting the brain, spinal cord, peripheral nerves, and muscles
Here are the key responsibilities and areas of expertise for a Senior Specialist in Neurology:
Diagnosis and Evaluation: Senior Specialists in Neurology assess patients with neurological symptoms and conduct comprehensive evaluations to determine the nature and extent of their condition
They review medical history, perform physical examinations, and order diagnostic tests such as imaging scans (MRI, CT scans), electroencephalograms (EEGs), or nerve conduction studies
Treatment Planning and Management: Based on the diagnosis, Senior Specialists develop customized treatment plans for patients with neurological disorders
They prescribe medications, recommend lifestyle modifications, and provide guidance on managing symptoms and improving overall quality of life
They may also refer patients to other specialists or recommend surgical interventions when necessary
Neurological Disorders: Senior Specialists in Neurology are knowledgeable about a wide range of neurological disorders, including but not limited to:Stroke: They diagnose and manage patients who have suffered a stroke, providing acute care and long-term stroke prevention strategies
Epilepsy: They diagnose and treat patients with epilepsy, developing appropriate medication regimens and providing guidance on seizure management
Multiple Sclerosis (MS): They manage patients with MS, providing disease-modifying therapies, symptom management, and support services
Movement Disorders: They diagnose and manage conditions such as Parkinson's disease, essential tremor, dystonia, and other movement disorders
Headaches and Migraines: They diagnose and provide treatment plans for patients experiencing chronic headaches or migraines
Neuromuscular Disorders: They diagnose and manage conditions affecting the peripheral nerves and muscles, such as peripheral neuropathy, myasthenia gravis, and muscular dystrophy
Patient Education and Counseling: Senior Specialists play a vital role in educating patients and their families about their neurological condition, treatment options, potential side effects of medications, and lifestyle modifications
They offer support, answer questions, and provide resources to help patients better manage their condition
Research and Clinical Trials: Many Senior Specialists in Neurology are involved in research activities and may participate in clinical trials to advance the understanding and treatment of neurological disorders
They contribute to scientific publications and stay updated with the latest developments in the field
Keywords: Neurology, SIDE, Surgical, Diagnostics, Clinical trials, Support services, Research, Management, Counselling

Job Description:
Description The Matchmove team at Double Negative are responsible for working with basic line up geometry and associated scene data in order to ensure a good match with the scene. This is achieved by taking the original background plate photography and recreating the set up for use with our in -house software . Their work starts with tracking a camera and calculating lens distortion but they also have the ability to body track and object track when it s required.
Must Have

A degree or equivalent in Computer Graphics, Animation or related course.
VFX industry experience and be equally proficient in camera, object and body tracking.
Solid basic knowledge of Maya is required
Ability to create tiy scenes for use in the rest of the pipeline

Team orientated
Adaptable

Job Description:
As a Storyboard Artist, you will play a crucial role in the pre-production phase of visual storytelling, whether it be for animation, film, television, commercials, or other media projects
Your main responsibility will be to visually translate the script or concept into a series of sequential images known as storyboards
These storyboards serve as a blueprint for the production team, guiding the direction of the project
Responsibilities:
Script Analysis: Read and analyze the script or project concept to understand the storyline, characters, and key visual elements
Visualization: Transform the script into a series of rough sketches or drawings that visually represent the key scenes, shots, and camera angles for each sequence
Collaboration: Work closely with directors, writers, and other creative team members to ensure the storyboards align with the overall vision of the project
Iteration and Feedback: Receive feedback on your storyboard drafts and make necessary revisions to ensure the visual storytelling is coherent and impactful
Pacing and Timing: Determine the pacing and timing of scenes to create a dynamic and engaging flow for the final production
Composition and Shot Planning: Plan the composition of each shot, including character poses, facial expressions, and background details
Storytelling Techniques: Utilize various visual storytelling techniques, such as camera movements, transitions, and visual effects, to enhance the narrative
Style and Art Direction: Follow established artistic styles or contribute to the development of a unique visual style that aligns with the project's requirements
Deadline Management: Deliver storyboards within the project's timeline and meet production milestones
Storyboard Revisions: Incorporate revisions and changes requested by the director or production team while maintaining the overall integrity of the storyboard
Keywords: Visual Effects, Director, Animation, Management

Knowledge of Body Paint, Deep Paint, or other 3D paint packages
Supporting artwork such as a portfolio

Job Description:
This position is for a Process Engineer in GlobalFoundr India center at Bangalore, to complement the existing module engineering teams in the USA and Germany fab locations. This pioneering role will focus on enabling the efficiency and effectiveness of the fab onsite team. The primary responsibilities of this position are to sustain the manufacturing production line, troubleshoot process and equipment signals, monitor and respond to inline/defect signals and optimize unit processes in order to meet device performance requirements for leading edge technology. Additionally, the candidate will be expected to assist in tooling qualification, transitioning processes into manufacturing, and maintaining the processes in manufacturing.
Specific Responsibilities
Utilize factory systems and automated reports to sustain the production line, monitor SPC trends, drive Cpk improvement, and troubleshoot for process and tool issues
Tool setup, qualification, and matching through standardized business processes
Improve process robustness for high volume manufacturing using statistical tools, DOE techniques, data-driven decision making, and systematic problem-solving skills. Use lean manufacturing and six sigma processes
Design, execute and analyze experiments to develop advanced processes to meet technology (e.g. performance, yield, and reliability) and manufacturing (e.g. process stability, cost of ownership) targets.
Develop procedures, specifications for tool and process operations, and provide training to the shift operations team
Support process integration and quality organizations to ensure technology meets the qualification and reliability requirements
Partner and communicate regularly with the fab engineering, technician, and management teams to drive executional excellence and business results
Perform all activities in a safe and responsible manner and support all Environmental, Health, Safety & Security requirements and programs.
Required Qualifications
B.E./B.Tech. or M.Sc./ M.Tech. with 0-8years of relevant experience in Electrical (Microelectronics)/ Electronics Engineering, Materials Science, Physics or Chemistry
Experience in high volume manufacturing preferably in semiconductors/ electronics industry in process module/ equipment (200mm/ 300mm) are strongly desired
A strong working knowledge of Statistical Process Control (SPC), Structured Problem Solving (SPS) skills and Failure Mode & Effect Analytical (FMEA) methods would be essential
Good understanding of basic concepts in Physics, Chemistry, Electronics and preferably Semiconductor processing and technology
Excellent verbal and written English communication skills
Strong team player with the ability to work well within a global team
Organized with a high attention to detail and on-time delivery of work assigned
Good knowledge of MS Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint)
Keywords: Fabrication, process integration, Lean manufacturing, Analytical, Manager Technology, Design development, Semiconductor manufacturing, Continuous improvement, MS Office Word, Six sigma

Job Description:
Description The Layout team at Double Negative is a valued mix of technical and creative artists who continuously produce the highest level of work, sometimes under tight deadlines for large- scale work. The team is r esponsible for CG camera animation using cinematography principles, shot composition and character blocking. You will be producing pre- vis and post- vis CG cameras for high profiles features that will be subsequently used by other departments.
Part of your role will be posting on and composing digital assets for the rest of the pipeline to use. You ll be responsible for maintain shot continuity across sequences while also modelling set geometry used during the matchmove process.
Must Have

VFX industry experience within a feature film environment .
Experience in sequence and shot composition.
Good working knowledge of cinematography in a virtual environment.
Excellent understanding of practical cameras and camera techniques.
Experience with previs animation and cameras.
Previous and creature animation blocking is desirable.
Thorough understanding of postproduction pipelines.
Broad 3D generalist experience, comfortable with matchmove, asset build and lighting.
A good working knowledge of Maya.
Good creative and technical problem solving skills.
A degree or equivalent in Computer Graphics, Animation or other related course is preferred. About You

Pro- active and good at problem solving.
Very meticulous and accurate.
Able to work under pressure on potentially short turn around times.
Able to take direction and feedback well from a supervisor.
Organised and able to create tidy scenes for use in the rest of the pipeline.
Team oriented and have great communication skills.
Highly motivated.
Keywords: Visual Effects, Usage, Composition, Creative, Layout, Computer graphics, Maya, Cinematography, Animation, Business Executive

Job Title: Frontend Web Developer (Work From Home + Australian Agency)
Job Description:
Join our innovative marketing agency where creativity meets technology! We are on the hunt for a Frontend Developer with a solid design background and a knack for creating engaging user experiences. If you are passionate about digital storytelling and thrive in a collaborative team environment, we are excited to hear from you!

Key Responsibilities:

- Lead end-to-end design and development projects for websites and landing pages ensuring both aesthetic appeal and optimum performance.
- Expertly utilize Oxygen, Bricks and other tools to transform client visions into user-centric digital experiences.
- Customize e-commerce platforms like WordPress and Shopify, crafting seamless shopping experiences that drive conversions.
- Collaborate with our design team, converting Figma designs into interactive and responsive digital solutions.
- Continuously optimize and troubleshoot website functionalities to ensure stellar user satisfaction.
- Stay updated and integrate new web technologies, embracing the fast-evolving landscape of frontend development.

Qualifications:

- Proven experience in design and development with a portfolio showcasing stunning websites, increased user engagement and improved site speed in previous projects.
- Proficiency with Oxygen or Bricks builder, WordPress, and Shopify Liquid.
- Experience with Figma and an ability to translate design files into compelling online experiences.
- A meticulous eye for detail ensuring a high standard of quality in every project.
- Expert across HTML, CSS, JS and Shopify Liquid
- Desired (but not essential): Familiarity with GSAP for creating smooth animations.

Experience:

- Minimum 1 year of experience in frontend development with a focus on both design and technical aspects.

What We Offer:

- Work from home
- Monday-Friday 9am-5pm IST
- A vibrant and inclusive company where innovation and creativity flourish.
- Work across international clients
- Access to cutting edge tools (we like to be at the forefront of tech)
- Competitive salary with a comprehensive benefits package.
- Opportunities for professional growth and learning.
- Work alongside a diverse and talented team on exciting projects that make a real impact.
- Enjoy a healthy work-life balance in a supportive team environment.
- Work closely with our Australian CEO

Application Process:

Submit your resume along with a link to your portfolio. Were keen to see how youve leveraged design and technical skills to create exceptional user experiences.

*Our Agency is an equal-opportunity employer. We encourage applications from candidates of all backgrounds and experiences.

---

At Our Agency, every project is a journey into the extraordinary. Your expertise as a Frontend Developer will be the compass guiding us through the uncharted digital landscape. Ready to embark? Apply now and let's create digital magic together!
Keywords: Web Design And Development, CSS, Oxygen, Bricks, Wordpress, Front End Design, JS, HTML, Shopify, Web Designing, Web Development

Job Description:
A Motion Designer is a creative professional responsible for producing visually appealing animations, graphics, and visual effects for various digital media platforms
They use their artistic skills and technical expertise to create engaging and dynamic visual content that enhances the overall user experience
Key Responsibilities:Animation and Graphic Design:Create high-quality animations, motion graphics, and visual effects for videos, websites, apps, and other digital platforms
Design and animate characters, objects, and environments to convey messages or narratives effectively
Storyboarding and Conceptualization:Develop storyboards, scripts, and concepts for motion projects, ensuring alignment with the project's objectives and client requirements
Software Proficiency:Proficient in using industry-standard software such as Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Cinema 4D, Maya, or other animation and video editing tools
Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in motion design and animation software
Collaboration:Collaborate closely with creative directors, graphic designers, illustrators, and other team members to develop cohesive and visually appealing content
Effectively communicate ideas and concepts to team members and clients
Client Interaction:Interact with clients to understand their requirements and translate their vision into creative and visually appealing motion designs
Present and explain design concepts and ideas to clients, incorporating their feedback and revisions
Time Management:Manage multiple projects simultaneously and meet deadlines in a fast-paced and deadline-driven environment
Prioritize tasks effectively and allocate time efficiently to complete projects on time
Quality Control:Ensure the quality and consistency of motion graphics and animations by reviewing and refining designs before final delivery
Pay attention to detail, including timing, pacing, and visual elements, to create polished and professional animations
Technical Skills:Possess a strong understanding of animation principles, 3D modeling, texturing, lighting, and rendering techniques
Have knowledge of video compression, formats, and best practices for various digital platforms
Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Animation, Motion Design, Graphic Design, or related field (or equivalent work experience)
Proven experience as a Motion Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing diverse motion design projects
Excellent artistic and creative abilities, with a keen eye for design aesthetics and visual storytelling
Strong technical skills in animation software and video editing tools
Good communication and interpersonal skills to work effectively within a team and interact with clients
Ability to adapt to new techniques, software, and industry trends
Keywords: Graphics, Digital media, Visual Effects, Texturing, Maya, Conceptualization, Animation, Video editing, Manager Quality Control, Adobe After Effects

Job Title: 2D Animator (Work From Home) For YouTube Channel
Job Description:
Job description
We are seeking a talented and passionate 2D Character Animator to join our creative team. As a 2D Character Animator, you will play a crucial role in bringing our characters to life and adding depth and emotion to our animated stories. If you're an animation enthusiast with a knack for storytelling, a keen eye for detail, and a passion for creating memorable characters, we want to hear from you!
Key Responsibilities:
Character Animation: Create fluid and expressive character animations that convey emotions, movements, and actions seamlessly.
Storyboard Interpretation: Collaborate closely with the animation director and storyboard artists to understand and interpret the animation requirements of the project.
Keyframe Animation: Use your expertise in keyframe animation to create lifelike and engaging character movements.
Character Design Awareness: Pay attention to character design details and maintain character consistency throughout the animation.
Timely Delivery: Meet project deadlines and ensure the timely delivery of high-quality animation sequences.
Feedback Integration: Actively participate in feedback sessions and make necessary adjustments to animations based on feedback from the animation director and team.
Technical Proficiency: Stay up-to-date with the latest animation techniques, tools, and software to ensure the best results.
Collaborative Teamwork: Collaborate effectively with other animators, artists, and designers to ensure a cohesive animation style
Qualifications:
Proven experience as a 2D Character Animator in a professional setting.
Strong proficiency in 2D animation software (e.g., Adobe Animate, Toon Boom Harmony, etc.).
A portfolio showcasing your previous character animation work is a must.
Solid understanding of animation principles, including timing, squash and stretch, and anticipation.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Creativity and a passion for storytelling through animation.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
Ability to adapt to different animation styles as required by various projects.
Keywords: Character Animation, Adobe Animate CC, Animate CC, Adobe Animate, Flash Animation, Animation, 2D Animator, 2D Animation, Rigging, Character Rigging, Flash

Job Description:
Course Hero is an online learning platform with over 60 million course-specific study resources contributed by our community of students and educators, and produced by our team of educational content specialists in collaboration with subject experts.

We are looking for text-based tutors with specialised knowledge to join our global tutor community. As a Course Hero tutor, you will have the opportunity to positively impact student's academic success by assisting them in answering text-based questions in a specific subject. This is a remote position that provides you with the flexibility to answer questions from your device at any time and from anywhere while earning up to $1,500 per month.


Requirements:
College-level subject matter expertise in the subject.
Most recent mark sheet issued by your college. Your mark sheet must include scores of subject(s) that you're applying for.
Graduate or above.
Government-issued ID card

We are currently looking for experts in the following subjects:

a) General Business, General Management, General Economics, General Finance, Managerial Accounting, Cost Accounting, Financial Accounting, General Accounting, and Microeconomics.
Desirable Education: B.Com, M.com, BBA, MBA, M.Phil., PhD, CA, CS, MA.

b) Physics, Biology, Chemistry, Organic Chemistry, Nursing, Earth Science, Health Science.
Desirable Education: M.Sc(Physics), M.Sc. (Biology), M.Sc(Chemistry), M.Sc(Earth Science),
M.Sc(Health Science) or Ph.D

c) Calculus, Statistics & Probability, Maths
Desirable Education: Master's degree or PhD

d) Artificial Intelligence, Software Design, Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering
Desirable Education: Master's degree or PhD

e) Spanish
Desirable Education: Bachelor's or Master's degree

Job Description:
As a Video Editing Intern at Cars24, you will have the exciting opportunity to contribute to our marketing efforts by creating compelling video content. This internship is designed to provide you with practical experience in video production and editing while promoting our brand and vehicles.
Key Responsibilities:
Video Editing: Edit and assemble video footage into engaging promotional videos, ensuring they align with our brand identity and marketing goals.
Content Development: Collaborate with the marketing team to brainstorm and develop ideas for video projects, including vehicle showcases, customer testimonials, and promotional videos.
Stay Informed: Keep up with industry trends, editing techniques, and software advancements to bring fresh and innovative ideas to our marketing content.
Editing Software: Utilise industry-standard video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro) to enhance video quality.
Visual Enhancements: Add visual effects, transitions, and graphics to make videos visually appealing and informative.
Footage Management: Organise and maintain video assets, keeping track of our vehicle inventory footage, graphics, and project files.
Audio Editing: Work on sound design, including selecting background music, voiceovers, and audio improvements.
Quality Control: Review and refine videos for consistency, including color correction, audio sync, and overall visual appeal.
Feedback Integration: Collaborate with the team to gather feedback and make necessary improvements to videos.
Qualifications:
Passion for video production and editing.
Basic knowledge of video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, or similar).
Creativity and a keen eye for detail.
Strong communication and team collaboration skills.
Ability to meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
A portfolio or examples of prior video editing work (if available).
Bonus points if you can shoot videos.
Preferred Qualifications (not mandatory):
Experience with motion graphics or animation software.
Familiarity with colour correction and grading.
Knowledge of sound design and audio editing.
Enrolled in or recent graduate of a film, video production, or related degree program.
Keywords: Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Networking, Animation, Video editing, Audio editing, Manager Quality Control, Adobe After Effects, Content development, Internship

Job Title: Urgent Hiring _ Art Director Joining in 3 days
Job Description:
Roles and Responsibilities
An art director is a key creative professional who is responsible for managing the visual style and design of various projects such as advertisements, films, video games, and other media. Their primary role is to create a consistent and engaging visual style that enhances the overall message of the project. Here are some typical responsibilities and duties of an art director:
Developing the overall visual style and concept: Art directors are responsible for developing the overall visual style and concept of the project. This includes creating mood boards, sketching out ideas, and collaborating with other members of the creative team.
Supervising the design team: Art directors manage a team of designers and artists to ensure that the project meets the desired creative vision. They give direction and guidance on design elements such as typography, layout, color, and visual effects.
Managing the production process: Art directors oversee the entire production process, from pre-production to post-production, ensuring that deadlines are met and that the project stays within budget.
Collaborating with other departments: Art directors work closely with other departments such as marketing, advertising, and production to ensure that the project is aligned with the overall goals of the organization.
Staying up-to-date with industry trends: Art directors stay abreast of new trends and technologies in the field of design and advertising to ensure that the project is innovative and engaging.
Presenting ideas to clients: Art directors often present their ideas to clients and stakeholders, and must be able to effectively communicate the creative vision and rationale behind their design choices.
Ensuring quality control: Art directors are responsible for ensuring that the final product meets the high standards set by the creative team and the client. They must review and approve all final designs before they are released to the public.
Regenerate response

Desired Candidate Profile
An art director is a creative professional who plays a critical role in developing and executing visual concepts for various media projects. Here is a profile of an art director:
Education and training: An art director typically has a bachelor's degree in graphic design, fine arts, or a related field. Many art directors also have previous experience as graphic designers or other related roles. They may also have additional certifications in design software or project management.
Creative skills: Art directors have a strong background in design and possess a high level of creativity. They are able to develop unique and engaging visual concepts that align with the project's goals.
Technical skills: Art directors must have a solid understanding of design software such as Adobe Creative Suite and be able to use it to create and manipulate graphics, layouts, and typography. They must also have knowledge of web design and coding, as well as an understanding of printing processes and techniques.
Communication skills: Art directors must be effective communicators and able to articulate their vision to clients, stakeholders, and their team. They must be able to provide constructive feedback and work collaboratively with others to achieve the project's goals.

Perks and Benefits
Keywords: graphic designing, adobe creative suite, indesign, visual effects, concept art, graphics

Job Description:
Medication Review and Optimization:Review medication orders to ensure appropriateness, safety, and effectiveness of drug therapy
Identify and resolve medication-related problems, including drug interactions, contraindications, and duplications
Adjust medication regimens based on patient-specific factors, such as age, weight, renal/hepatic function, and concomitant medications
Patient Counseling:Educate patients and their caregivers about their medications, including dosage instructions, potential side effects, and precautions
Address patient concerns and provide guidance on medication adherence
Clinical Rounds and Consultations:Participate in multidisciplinary rounds with healthcare teams to discuss patient progress and medication-related issues
Collaborate with physicians, nurses, and other healthcare professionals to develop individualized treatment plans
Drug Information and Education:Stay updated on the latest drug therapies, treatment guidelines, and pharmacotherapy developments
Provide drug information to healthcare professionals and assist in evidence-based decision-making
Medication Safety and Quality Improvement:Implement medication safety initiatives to prevent medication errors and adverse drug events
Participate in quality improvement programs to enhance patient care and medication-related processes
Research and Clinical Trials:Participate in research projects and clinical trials related to medication therapies and outcomes
Regulatory Compliance:Ensure compliance with all relevant laws, regulations, and hospital policies regarding medication use and distribution
Keywords: Clinical pharmacy
