Job Description:
The Surfacing / Lookdev Supervisor is responsible for the artistic and technical quality of all textures / surfaces for the production. In this role, you will be responsible for establishing workflows, managing the Surfacing / Lookdev team, and training artists. In addition, you will collaborate with other Supervisors and Directors on the production to ensure that surfacing is passed across departments with efficiency while meeting the creative and scheduling requirements of the production.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Creates photorealistic textures, both hand-painted and from set photography to a level of detail necessary for hero CG assets
Works in collaboration with artists and supervisors in modeling, shading, and lighting during the look development process
Leads and mentors a team of artists; offer constructive and support feedback
Creates high-quality models and UVs for use in production; implement improvements/changes based on review feedback and client direction
Designs and implements high level conceptual to practical textures
Mentors, trains, and manages the Surfacing / Lookdev team both in technical and creative capacities
Leads the team to deliver the production needs on time and to the expected quality standards
Oversees the daily activities leading the department, and establishing best practice workflows and guidelines for the team
Proactively recommends ongoing pipeline improvements; Identifies potential issues and provides solutions, and escalates as needed
Maintains a positive relationship with all stakeholder departments; attend meetings as needed
Works within the defined pipeline
Ensures continuity and support other asset departments such as model, Generalists, and rigging
Works closely with management to guide artists overall professional development by providing performance feedback, mentoring, resolving performance issues and maintaining positive morale within the team
Completes assigned tasks in a timely manner
QUALIFICATIONS EXPERIENCE
Bachelors degree or equivalent experience
Minimum four (4) years of experience in visual effects for live-action feature films or television
Previous leadership experience
Hands-on experience using Mari essential, Photoshop, ZBrush, Mudbox a plus
Working knowledge of Maya necessary, 3ds Max, V-Ray, Nuke a plus
Clear understanding of color space, shading, lighting, and rendering methodologies
Familiarity with digital photography
Keywords: Photography, Supervisor, Visual Effects, Quality standards, Maya, Scheduling, Management, Photoshop, VRAY, 3DSmax

Job Description:
Under the guidance of the Global Resource Manager (GRM), the Resource Manager plays a key role in supporting and promoting resourcing practices that align with our business needs. They will guide, mentor, and share their knowledge of resource management with various departments and stakeholders.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Works collaboratively with the GRM to create, establishes, and promotes key resourcing initiatives, enabling us to scale efficiently and assign resources within scope
Focuses primarily on standardizing data and processes, as established by the GRM, to ensure clean, concise, effective, and efficient use of resourcing information
Ensures resource availability in conjunction with show production schedules, continually assessing and planning for future resource requirements
Maximizes capacity effectiveness and minimize idles, working closely with VFX Producers, Heads of Department/Division, and Central Production
Reviews proactively and understands staffing position to provide logical, meaningful insight on trends, forecast, and offer solutions to foreseen areas of concern
Runs ad hoc data scenarios to analyze potential impact on resources and finances
Attends internal meetings, assesses and understands resource implications, and briefs GRM
QUALIFICATIONS EXPERIENCE
VFX experience as a Resource Manager for a global studio
Post-secondary degree or diploma in related field
Previous VFX experience as a Production Supervisors, Department Manager, or Production Manager (asset)
Strong working knowledge of Microsoft Excel, including Vlookup, formulas, Pivot tables, Charts;
Knowledge of ShotGrid, Power Pivot, and Power BI (asset)
Working knowledge of Google workspace
Exceptional and timely communication skills
Independent, highly organized, self-managed contributions and honed risk management skills,
Strong relationship building and conflict resolution skills
Analysis-, detail-, and results-driven perspective
Ability to apply critical thinking and creative problem solving to complex challenges in a dynamic environment
Ability to gather information, connect the dots, and make quick, informed decisions
Keywords: Visual Effects, Excel, Staffing, Conflict resolution, Relationship building, VLOOKUP, Resourcing, VFX, Risk management, Resource management

Job Description:
Reporting to the Pipeline Leadership team, the Pipeline Developer supports the maintenance and ongoing improvements of the studio tools and pipeline workflow. Their perspective is customer-centric with the artist and production teams requirements in mind. Candidate focus is high-level and forward looking with a demonstrated ability to prioritize, partner and implement new and improved technologies
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Identifies and solve complex, systematic problems in the domain of the tools, plug-ins, pipeline and overall workflow improvements
Maintains and supports existing tools, troubleshoots artist tools or workflow issues and develops effective solutions
Gathers requirements across large collaboration efforts that span multiple departments and/or disciplines
Leverages current technology research and development trends to innovate and advance Scanline VFXs technologies
Writes technical briefs and user documentation
Partners with pipeline leadership team to identify and schedule tasks
Mentors other pipeline team members
QUALIFICATIONS EXPERIENCE
BA in Computer Science, or similar discipline (required)
Three (3) to five (5) years of experience in VFX, Gaming or other professional software development
Must have knowledge of Alembic and VDB read/write implementations in Max and Houdini
Python, PyQt, and HScript scripting abilities
Excellent problem-solving skills
Good interpersonal communication skills
Bash/cshell/Linux knowledge
Knowledge of render queuing software
Understanding of relational databases and/or SQL
Knowledge of Shotgun or asset management a plus
Experience with V-Ray and MAXScript is a plus
C/C++ abilities is a plus
Keywords: Visual Effects, C++, Linux, Workflow, VFX, Asset management, Gaming, SQL, Python

Job Description:
The Modeling Supervisor is responsible for the artistic and technical quality of all 3D models created for the production. In this role, you will be responsible for establishing workflows, managing the modeling team, and training artists. In addition, you will collaborate with other Supervisors and Directors on the production to ensure the modeling assets are passed across departments with efficiency while meeting the creative and scheduling requirements of the production.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Creates high-quality models and UVs for use in production; implement improvements/changes based on review feedback and Supervisor/Lead direction
Designs and implements high level conceptual to practical modeling
Mentors, trains, and manages the modeling team both in technical and creative capacities
Leads the team to deliver the production needs on time and to the expected quality standards
Oversees the daily activities leading the department, and establishing best practice workflows and guidelines for the team
Proactively recommends ongoing pipeline improvements; Identifies potential issues and provides solutions, and escalates as needed
Maintains a positive relationship with all stakeholder departments; attend meetings as needed

Ensures continuity and support other asset departments such as texture, lookdev, Generalists, and rigging
Works closely with management to guide artists overall professional development by providing performance feedback, mentoring, resolving performance issues and maintaining positive morale within the team

QUALIFICATIONS SKILLS

Minimum two (2) years in a leadership role
Expert in Maya; could teach a class on how to use it and troubleshoot
Excellent knowledge of Zbrush and/or Mudbox. Mari knowledge (a plus)
Excellent technical troubleshooting skills and problem-solving abilities.
Demonstrated ability to take a design from ambiguous to full design implementation
Strong understanding of rigging process and displacement map workflow
Experience working on creatures, Digi doubles, topology, and blend shapes (preferred)
Eye for detail and able to QA own work to ensure the highest quality before handing off assets

Team player who is able to work independently with minimal supervision

Job Description:
ReactJs Developer (Strong ReactJs, Redux, React Hooks)

Required Experience - 7yrs +
Flexible shift time
Remote work Pan India (Permanent work from Home)

Mandatory Skills - ReactJs, Redux, Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, Unit Testing

Availability time - Immediate Joiner/ not more then 30 days

Education: Minimum of 15 years of formal education - Graduate / Post Graduate in Computer Science / Information Technology.
Frontend Development:
Develop responsive and interactive web interfaces using React.js, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
Collaborate with designers and stakeholders to transform wireframes and design mockups into functional user interfaces.
Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs and implement them with a focus on performance and user experience.
React.js and Redux:
Build reusable and modular components using React.js and manage state using Redux or similar state management libraries.
Implement best practices in React.js development, including component lifecycle management, state management, and component reusability.
Optimize application performance and ensure smooth rendering of components.
Web Standards and Accessibility:
Ensure adherence to web standards and best practices for HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Develop accessible web applications that meet WCAG and ADA compliance standards.
Conduct code reviews and perform audits to identify and fix accessibility issues.
Unit Testing:
Write unit tests for React.js components using testing frameworks such as Jest, Enzyme, or React Testing Library.
Conduct unit testing to validate component behavior, edge cases, and expected outcomes.
Implement test automation and continuous integration processes to ensure code quality and stability.
Cross-Browser Compatibility:
Develop web applications that are compatible with multiple browsers and devices.
Perform cross-browser and cross-device testing to identify and fix compatibility issues.
Optimize the user experience across different screen sizes and resolutions.
Collaborative Development:
Collaborate with backend developers, designers, and other stakeholders to ensure seamless integration of frontend and backend components.
Participate in Agile development methodologies, such as Scrum or Kanban, by attending daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospective meetings.
Coordinate with the team to prioritize tasks, track progress, and meet project deadlines.
Code Optimization and Performance:
Optimize application performance by identifying and resolving bottlenecks in code, network requests, and rendering processes.
Implement code splitting, lazy loading, and caching techniques to improve application performance.
Conduct performance testing and profiling to identify areas for optimization.
Documentation and Version Control:
Maintain proper documentation of code, including code comments, API references, and user guides.
Use version control systems (such as Git) to manage code repositories and collaborate with the development team.
Ensure documentation is up to date and accessible to the team.
Location : - PAN , Uttar pradesh, Karnataka, Madhya pradesh, Haryana, Delhi Ncr, Work from Home, Asam, Maharashrta, West Bengal, Bihar,,Nagpur,Mathura,Lucknow,

Job Description:
Your primary focus will be to implement a complete user interface in the form of a mobile and desktop web app, with a focus on performance. Your main duties will include creating modules and components and coupling them together into a functional app. The artistic design will be delivered to you, together with a few HTML templates, but we will ask for your help in regard to animations, CSS, and final HTML output. You will work in a team with the back-end developer, and communicate with the API using standard methods. A thorough understanding of all of the components of our platform and infrastructure is required.
Skills and Qualifications
Proficiency with JavaScript and HTML5
Professional, precise communication skills
Deep knowledge of AngularJS practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience
Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components
Ensuring a clear dependency chain, in regard to the app logic as well as the file system
Ability to provide SEO solutions for single page apps
Extensive knowledge of CSS and JS methods for providing performant visual effects and keeping the framerate above 30fps at all times
Thorough understanding of the responsibilities of the platform, database, API, caching layer, proxies, and other web services used in the system
Validating user actions on the client side and providing responsive feedback
Writing non-blocking code, and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi-threading, when needed
Creating custom, general use modules and components which extend the elements and modules of core AngularJS
Experience with all levels of operation available to the front-end, such as from creating XHRs in vanilla JS to using a custom wrapper around $resource
Experience with building the infrastructure for serving the front-end app and assets
Architecting and automating the build process for production, using task runners or scripts
Documenting the code inline using JSDoc or other conventions
Writing extensive unit tests using automated TDD tasks
Creating e2e test suites for all components, and running them with Protractor (or a well reasoned alternative)
Creating configuration, build, and test scripts for Continuous Integration environments
Keywords: Visual Effects, continuous integration, Front end, Test scripts, TDD, Javascript, Infrastructure, HTML, SEO, angularjs

A positive, can-do attitude

The Lead Tracker will be a senior artist in their own right. In addition to working on challenging production shots, they are responsible for managing a team of artists on a show and for quality controlling the work coming into Mumbai from our partner studios overseas.

Reconstructing the placement of motion files (camera or object track) in the 3D set in order to quality control the accuracy of each track
Rendering wireframes of the scene geometry to be rendered and composited over the original plate to help judge the accuracy of each track

Learning and developing specific Framestore tools and workflows

Essential Skills:
Tracking knowledge and experience at a senior level
Ability to problem solve

Ability to lead and motivate a team including training junior artists

Job Description:
This position is for a Process Engineer in GlobalFoundr India center at Bangalore, to complement the existing module engineering teams in the USA and Germany fab locations. This pioneering role will focus on enabling the efficiency and effectiveness of the fab onsite team. The primary responsibilities of this position are to sustain the manufacturing production line, troubleshoot process and equipment signals, monitor and respond to inline/defect signals and optimize unit processes in order to meet device performance requirements for leading edge technology. Additionally, the candidate will be expected to assist in tooling qualification, transitioning processes into manufacturing, and maintaining the processes in manufacturing.
Specific Responsibilities
Utilize factory systems and automated reports to sustain the production line, monitor SPC trends, drive Cpk improvement, and troubleshoot for process and tool issues
Tool setup, qualification, and matching through standardized business processes
Improve process robustness for high volume manufacturing using statistical tools, DOE techniques, data-driven decision making, and systematic problem-solving skills. Use lean manufacturing and six sigma processes
Design, execute and analyze experiments to develop advanced processes to meet technology (e.g. performance, yield, and reliability) and manufacturing (e.g. process stability, cost of ownership) targets.
Develop procedures, specifications for tool and process operations, and provide training to the shift operations team
Support process integration and quality organizations to ensure technology meets the qualification and reliability requirements
Partner and communicate regularly with the fab engineering, technician, and management teams to drive executional excellence and business results
Perform all activities in a safe and responsible manner and support all Environmental, Health, Safety & Security requirements and programs.
Required Qualifications
B.E./B.Tech. or M.Sc./ M.Tech. with 0-4 years of relevant experience in Electrical (Microelectronics)/ Electronics Engineering, Materials Science, Physics or Chemistry
Experience in high volume manufacturing preferably in semiconductors/ electronics industry in process module/ equipment (200mm/ 300mm) are strongly desired
A strong working knowledge of Statistical Process Control (SPC), Structured Problem Solving (SPS) skills and Failure Mode & Effect Analytical (FMEA) methods would be essential
Good understanding of basic concepts in Physics, Chemistry, Electronics and preferably Semiconductor processing and technology
Excellent verbal and written English communication skills
Strong team player with the ability to work well within a global team
Organized with a high attention to detail and on-time delivery of work assigned
Good knowledge of MS Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint)
Keywords: Fabrication, process integration, Lean manufacturing, Analytical, Manager Technology, Design development, Semiconductor manufacturing, Continuous improvement, MS Office Word, Six sigma

Job Description:
We are looking for an AngularJS Developer responsible for the client side of our service. Your primary focus will be to implement a complete user interface in the form of a mobile and desktop web app, with a focus on performance. Your main duties will include creating modules and components and coupling them together into a functional app. The artistic design will be delivered to you, together with a few HTML templates, but we will ask for your help in regard to animations, CSS, and final HTML output. You will work in a team with the back-end developer, and communicate with the API using standard methods. A thorough understanding of all of the components of our platform and infrastructure is required.
Roles and Responsibilities
Delivering a complete front end application
Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop
Writing tested, idiomatic, and documented JavaScript, HTML and CSS
Coordinating the workflow between the graphic designer, the HTML coder, and yourself
Cooperating with the back-end developer in the process of building the RESTful API
Communicating with external web services
Knowledge and Skills
Proficiency with JavaScript and HTML5
Professional, precise communication skills
Deep knowledge of AngularJS practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience
Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components
Ensuring a clear dependency chain, in regard to the app logic as well as the file system
Ability to provide SEO solutions for single-page apps
Extensive knowledge of CSS and JS methods for providing performant visual effects and keeping the framerate above 30fps at all times
Thorough understanding of the responsibilities of the platform, database, API, caching layer, proxies, and other web services used in the system
Validating user actions on the client-side and providing responsive feedback
Writing non-blocking code, and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi-threading, when needed
Creating custom, general use modules and components which extend the elements and modules of core AngularJS
Experience with all levels of operation available to the front-end, such as from creating XHRs in vanilla JS to using a custom wrapper around $resource
Experience with building the infrastructure for serving the front-end app and assets
Architecting and automating the build process for production, using task runners or scripts
Documenting the code inline using JSDoc or other conventions
Writing extensive unit tests using automated TDD tasks
Creating e2e test suites for all components, and running them with Protractor (or a well-reasoned alternative)
Creating configuration, build, and test scripts for Continuous Integration environments
Keywords: Visual Effects, Backend, Front end, Web services, Test scripts, TDD, Javascript, Workflow, HTML, SEO

Job Description:
Help identify and drive Speed, Performance, Scalability, and Reliability related optimization based on experience and learnings from the production incidents.
Work in an agile DevSecOps environment in creating, maintaining, monitoring, and automation of the overall solution-deployment.
Understand and explain the effect of product architecture decisions on systems. Identify issues and/or opportunities for improvements that are common across multiple services/teams.
This role will require weekend deployments
Skills And Qualifications:
3+ years of experience in a DevOps end-to-end development process with heavy focus on service monitoring and site reliability engineering work.
Advanced knowledge of programming/scripting languages (Bash, PERL, Python, Node.js).
Experience in Agile/SCRUM enterprise-scale software development including working with GiT, JIRA, Confluence, etc.
Advance experience with core microservice technology (RESTFul development).
Working knowledge of using Advance AI/ML tools are pluses.
Working knowledge in the one or more of the Cloud Services: Amazon AWS, Microsoft Azure
Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or equivalent related field experience
Key Behaviours / Attitudes:
Professional curiosity and a desire to a develop deep understanding of services and technologies.
Experience building running systems to drive high availability, performance and operational improvements
Excellent written oral communication skills; to ask pertinent questions, and to assess/aggregate/report the responses.
Ability to quickly grasp and analyze complex and rapidly changing systemsSoft skills
Self-motivated and self-managing.
Excellent communication / follow-up / time management skills.
Ability to fulfill role/duties independently within defined policies and procedures
Ability to balance multi-task and multiple priorities while maintaining a high level of customer satisfaction is key.
Be able to work in an interrupt-driven environment.Work with Dori Ai world class technology to develop, implement, and support Dori's global infrastructure.
As a member of the IT organization, assist with the analyze of existing complex programs and formulate logic for new complex internal systems. Prepare flowcharting, perform coding, and test/debug programs. Develop conversion and system implementation plans. Recommend changes to development, maintenance, and system standards.
Leading contributor individually and as a team member, providing direction and mentoring to others. Work is non-routine and very complex, involving the application of advanced technical/business skills in a specialized area. BS or equivalent experience in programming on enterprise or department servers or systems.
Skills:- DevOps, PyTorch, Bash, Perl and Python

Job Description:

Python & Django (we are open to other languages, with a drive to learn Python)
REST APIs.
Event-based communication.
Microservices.

Youll become part of a diverse team that's globally distributed. We are a business that's been built in the post-pandemic era, each employee given flexibility to create and build in their space.
We are meritocratic and believe in the potential of our employees, we look to go further each time and develop as a team.
Annual Bonus
25 days leave.
Health Insurance.
Office Macbook.
Fully remote and flexible working.
Annual L&D support.

Drug Information: Stay updated with the latest drug information, including new medications, dosage forms, and potential drug interactions.
Provide evidence-based information to other healthcare professionals and patients.Pharmacy Operations: Oversee pharmacy operations, ensuring the accurate and timely dispensing of medications, proper inventory management, and compliance with regulatory requirements.Compounding Medications: In some settings, pharmacists may be involved in preparing customized medications, especially in hospital or specialty pharmacy settings.

Provide evidence-based information to other healthcare professionals and patients
Pharmacy Operations: Oversee pharmacy operations, ensuring the accurate and timely dispensing of medications, proper inventory management, and compliance with regulatory requirements
Compounding Medications: In some settings, pharmacists may be involved in preparing customized medications, especially in hospital or specialty pharmacy settings
Keywords: SIDE, Compliance, Inventory management, Healthcare, Counselling

Job Description:
Description

JD - DFX Supervisor

Position Title - DFX Supervisor

Reporting Manager - Merzin Tavaria

Role Summary

The Digital Effects (DFX) Supervisor ensures all VFX departments in all company locations working on a project collaborate effectively to deliver the creative vision of the Show and create the highest quality of work on time, on budget, and in a sustainable way. S/ he will oversee a team of department supervisors working with artists as they produce CG assets, set up a working shot pipeline, and successfully deliver CG elements and imagery for the shots on the project. S/ he will be expected to creatively lead their team throughout the show, working with the department supervisors to ensure creative direction is being followed and milestones are being reached. They will help to ensure that good and clear communication occurs at all times between the VFX Supervisor, artists, production team, and department supervisors. They will contribute to the bidding and planning of milestones and approaches for the project, and proactively provide feedback on crew and the pipeline.

Creative and Technical Responsibilities:

Deliver creative realization to the VFX Supervisor and ensuring creative continuity across a Show/ s

Interpreting the creative vision of the VFX Supervisor and providing a clear, consistent, creative brief to the Leads and Artists.

Supporting the use of consistent, global department workflows and processes as well as design more effective workflows.

Provide concise and constructive feedback and ensuring the Artists are directed to reach milestones & show targets.

Deliver highest quality work out of dailies to the VFX Supervisor and build strategies to improve operational efficiency on an ongoing basis like design of more effective training, tracking progress and reporting across all the teams.

Approving work that is ready to progress to the next department.

Ensuring work is delivered according to the Show schedule.

Communicating with all departments to manage dependencies.

Explain the work and requirements of their show to the HoDs to ensure they can provide the best possible team for the work.

Day-to-day oversight of the Show supervision team.

Resolving conflicts of workflow approach between the teams / the shows

Must Have

At least 10 years VFX post-production experience

Previous experience as a CG or Comp Supervisor, Senior Department Supervisor or Sequence Supervisor on a minimum of 3-5 high-end feature films

Excellent creative eye and aesthetic judgment

Ability to sell creative solutions and ideas to clients and VFX Supervisors

Ability to reduce complex problems to their most simple solutions

Thorough understanding of the complete VFX pipeline

Ability to meet deadlines under pressure

Expert in Maya, Nuke, Houdini and/ or Clarisse, and proficient in other industry standard software

About You

Proven team leader with strong motivational and initiative qualities.

Excellent communicator and collaborator.

Recognized attention to detail and organizational skills.

Technically and creatively astute.

About Us

We are DNEG, one of the world's leading visual effects, animation and stereo conversion companies for feature film and television, with studios in London, Vancouver, Mumbai, Los Angeles, Chennai, Montr al, Chandigarh, Hyderabad and Goa.
Keywords: Post production, Supervisor, Visual Effects, Creative direction, Department Supervisor, DFX, Maya, Animation, VFX, Operations

AUTOSAR, Communication, MCAL, RTE

Essential Skills
Engineering or Post Graduate Engineering degree in Electronics or Electrical Engineering
5 to 7 years of relevant experience in Automotive domain

Experience in AUTOSAR architecture

Tessy
Polyspace

What We Offer

Exciting Projects: We focus on industries like High-Tech, communication, media, healthcare, retail and telecom. Our customer list is full of fantastic global brands and leaders who love what we build for them.

Collaborative Environment: You Can expand your skills by collaborating with a diverse team of highly talented people in an open, laidback environment - or even abroad in one of our global centers or client facilities!

Work-Life Balance: GlobalLogic prioritizes work-life balance, which is why we offer flexible work schedules, opportunities to work from home, and paid time off and holidays.

Professional Development: Our dedicated Learning & Development team regularly organizes Communication skills training(GL Vantage, Toast Master),Stress Management program, professional certifications, and technical and soft skill trainings.

Excellent Benefits: We provide our employees with competitive salaries, family medical insurance, Group Term Life Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance , NPS(National Pension Scheme ), Periodic health awareness program, extended maternity leave, annual performance bonuses, and referral bonuses.

Fun Perks: We want you to love where you work, which is why we host sports events, cultural activities, offer food on subsidies rates, Corporate parties. Our vibrant offices also include dedicated GL Zones, rooftop decks and GL Club where you can drink coffee or tea with your colleagues over a game of table and offer discounts for popular stores and restaurants

Job Description:
The Lighting Technical Supervisor provides leadership and supervision to the technical aspects within the local and global VFX Lighting department. This is a department-facing role involved with both maintaining our current systems and spearheading the development of new technology solutions for practical applications in day to day shot work.
This role requires interaction and coordination with multiple stakeholders both within the VFX lighting department as well as to other departments within DNEG.

Key Responsibilities
Works with the HOD to create a long term vision for the tools and workflows.
Collaborate with workflow architects and software development teams to manage priorities, guide, support and test the development of these tools.
Works with PipeTDs, Render Supes and the VFX Lighting Department team to maintain our existing tools and setups.

Opportunity with HARMAN India for Director - Test & Validation : 20+ yrs Work Location ÃÂÃÂ Bangalore.
Job Description
About the Role
The automotive industry is transforming to a market that requires continuously high-quality upgrades of SW throughout the lifetime of a car. Fully automated test and integration cycles are crucial for success. HARMAN is leading this transformation with its Ready Upgrade product family.
We are searching for a Director of Integration, Test & Validation for our Ready Upgrade product. In this role you will be responsible for leading a team that is defining and implementing the overall test integration and release strategy for the complete product family. This includes analysis of requirements, architecture and design and transfer into efficient test case implementation and execution through automation within CI/CD (Continuous Integration and Delivery) frameworks, utilizing state of the art test tools, simulation, HW in the loop as well as cloud native test approaches. You will be responsible for the integration and release cadence according to agile CI/CD principles. This role will have direct responsibility to drive strategy and execution.
The person who will be most successful in this position has a passion for test automation and efficient, fast test execution to ensure high quality products. Ideally you have been working already in a large CI/CD driven software organization that delivered multiple products variants out of a common set of IP repositories according to the practices of Software Product Line Engineering.
Your team
This role requires visionary leadership as well as individual contribution at technical level. You are building up a brand-new team within a newly created organization.
What You Will Do
ÃÂÃÂ Provide Technical leadership for the test and integration team.
ÃÂÃÂ Responsible for the E2E product test and release strategy, from product design and architecture to qualification, certification, and releasing.
ÃÂÃÂ Responsible for test environment, test topology, test design, test execution and test tools.
ÃÂÃÂ Define and implement a Product Line strategy that covers a product family of 3 different type of Cockpit domain controllers with different ECUs. Each of the product tiers scales to multiple customers. Ensure all product variation are covered in test execution to avoid regressions and ensure a high re-use across product lines.
ÃÂÃÂ Define test strategy for embedded software as well as for desktop and cloud-based SW tools.
ÃÂÃÂ Define acceptance test for suppliers (internally and externally delivering into the product family (>10).
ÃÂÃÂ Ensure Functional Safety and Cyber security testing according to relevant standards.
ÃÂÃÂ Analyze technical requirements and create automated test cases to ensure full coverage and fast execution speed.
ÃÂÃÂ Responsible for push the boundaries and staidly strive for full test automation as well as full coverage with complete tractability.
ÃÂÃÂ Responsible for driving the team towards the ideal Test Pyramid (UT, IT, FT, Non Functional Test) and the different types of testing
ÃÂÃÂ Define test environment by virtuously combining simulation and emulation with HW in the loop, unit and component test frameworks.
ÃÂÃÂ Responsible for the quality of the test automation scripts /code through effective code review practices and peer review. Constantly drive minimizing the number of false positives.
ÃÂÃÂ Responsible for ensuring the test cases are integrated into the various stages of the build and release pipeline as part of continuous integration and continuous delivery framework.
ÃÂÃÂ Responsible for defining and implementing effective test execution strategy and exit criteria.
ÃÂÃÂ Alignment with the development teams in India, US, Germany, China and Romania.
ÃÂÃÂ Definition of KPIs, respective measurement and Dashboard and continuous improvement to improve quality and efficiency. This includes metrics like test coverage, quality and maturity level, escape analysis and more.
What You Need
ÃÂÃÂ 5+ years of experience leading large engineering/software development organizations.
ÃÂÃÂ BachelorÃÂÃÂs Degree or higher in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or equivalent.
ÃÂÃÂ Strong domain knowledge on Android, Linux, BSP, Automotive Safety and Security, virtualization and containerization technics.
ÃÂÃÂ Proven ability to coach technical leaders.
ÃÂÃÂ Good problem solving, organizational effectiveness, interpersonal, and communication skills.
ÃÂÃÂ Experience delivering complex Software product in fast cycles and high quality.
ÃÂÃÂ 15+ years related technical experience.
ÃÂÃÂ 6-8 years of experience in Software Test in a large CI/CD driven organization
ÃÂÃÂ Good experience in Git, Gerrit and Jenkins
ÃÂÃÂ Understanding of system level debugging approaches
What Makes You Eligible
ÃÂÃÂ Be willing to travel up to 10%, domestic and international travel.
ÃÂÃÂ Proven record of experience in leadership of development teams > 50 employees
ÃÂÃÂ Experience in test methodologies, tools and methods
ÃÂÃÂ Expertise in working with distributed development teams
ÃÂÃÂ Business fluent in English
What We Offer
ÃÂÃÂ Flexible work environment, allowing for full-time remote work globally for positions that can be performed outside a HARMAN or customer location
ÃÂÃÂ Access to employee discounts on world-class Harman and Samsung products (JBL, HARMAN Kardon, AKG, etc.)
ÃÂÃÂ Extensive training opportunities through our own HARMAN University
ÃÂÃÂ Competitive wellness benefits
ÃÂÃÂ Tuition Reimbursement
ÃÂÃÂ Access to HARMAN Campus Fitness Center and Cafeteria

About HARMAN International
HARMAN (harman.com) designs and engineers connected products and solutions for automakers, consumers, and enterprises worldwide, including connected car systems, audio and visual products, enterprise automation solutions; and services supporting the Internet of Things. With leading brands including AKGÃÂÃÂ®, Harman KardonÃÂÃÂ®, InfinityÃÂÃÂ®, JBLÃÂÃÂ®, LexiconÃÂÃÂ®, Mark LevinsonÃÂÃÂ® and RevelÃÂÃÂ®, HARMAN is admired by audiophiles, musicians and the entertainment venues where they perform around the world. More than 25 million automobiles on the road today are equipped with HARMAN audio and connected car systems. Our software services power billions of mobile devices and systems that are connected, integrated and secure across all platforms, from work and home to car and mobile. HARMAN has a workforce of approximately 30,000 people across the Americas, Europe, and Asia. In March 2017, HARMAN became a wholly-owned subsidiary of Samsung Electronics. HARMAN is an Equal Opportunity /Affirmative Action employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or Protected Veterans status. Job Description:
A video editor plays a crucial role in shaping visual content, be it for film, television, online platforms, or marketing materials
Their responsibilities are diverse and require a blend of technical and creative skills
Here are the key roles and responsibilities of a video editor:
Footage Selection: Review and select the best footage from raw materials, ensuring it aligns with the projects objectives and vision.
Editing: Use video editing software to arrange and modify video clips, making cuts, transitions, and special effects to create a coherent and engaging narrative.
Sound Editing: Edit and enhance audio elements, including background music, sound effects, and dialogue, to ensure high-quality sound.
Color Correction and Grading: Adjust the color and tone of footage to maintain visual consistency and create a specific mood or style.
Sequencing: Arrange video segments in a logical and visually appealing order to tell a story or convey a message effectively.
Transitions: Add transitions, animations, and special effects to enhance visual storytelling and maintain audience engagement.
Text and Graphics: Incorporate text, titles, graphics, and subtitles to provide information, context, and branding within the video.
Voiceover Integration: If required, sync and integrate voiceovers or narrations with the video content.
File Management: Organize and manage video files, ensuring efficient storage and retrieval of assets.
Collaboration: Work closely with directors, producers, and other team members to understand project goals and make necessary edits.
Quality Control: Review the final product for quality and consistency, making adjustments as needed.
Version Control: Maintain different versions or edits of the same project to meet various requirements or client feedback.
Deadlines: Adhere to project timelines and meet production schedules for timely delivery.
Client Interaction: Communicate with clients to understand their expectations, receive feedback, and make necessary revisions.
Stay Updated: Keep up-to-date with the latest video editing software and techniques to continuously improve skills and workflow efficiency.
Problem Solving: Address technical issues and challenges during the editing process to ensure smooth project completion.
Creativity: Infuse creativity and artistic flair to bring out the desired emotions and messages in the video content.
Adaptability: Be flexible and adaptable in accommodating client preferences and project-specific requirements.
A skilled video editor plays a vital role in the post-production process, contributing to the creation of visually appealing and impactful video content across various media platforms
Keywords: Graphics, Post production, Version control, Video Editor, Sound editing, Video editing, Client interaction, Manager Quality Control, Management

Job Description:
Job Description
We are looking for an AngularJS Developer responsible for the client side of our service. Your primary focus will be to implement a complete user interface in the form of a mobile and desktop web app, with a focus on performance. Your main duties will include creating modules and components and coupling them together into a functional app. The artistic design will be delivered to you, together with a few HTML templates, but we will ask for your help in regard to animations, CSS, and final HTML output. You will work in a team with the back-end developer, and communicate with the API using standard methods. A thorough understanding of all of the components of our platform and infrastructure is required.
Responsibilities
Delivering a complete front end application
Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop
Writing tested, idiomatic, and documented JavaScript, HTML and CSS
Coordinating the workflow between the graphic designer, the HTML coder, and yourself
Cooperating with the back-end developer in the process of building the RESTful API
Communicating with external web services
Skills and Qualifications
Proficiency with JavaScript and HTML5
Professional, precise communication skills
Deep knowledge of AngularJS practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience
Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules and components
Ensuring a clear dependency chain, in regard to the app logic as well as the file system
Ability to provide SEO solutions for single page apps
Extensive knowledge of CSS and JS methods for providing performant visual effects and keeping the framerate above 30fps at all times
Thorough understanding of the responsibilities of the platform, database, API, caching layer, proxies, and other web services used in the system
Validating user actions on the client-side and providing responsive feedback
Writing non-blocking code, and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi-threading, when needed
Creating custom, general use modules and components which extend the elements and modules of core AngularJS
Experience with all levels of operation available to the front-end, such as from creating XHRs in vanilla JS to using a custom wrapper around $resource
Experience with building the infrastructure for serving the front-end app and assets
Architecting and automating the build process for production, using task runners or scripts
Documenting the code inline using JSDoc or other conventions
Writing extensive unit tests using automated TDD tasks
Creating e2e test suites for all components, and running them with Protractor (or a well-reasoned alternative)
Creating configuration, build, and test scripts for Continuous Integration environments
Keywords: Visual Effects, Backend, Front end, Web services, Test scripts, TDD, Javascript, Workflow, HTML, SEO

Job Description:

Job Description:
To manage and translate complex business requirements into streamlined ERP solutions.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document complex business requirements, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of project needs.
Utilize relevant Business Process Modeling tools and the MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Project, PowerPoint, Visio) to visually map out and communicate business processes and requirements effectively.
Perform detailed feasibility and gap analyses to identify areas where existing processes or functionalities fall short, and propose solutions to bridge those gaps.
Work closely with the project management team to scope projects, prioritize deliverables, and negotiate on product functionalities to align with business objectives.
Facilitate the transfer of requirements knowledge to development, maintenance, and testing teams, ensuring accurate implementation and testing of solutions.
Own and maintain essential SDLC artifacts including Business Requirements Documents (BRD), System Requirements Specifications (SRS), User Stories, Use Cases, User Manuals, and similar documents.
Design and validate functional workflows that translate complex business processes into streamlined ERP functionalities.
Develop User Acceptance Testing (UAT) test cases to ensure that the ERP solution aligns with business needs and performs as expected.
Continuously track and update requirement changes from initial proposal to final requirements specification, maintaining clear traceability.
Manage requirement changes, ensuring proper documentation and communication to all stakeholders to prevent any disruptions.
Verify and validate the ERP product against specified requirements to ensure it meets quality standards and functional expectations.
Collaborate with teams to perform impact analysis for changes that occur after requirements baselining, evaluating potential effects on project scope and timelines.
Review and provide feedback on functional documents, test plans, and test cases produced by external teams.
Perform basic SQL querying to retrieve and manipulate data as necessary and appreciate the intricacies of database design.
Participate actively in Integration Testing, User Acceptance Testing, and Functionality Testing to ensure the ERP solutions reliability and performance.
Act as a bridge between end-users and technical teams, facilitating effective communication and mutual understanding.
Apply knowledge of Agile and traditional waterfall methodologies, adapting to the projects specific approach as needed.
Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and consolidate requirements into a centralized repository for effective tracking and change management.
Participate in business case analysis and ROI evaluations related to the ERP project, contributing insights into the potential financial impact
Technical Competencies (Add- on Advantage)
Proficiency in Microsoft Dynamics 365 AL and C/side, with an advantageous understanding of Dynamics 365 Business Central
Strong experience working with MS SQL, including database design, querying, and optimization
Demonstrated expertise in one or more programming languages:
o JAVA
o .NET
o Python
o PHP
Knowledge of key functional areas: Financial Accounting, Sales and Distribution, Manufacturing (Discreet and Process)
Familiarity with Microsoft Cloud and Power Platform, including Azure development and services
Experience with D365 Project Service Automation, enhancing CRM integration with external systems
Proficient in creating custom Web APIs using .NET and developing Reports and Dashboards using Power BI
Skilled in applying customization through Flows and Plugins in .NET for tailored solutions
Proficient in Power BI reports, Actions, and Business rules to optimize system performance
Understanding of Azure integration and ability to create custom Web APIs using .NET
Exposure to Field Services Resource Scheduling Optimization (RSO) for efficient resource management
Proven track record in developing business applications that drive process efficiency and innovation
NeST Principles
Deliver Results
Build Trust and Show integrity
Collaborate
Own
Dive Deep
Raise standard
Keywords: ERP, Automation, MS SQL, Manual testing, Project management, PHP, microsoft, SDLC, CRM, Python

Job Description:
Job Function:
0 to 2 years of experience in Retail Supply Chain - planning and allocation, merchandising planning, inventory management and forecasting
Communicates with various levels of management including Planning and Allocation business analyst, senior analysts, inventory planners and assistant buyers
Allocation Responsibilities
Responsible to ensure allocation objectives are met and to ensure proper execution of all allocations.
Drives pre-season and post-season analysis and reviews to uncover opportunities and risks across classes.
Develops recommendations for in-season changes and pre-season assortment plans and flow to ensure maximization of objectives.
Responsible for hindsight review from previous seasons and plan for future seasons with analysis and recommendations
Replenishment Responsibilities -
Owns dynamic forecast and coverage policies for basic items at the store/SKU level within the DCM (Demand Chain Management) tool.
Manage system setup/maintenance pertaining to sales forecasting, store profiles, trending, location/product attributes and promotional activity.
Sales Forecasting Stores/Ecom:
o Review F/C accuracy report for lots outside acceptable tolerance
Provide analysis for out of tolerance lots to determine root cause
Validate DCM annual estimate or determine if sales curve is incorrect
Provide recommendations for necessary adjustments
Store Profiles (IPC) Stores/Ecom:
o Provide strategies for lot grouping based on merchandise expertise
Understand selling patterns by fabrication, size and silhouette
Consult with Buyer/AB for additional insight
o Complete pre-analysis using Micro Strategy (Oracle BI) and IPC Graphing Tool
Validate lot groupings before running IPC sessions
o Set up and run IPC sessions
Minimum 2 times each year to bring in calendar event shifts
As needed for lot numbers with forecast issues
Automate sessions after approval from Plano
Trending:
o Understand and communicate outside events affecting trend
Including; non-comp Marketing, cannibalization, store base changes etc
o Prepare analysis on current item trend
Color and size level
Location and demographic
Provide actionable data including Location/SKU attributes
Location/Product Attributes:
o Understand all location/SKU attributes that need to be maintained and kept up to date
Reviews annual Store Grade changes that effect attributes
Communicates actions needed to maintain attribute integrity
o Creates and updates location/SKU attributes
As needed for analysis, reports and recommendations to be actionable
When store grading has changed
Promotional Activity:
o Create Promotion Policies as needed for non-comp Marketing events
Drives a periodic assortment and SKU optimization process and partners with MAT to execute
basic assortment plans based upon Buyer s intent.
o Present opportunities to optimize the assortment to the Business Units
o Validate all stores/SKUs are set to Buyers intent
o Complete SKU optimization template for Plano review
Provide call outs for opportunities to expand or reduce assortment
Quantify potential risk to sales
o Perform PDL maintenance in the DCM system to activate or deactivate due to:
Seasonal/annual store grade changes
Assortment optimization decisions
o Quantify receipt impact for new items and flows
o Quantify receipt needs for proposed assortment rollouts and expansions
Coordinates with JCP Production Forecasting team to manage projections given to direct suppliers.
Communicates and coordinates with the Business Units on projected receipt forecasts for open-to-buy management.
o Collaborate with MAT on placeholders needed in RFR and Shopping Lists
Review basic IPs as needed
o Updates IPs
o Validate DCM forecast
Communicates and coordinates with all domestic replenishment vendors regarding forecast impacts, production needs and fill rate issues.
o Communicate with all Suppliers
Forecast changes
Fill Rate and In Stock levels
o Conduct monthly meetings with all Suppliers at HO
o Provide necessary analysis
Meet established performance standards for the role consistently, including (but not limited to) sales, in stocks/customer service, profit, inventory turn, productivity and attendance.
Skillsets:
Critical thinking, Problem Solving Decision-making
Business planning, Reporting and analysis, Allocation, Planning, Buying, Merchandising, Inventory Control and Supply Chain knowledge
Proficiency in DCM/JDA/EFAs or other planning and allocation operating system
Experience with Oracle Planning Reporting tools a plus
Proficiency in intermediate excel

Job Description:
This position is for Principal Process Integration Engineer in GLOBALFOUNDRIES India center at Bangalore , supporting 200 and 300mm wafer fabs in US, Singapore, and Germany. The candidate will be responsible for electrical characterization, yield analysis, and production lots disposition to drive product and line yield and support various and manufacturing operations.
Specific Responsibilities
Monitor electrical performance t r ends, disposition of holds at electrical and sort test, support general/urgent fab operational issues, scrap investigation and analysis for process change review boards
Candidate will drive yield improvement activities for multiple products by analyzing failing electrical parameters and perform effective data mining to find the root cause .
Develop and improve yield characterization and data analysis methodologies to rapidly determine yield limiters, correlation to in-line defectivity and metrology, and electrical parametric signals
Support process module engineering activities through electrical test, inline metrology, and yield analysis to improve cost, cycle-time, and manufacturing robustness .
L iaise with Customer Engineers to resolve customers technical & yield concerns and meet the requirements.
Run DOE to optimize process margins and deter mi ne process & ET specifications
Monitor OOC, maintain good CPK for ET and monitor inline SPC parameters
Clear reporting and communication of issues to home teams on a daily basis
Must be flexible in job assignment and ready to work on weekend shifts on a rotational basis as required by the business
Required Qualifications
MS/ M.Tech . or PhD with 0-4 years of relevant experience in Electrical (Microelectronics)/ Electronics Engineering or Applied Physics
Experience in high volume manufacturing preferably in semiconductors/ electronics industry in process module/ equipment ( 200mm / 300mm) are strongly desired
A strong working knowledge of Statistical Process Control (SPC), Structured Problem Solving (SPS) skills and Failure Mode & Effect Analytical (FMEA) methods would be essential
Good understanding of semiconductor process technology and devices
Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work effectively within a globally matrixed team or environment
Organized, proactive, excellent analytical skills, on-time delivery of work assigned, and good verbal and written communication
Good knowledge of MS Office (Word, Excel and PowerPoint)
Scripting and coding skills (especially R and Python) are desirable
Keywords: Fabrication, Data analysis, process integration, Coding, Metrology, Data mining, Operations, MS Office Word, Electricals, Python

You will work with various departments and report to the Head of Business Development.
The successful applicant will be resourceful, organized and motivated to increase sales, enhance the companys reputation, and look for new and creative ways to market our products. A background in sales or marketing is strongly desirable.

Company Name: Z2plus Placement & Security Agency Pvt. Ltd.
Job Description:
A Pharmacist is a healthcare professional who is responsible for dispensing prescription medications to patients, as well as providing advice on the safe and effective use of drugs
They work in various healthcare settings, including community pharmacies, hospitals, and other healthcare facilities
Their key responsibilities include filling prescriptions, verifying dosages, and ensuring that medications are safe and appropriate for patients
They also provide advice and counseling to patients on the proper use of medications, potential side effects, and interactions with other drugs or health conditions
In addition, pharmacists may provide immunizations, health screenings, and other preventive healthcare services
They also play a key role in medication management and drug therapy, working closely with physicians and other healthcare professionals to ensure that patients receive the best possible care
Key skills for a Pharmacist include strong attention to detail, excellent communication and interpersonal skills, as well as a thorough understanding of drug interactions, dosages, and pharmacology
Keywords: QC, Pharmacy

Job Description:
Responsibilities:
1. Design , Develop and Deliver a complete front end application.
2. Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop.
3. Writing tested , idiomatic , and documented JavaScript , HTML and CSS / SASS / LESS.
4. Coordinating the workflow between the graphic designer , the HTML coder , and yourself.
5. Cooperating with the back - end developer in the process of building the RESTful API.
6. Implementation of a robust set of services and APIs to power the web application.
7. Building reusable code and libraries for future use.
8. Optimization of the application for maximum speed and scalability.
9. Implementation of security and data protection.
10. Translation of UI / UX wireframes to visual elements.
11. Integration of the front - end and back - end aspects of the web application.
Skills / Experience:
1. Proficiency with JavaScript and HTML5.
2. Professional , precise communication skills.
3. Deep knowledge of AngularJS / ReactJS practices and commonly used modules based on extensive work experience.
4. Exposure to Angular2 or Angular 4 is preferred.
5. Creating self - contained , reusable , and testable modules and components.
6. Ensuring a clear dependency chain , in regard to the app logic as well as the file system.
7. Ability to provide SEO solutions for single page apps.
8. Extensive knowledge of CSS and JS methods for providing performant visual effects and keeping the frame - rate above 30fps at all times.
9. Thorough understanding of the responsibilities of the platform , database , API , caching layer , proxies , and other web services used in the system.
10. Validating user actions on the client side and providing responsive feedback.
11. Writing non - blocking code , and resorting to advanced techniques such as multi - threading , when needed.
13. Creating custom , general use modules and components which extend the elements and modules of core AngularJS.
14. Experience with all levels of operation available to the front - end , such as from creating XHRs in vanilla JS to using a custom wrapper around resource.
15. Experience with building the infrastructure for serving the front - end app and assets.
16. Architecting and automating the build process for production , using task runners or scripts.
17. Documenting the code inline using JSDoc or other conventions.
18. Writing extensive unit tests using automated TDD tasks.
19. Creating e2e test suites for all components , and running them with Protractor (or a well - reasoned alternative).
20. Creating configuration , build , and test scripts for Continuous Integration environments.
Keywords: Visual Effects, Front end, UX, Web services, Test scripts, HP data protector, TDD, Workflow, HTML, SEO

Job Description:
Patient Care: Providing hands-on care to patients, including administering medications, performing medical procedures, dressing wounds, and assisting with daily activities
Monitoring Patients: Monitoring and assessing patients' vital signs, symptoms, and overall health condition to detect any changes or signs of improvement
Medical Records: Documenting patient care and treatment plans accurately and maintaining up-to-date medical records
Patient Education: Educating patients and their families about their medical conditions, treatment plans, and preventive measures
Medication Management: Administering medications as prescribed, monitoring their effects, and educating patients about medication usage and potential side effects
Infection Control: Implementing infection control practices and ensuring a safe and sterile environment for patients
Keywords: Nursing, Staff Nurse

Job Description:
Responsible for investigation of all non-conformance reports and all responses using proven problem-solving methodology to complete the non-conformance design assessment and disposition.
Interact with Core Design team to understand design intent, form, fit and functional requirements.
Participate in DFM discussions with manufacturing to understand the requirements and optimize the design for manufacturability.
Perform stack-up analysis, and apply appropriate GD&T practices in models/drawings,
Represent the design team in CFT meetings on the non-conformance assessment and disposition.
Required Skills (Technical Competency):
Sound knowledge on design fundamentals and hand calculations
Hands on experience working on nonconformance assessments and Stress analysis using FEA, Producibility activities like nonconformance reduction process improvement, zero defect activities, concession review.
Demonstrated experience applying engineering concepts such as heat transfer, stress and strain.
Demonstrated experience in material selection, and manufacturing processes is expected.
Hands on experience on design, development, and implementation of aero engine components
Should be familiar with stress and Thermal load calculations and analysis.
GD&T and tolerance stacks, NX SIM (Finite Element Analysis) and ANSYS Workbench
Ability to analyze shop floor data in the form of various RFT data, RAG charts, six pack analysis reports and suggest process improvements and fool proof methods for non-conformance reduction.
Awareness of new product introduction process.
Ability to read and understand specifications and standards.
Ability to integrate the various BiQ tools with other processes such as Design for Manufacture (DFM) and Design Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (DFMEA)
Knowledge of design & developing 3D models and 2D drawings in NX or any CAD packages for components and assemblies.
Use of appropriate ISO, ASME and British standards as per applicable for creating parametric 3D and 2D models and update the models as per the evolution of design.
Good knowledge on various manufacturing processes
Proficient in 3D Modelling, assembly and detailing using NX or any CAD packages & PLM, PDM.
Fully conversant in reading and understanding Engineering & Manufacturing Drawings
Sound knowledge interpreting the GD&T (standards ASME Y 14.5, JES 161)
Desired Skills:
Masters/BE in Mechanical
Proficient in 3D Modelling, assembly and detailing using NX or any CAD packages & PLM, PDM.
MS Office tools: MS Excel, MS Word, MS PowerPoint, MS Project.
Product Lifecycle Management
Proactive approach to work in a fast-paced environment
Customer Focus
Problem Solving Ability
Good Communication in English (oral & written)
Team Player
Self-Motivated & a Self-Starter
Good Communication and interpersonal skills
Excellent writing and speaking skills in English Languages
Proactive approach and work in a fast-paced environment
Ability to build and develop Customer & Supplier relationships.
Open Minded and logical thinking
Can Do and Can Get it Done Attitude
See failures and frustration as an opportunity to improve.
To interact with customers to understand the requirements.
Keywords: PLM, Engineering services, ISO, Process improvement, Shop floor, CAD, thermal, Material selection, Finite element analysis, aero engine

Job Description:
To manage and translate complex business requirements into streamlined ERP solutions.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather, analyze, and document complex business requirements, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of project needs.
Utilize relevant Business Process Modeling tools and the MS Office Suite (Word, Excel, Project, PowerPoint, Visio) to visually map out and communicate business processes and requirements effectively.
Perform detailed feasibility and gap analyses to identify areas where existing processes or functionalities fall short, and propose solutions to bridge those gaps.
Work closely with the project management team to scope projects, prioritize deliverables, and negotiate on product functionalities to align with business objectives.
Facilitate the transfer of requirements knowledge to development, maintenance, and testing teams, ensuring accurate implementation and testing of solutions.
Own and maintain essential SDLC artifacts including Business Requirements Documents (BRD), System Requirements Specifications (SRS), User Stories, Use Cases, User Manuals, and similar documents.
Design and validate functional workflows that translate complex business processes into streamlined ERP functionalities.
Develop User Acceptance Testing (UAT) test cases to ensure that the ERP solution aligns with business needs and performs as expected.
Continuously track and update requirement changes from initial proposal to final requirements specification, maintaining clear traceability.
Manage requirement changes, ensuring proper documentation and communication to all stakeholders to prevent any disruptions.
Verify and validate the ERP product against specified requirements to ensure it meets quality standards and functional expectations.
Collaborate with teams to perform impact analysis for changes that occur after requirements baselining, evaluating potential effects on project scope and timelines.
Review and provide feedback on functional documents, test plans, and test cases produced by external teams.
Perform basic SQL querying to retrieve and manipulate data as necessary and appreciate the intricacies of database design.
Participate actively in Integration Testing, User Acceptance Testing, and Functionality Testing to ensure the ERP solutions reliability and performance.
Act as a bridge between end-users and technical teams, facilitating effective communication and mutual understanding.
Apply knowledge of Agile and traditional waterfall methodologies, adapting to the projects specific approach as needed.
Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and consolidate requirements into a centralized repository for effective tracking and change management.
Participate in business case analysis and ROI evaluations related to the ERP project, contributing insights into the potential financial impact
Technical Competencies (Add- on Advantage)
Proficiency in Microsoft Dynamics 365 AL and C/side, with an advantageous understanding of Dynamics 365 Business Central
Strong experience working with MS SQL, including database design, querying, and optimization
Demonstrated expertise in one or more programming languages:
o JAVA
o .NET
o Python
o PHP
Knowledge of key functional areas: Financial Accounting, Sales and Distribution, Manufacturing (Discreet and Process)
Familiarity with Microsoft Cloud and Power Platform, including Azure development and services
Experience with D365 Project Service Automation, enhancing CRM integration with external systems
Proficient in creating custom Web APIs using .NET and developing Reports and Dashboards using Power BI
Skilled in applying customization through Flows and Plugins in .NET for tailored solutions
Proficient in Power BI reports, Actions, and Business rules to optimize system performance
Understanding of Azure integration and ability to create custom Web APIs using .NET
Exposure to Field Services Resource Scheduling Optimization (RSO) for efficient resource management
Proven track record in developing business applications that drive process efficiency and innovation
NeST Principles
Deliver Results
Build Trust and Show integrity
Collaborate
Own
Dive Deep
Raise standard
Keywords: ERP, Automation, MS SQL, Manual testing, Project management, PHP, microsoft, SDLC, CRM, Python

Job Description:
Responsible for creating and maintaining infrastructure necessary for the growth and the upkeep of field and Network operations which shall include Internet Data Centers, ATM sites, Cable Landing Stations and NW space to drive network efficiency and availability
Drive the procurement and technical planning of TGN and submarine cables owned by consortiums/TCL and effect cost savings
Corrects mission critical utility infrastructure problems effectively at optimal costs and in a timely manner
Ensuring necessary co-ordination on certification and field level testing, as appropriate for the business segment
Coordination with the Technical teams for new enhancements/issue resolution
Drives initiatives, industrialization, and efficiencies to facilities for improvements (i e enhancements, updates, upgrades, new systems)
Establishes tools and procedures to monitor field operations performance
Ensure reliability and robustness of the cable systems
Set up configurations - number of fibre pairs in the cable, capacity, landing stations
Manage the complete capacity distribution and traffic activation on the cable system
Provide manpower technical resource support for internal customers during Project Implementation and Delivery
Maintains critical power and environment quality standards to achieve optimal levels of operation
Tracks and monitors the environment performance to ensure minimal interruption to network transmission and/or network switches
Ensuring compliance with all regulatory stipulations within the region
Represent interests of TCL in the cable consortiums (IMEWE, SEAMEWE etc)To lead, drive and monitor all maintenance and cost savings activities related to facilities including facility maintenance and thereby ensuring sufficient focus on optimizing cost of facility infrastructure while maintaining reliability, both in terms of operations and capital investments
Some roles within this group may manage marine cables and network equipment maintenance, international real estate management, security operations for all sites and Network ensuring adequate support for maintenance of international facilities and network at optimal costs, ensuring sufficient focus on optimizing cost of facility infrastructure while maintaining reliability , both in terms of operations and capital investments
Is able to apply broad knowledge of one area within Telecom Network Operations and Maintenance or advanced knowledge of specific professional/operational practices
Checks for problems in existing systems and modifies work processes following defined procedures
Operational role responsible for achieving day-to-day objectives
Works under direct supervision
No prior work related experience requiredEducation: Graduate in any disciplineExperience: 0-2 years experience
Keywords: Procurement, Telecom, Field operations, Networking, Network operations, Issue resolution, Equipment maintenance, Security operations, Operations, Customer Service Executive

Job Title: Senior Manager - Digital & Analytics - Fleet Care Group
Job Description:
The role is responsible to:
- Customer-focused business-oriented Data Scientist who will be responsible for conducting analyses using advanced statistics and data mining techniques to enable better decision making.
- Development of Pricing of AMC and FMS is an important element in addition to integration of the Fleet Edge solution with the Pricing framework.
-- Undertake Sales, market, competition analysis and market studies to understand market trends, cause-effect relationship, to increase sales and help resolve pain points within organization.
- Help provide key TML stakeholders with critical information on pricing related to various models, to ensure that more sale conversions happen.
-Provide necessary insights to the business on the introduction of new digital solutions and building on the pricing analytics that will help to make AMC and FMS price competitive and relevant.
Personal Profile
Education
Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or Masters in Applied Statistics, Applied Mathematics, or other technical discipline.
Skills
Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, XGBoost, PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras etc.
Strong Proficiency in programming in R, Python, PySpark, Power-BI
Exposure to deep learning modelling
Relevant Experience:
1.Possessing 4-6 years of relevant work experience as a data scientist and solving business challenges is preferred
2.Strong understanding of statistical analysis, predictive modelling, data engineering and feature engineering techniques
3.Deep understanding of machine learning/deep learning to build supervised, semi-supervised and unsupervised models
4.Experience in automotive sector/Digital business space
5. Domain Expertise in the areas of Pricing, Data Mining and Digital Technology
Education
Work Experience
Job Responsibility
1-Strategy Process Orientation
Build and drive the Pricing Analytics strategy for TML CVBU-Fleet Care Group for AMC and FMS
Provide Strategic inputs for data priorities in Fleet Care Group in terms of management and monetarization.
Design and build Analytics IT capabilities and tools in conjunction with the CIO and IT strategy for TML that will make AMC and FMS more competitive
Provide Strategic inputs to enhance CRM capabilities to leverage the data that can be used to make the AMC and FMS pricing tool relevant and updated on real time basis.
Define processes and mechanisms to leverage analytics in the Fleet Care Group
Facilitate the development of IT solutions that supplement Analytical interventions.
2-Financial Management
Plan, Monitor and systematically bring down AMC and FMS expenses by proactively suggesting the data trends, failure trends.
Analysing the repeat failures trend and providing inputs to the technical team for interventions.
3-Relationship development:
Ensure good relationships with all internal and external stakeholders to acquire timely professional support to meet the targets and implement digital technologies.
Help resolve bottlenecks for teams by following-up on open issues with stakeholders
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify new data product opportunities
4-Planning Execution
Plan Prioritize Analytics projects and interventions on the basis of impact to business, return on investment and ease of implementation.
Drive the development of Data Models Statistical Models with the in-house Modelling team and outsourced capabilities and monitor their efficiency and impact
Tata Motors Leadership Competencies
Customer Centricity - Anticipating, understanding and focusing efforts on meeting the customer (stakeholders) needs or expectations
Developing Self and Others - Recognizing continuous development is essential for success and taking steps to develop self and helping others to excel
Driving Execution - Translating strategy into action and execution
Leading by Example - Encouraging and following ethical standards
Leading Change - Recognizing the need for change, initiating and adapting to change
Motivating Self and Others - Inspiring teams and individuals
Functional Competencies
Tags
Keywords: Process orientation, IT strategy, Analytical, Machine learning, Data mining, Analytics, Automotive, CRM, Python

Job Description:
Role & responsibilities

1) Create eye-catching visual content for various marketing materials, including but not limited to Digital Marketing Ads, social media graphics, banners, infographics, and print collateral.
2) Collaborate with the marketing team to develop compelling visual concepts that convey our brand message effectively.
3) Ensure all design work adheres to brand guidelines and maintains a consistent and cohesive look and feel.
4) Edit and enhance video content for marketing campaigns, product demonstrations and other promotional purposes.
5) Add special effects, animations, and transitions to videos to enhance their visual appeal.
6) Ensure that all video content is optimized for various platforms and devices.
7) Design aesthetically pleasing and high-converting landing pages that drive user engagement and conversions.
