Job Description:
As a Video Editor/Motion Graphics Designer at Edkent Media, you will be responsible for transforming raw footage into compelling, visually striking videos. You will also create captivating motion graphics and animations to enhance the visual appeal of our projects. If you are a creative and technically skilled individual with a passion for storytelling, this role is perfect for you. We are seeking a talented and creative Video Editor to join our marketing team. The Video Editor will work closely with our content creation team to develop engaging and visually appealing videos.
About Us
Edkent Media is a dynamic and innovative creative agency that specializes in producing engaging multimedia content for a wide range of clients. Our team is dedicated to pushing creative boundaries and delivering outstanding visual experiences. We are looking for a talented Video Editor/Motion Graphics Designer to join our growing team and contribute to the creation of stunning video content.
Experience Level: Mid-Level (2-3 years of experience)
Requirements
Proficiency with Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
A portfolio showcasing your video editing and motion graphics work.
Excellent storytelling and visual communication skills
Knowledge of video codecs, file formats, and compression techniques
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Strong organizational skills and attention to detail
Ability to multitask and work on multiple projects simultaneously
Create motion graphics, visual effects, and animations to enhance videos.
Maintain and organize video assets and project files.
Stay updated on industry trends and new editing techniques.
Key Responsibilities
Edit video content to a professional standard, ensuring that it is visually appealing and meets our company's objectives and standards
Collaborate with the content creation team to develop new ideas and concepts for video content
Continuously seek ways to improve the quality and impact of our video content
Meet tight deadlines and prioritize workload effectively to ensure timely delivery of video content
Work with a variety of video editing software Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects
Manage and organize raw footage and media assets for easy access and use
Review and revise video content to ensure that it meets our company's branding guidelines and style
Join our team and be part of creating visually stunning content that captivates audiences worldwide.
Keywords: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere, Videography, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro

Job Description:
Video Editing: Edit raw footage and assemble it into a final product suitable for publishing. This includes selecting the best shots, applying transitions, adding visual effects, and incorporating audio elements.

Language Proficiency: Have a strong command of the Bengali language, including excellent grammar, vocabulary, and spelling skills. You should be able to understand and translate content from English to Bengali accurately.

Creative Input: Contribute creative ideas and suggestions to enhance the visual and storytelling aspects of the videos. This involves choosing appropriate music, sound effects, and graphics to complement the content.

Technical Skills: Possess proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve. Familiarity with motion graphics software like Adobe After Effects would be an added advantage.

Collaboration: Collaborate effectively with the production team, including directors, cinematographers, and graphic designers, to ensure a cohesive and visually appealing end product. You should be able to take direction and work well in a team environment.

Time Management: Demonstrate strong organizational skills and the ability to work within tight deadlines. You should be able to prioritize tasks and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
Keywords: Video Editing, 3D, Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, animation

Job Description:
Videography Responsibilities:Camera Operation: Using professional video cameras or other recording equipment to capture high-quality video footage
This includes setting up shots, framing, and adjusting camera settings
Lighting: Setting up and controlling lighting equipment to achieve the desired look for the video, ensuring proper exposure and avoiding shadows or overexposure
Audio Recording: Capturing clear and high-quality audio using microphones and audio recording equipment
This may involve using lavalier mics, boom microphones, and audio recorders
Storyboarding: Collaborating with clients or directors to plan and storyboard video shoots, ensuring that the intended message or story is conveyed effectively
Location Scouting: Identifying suitable shooting locations and ensuring they meet the project's requirements
On-Site Direction: Directing subjects or actors during video shoots to capture the desired shots and scenes
Video Editing Responsibilities:Footage Organization: Importing, cataloging, and organizing video and audio clips for easy access during the editing process
Video Editing Software: Using video editing software (e
g
, Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci Resolve) to assemble, edit, and enhance video clips
Cutting and Trimming: Selecting the best shots, cutting out unwanted segments, and trimming clips to create a cohesive and engaging narrative
Transitions and Effects: Adding transitions, visual effects, and graphics to enhance the video's storytelling and visual appeal
Audio Editing: Adjusting audio levels, adding music, sound effects, and voiceovers, and ensuring high-quality audio throughout the video
Color Correction and Grading: Adjusting the color and tone of the video to achieve a desired visual style or mood
Text and Titles: Incorporating text, titles, and captions to provide context or convey information
Exporting and Rendering: Preparing the final video for various formats and platforms, optimizing it for web, broadcast, or other distribution channels
Keywords: Video Editor, Manager Technology

Job Description: engaging video content for social media platforms, including trimming, cutting, and arranging footage, adding transitions, music, sound effects and visual effects, color correcting and grading, and adding text overlays and captions.
Keywords: Video Editing, Videography

Job Description:
As a Video Editor, you will be responsible for creating and editing engaging and visually appealing videos for various purposes. You will work closely with the creative team to understand project requirements and bring concepts to life through the art of video editing. Your expertise in video editing software and your creative eye will be essential in delivering high-quality videos that meet client expectations.
Responsibilities:
1. Edit raw video footage and assemble it into a cohesive and visually appealing final product.
2. Trim, rearrange, and enhance video clips to ensure smooth transitions and flow.
3. Apply video effects, filters, and color corrections to enhance visual impact.
4. Incorporate audio elements, such as background music, sound effects, and voiceovers, to
enhance the video's storytelling.
5. Collaborate with the creative team to understand project goals, objectives, and target audience.
6. Stay up to date with industry trends and best practices in video editing techniques and software.
7. Ensure video projects are delivered within agreed-upon deadlines.
8. Review and provide feedback on video drafts to ensure they meet quality standards and client
requirements.
9. Optimize videos for different platforms and formats, considering aspects like aspect ratios, file sizes, and encoding.
10. Maintain an organized library of video assets and project files for easy access and future
reference.
Requirements:
1. Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role.
2. Proficiency in video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or DaVinci
Resolve.
3. Strong knowledge of video editing techniques, visual storytelling, and industry-standard practices.
4. Solid understanding of color grading, audio editing, and motion graphics.
5. Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and effectively communicate ideas.
6. Attention to detail and excellent time management skills to meet project deadlines.
7. Creative mindset and the ability to think critically and provide artistic input.
8. Familiarity with various video formats and codecs.
9. A portfolio or demo reel showcasing previous video editing work.
Keywords: video editing, video editing software, Adobe Premiere Pro, audio editing, Final Cut Pro

Job Description:
Role Description:
Lead GMI Business Analyst role for motivated individuals to join the Markets Clearing Technology team to support our business in the area of Listed Derivatives (LD), Cleared OTC (cOTC) and Cash & Collateral businesses. Covering the business lines of Rates, Credits & FX.
The purpose of the role is to support the Listed Derivatives business in Transformation to a Target state architecture and will have help drive the transformation through multiple complex functions like Margin processing, Trade processing, Position management, GL flows, Lifecycle Management (exercises/Assignments), Corporate Actions, CCP processing, Interest processing, CCP reconciliations, regulatory feeds, and Fees and Commissions.
The candidate should have very strong functional knowledge across the domain and act in a SME capacity on the functions outlined above.
The individual will be involved in projects working with multiple product areas to gather business requirements and propose solutions in order to help the business enhance its core clearing platform, and will be responsible for identifying, devising and documenting tactical and strategic solutions for Corporate Banking & Securities Technology within Deutsche Banks Global Technology organization.
The candidate must be able to think critically, analyze workflows and data, draw conclusions, and suggest approaches to mitigate operational risk improve efficiency and recommend automated solutions
Your Key responsibilities :
Analyze requirements, model and produce fit for purpose visualizations (Visio or other)
Work with CIOs and BAs to model business problems with functional/technical context in mind.
Work with Operations and business to understand their functions requirements and interpret this into a technology delivery roadmap.
Ability to innovate and think creatively, showing willingness to apply new approaches to solving problems and to learn new methods and technologies
Ability to think analytically, with systematic and logical approach to solving complex problems, and high attention to detail
Help drive best practices in and may tactically support highest priority releases and/or enhancements to large or critical systems.
Implement best practices around requirement gathering methodologies and requirement documentation procedures
Take Ownership for platform scalability and work with stakeholders to ensure that necessary capacity and Tech Roadmap compliance related requirements are dealt with on time.
Work with the CIO group in DB, to understand best practices and push best practices in Markets Clearing.
Work with CIO Markets Clearing engineering team like information architects, BPM/workflow architects, Functional architects, so drive a team centric solution and leveraging these skills to solution the best in class clearing platform.
Your Skills and Experience :
You will have:
More than 5 years of GMI, RANsys, UBIX hands on experience or other.
Experience of Clearvision or relevant CCP connectivity.
Proficient with FIS Streamcore database model
Demonstrate knowledge and understanding of core systems with DBs Markets Clearing Platform and be able to drive changes within these applications
Experience of dealing with Clearing Vendors and CCPs.
Knowledge of the following Primary Domains: Transaction Lifecycle processing, Lifecycle event mgmt, Complex reporting and management of reporting across multi asset classes, allocation processing and self service client functions in the domain of Clearing.
Able to configure modules of Clearing systems to process typical market requirements.
Deep understanding of the Clearing process front to back, showing abilities to explain the lifecycle of a trade and where each module has an effect.
Able to clearly explain the Batch steps involved and what is typically involved for regional processing in Asia or European regions.
Knowledge of Clearing across Listed and possibly extended to cOTC and FX
You will be:
Working with other Business Analysts and SMEs having a familiarity with variety a functions like Execution, Risk, Payments, settlements etc.
Experience managing diverse group of stakeholders, including business, operations and technology at different levels of the organization
Ability to commit and prioritize work duties and tasks
Proven communication skills Fluent in English (written/verbal)
Keywords: Business Analysis, data analysis, database modeling, Visio, Business operations

Job Description:
Job Summary
CBRE Business Analytics is seeking a Director to lead an experienced analyst team in executing real estate business intelligence projects for clients. The Director will manage a team based in APAC and report to Global Leadership in AMS, requiring flexibility for both regions. Projects will focus on data integration, warehousing, and visualization to optimize client portfolio operations across various service lines.

Responsibilities include overseeing project work, implementing technical solutions, and ensuring timely deliverables. The Director will collaborate with senior management to track project progress, maintain client satisfaction, and work closely with clients, analysts, and the data warehouse team to develop business intelligence solutions. Proficiency in advanced analytics and technical capabilities is required.

The ideal candidate has 6+ years of experience and possesses strong skills in project and team management, client communication, data modeling, relational databases, Tableau, and commercial real estate knowledge. Previous business experience in the commercial real estate industry is a must.

This is a remote position with the option to work from home or a CBRE office. Availability during times zones in APAC and AMS is necessary for effective team management and reporting to global leadership.

ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Implement and maintain key processes to be followed by the team. Defines priorities for planning, and other strategic activities for client engagements and internal projects.
Support the management and achievement of financial, operational, and other key performance indicators for client engagements, internal projects, or overall team goals.
Ensure a high level of employee engagement. Direct individual and team growth.
Oversee overall project delivery for business intelligence projects for a variety of corporate and government clients.
Review project deliverables including Tableau dashboards, formal reports, PowerPoint briefings, etc.
Architect technical solutions for data ingestion and integration.
Develop advanced Tableau dashboards for presentation of analytics.
Lead client presentations (both in-person and virtually) of project progress meetings and presentations of results.
Problem solve technical issues and client questions. Escalate issues to senior management and dedicated technical team as needed.
Continuous review and improvement of project processes.
Provide subject matter expertise on data-related processes and analyses.
Miscellaneous support for marketing materials, presentations, budgeting, and resource planning.
Assigns tasks, responsibilities, evaluates and mentors staff.
Other duties may be assigned.

SUPERVISORY RESPONSIBILITIES

The position entails supervising a team of analysts and providing formal assistance, such as technical guidance and training, to coworkers. The role also involves leading project teams, planning and supervising employee assignments, and making recommendations on staff recruitment, selection, promotion, corrective action, and termination. Additionally, the position includes monitoring staffing levels, labor utilization, and overtime, as well as preparing and delivering performance appraisals. The director also mentors and coaches team members to enhance their competencies and leads by example, demonstrating behaviors consistent with the company's values. Availability during times zones in APAC and AMS is necessary for effective team management and reporting to global leadership.

QUALIFICATIONS

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

EDUCATION and EXPERIENCE

Bachelor's degree (BA/BS) from four-year college or university. Masters degree or MBA preferred. Minimum 6+ years of related experience and/or training, including five years of experience at the management level. Previous project management, business analytics or related experience required. Advanced skills in planning, database management/business intelligence.

CERTIFICATES and/or LICENSES
None required. Business Intelligence certification preferred.

COMMUNICATION SKILLS
Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Strong organizational and analytical skills.
Ability to provide efficient, timely, reliable and courteous service to customers. Ability to effectively present information.

DATA MANAGEMENT AND ANALYTICS
Extensive experience with data management, architecture, and analysis. Skilled in dashboard design and development. Extensive experience with Tableau is required. Proficiency in database technologies such as Microsoft Access or SQL Server is preferred. Understanding of hosting environments such as Amazon Web Services (AWS) and Azure.

FINANCIAL AND STATISTICAL KNOWLEDGE
Requires basic knowledge of financial and statistical terms and principles.
REASONING ABILITY
Ability to comprehend, analyze, and interpret complex data sets. Ability to solve problems involving several options in situations. Requires advanced analytical and quantitative skills.

OTHER SKILLS and/or ABILITIES
Advanced skills in Microsoft Office Suite Products, particularly Excel. Comfortable working independently and collaboratively.
Keywords: Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Data Mining, Tableau, Data Modeling

guardians.

towards this end actively encourage their participation in courses

in consultation with the Principal.

frequently to staff, students and parents.

programs.

school.

Excellent leadership and organizational skills

Excellent English Language, communication skills with students, colleagues and parents

Job Description:
Role & responsibilities

Business Division Profitability-

Preparation and publish of the business division profitability reports on monthly basis (50 Biz divisions/ products)
Own, review the Balance sheet and P&L of business divisions and summarize the key highlights of the business performance for senior management.
Dupont Analysis for senior management.
Analyzing the effectiveness of the banks FTP policy by doing Funding unit gap analysis on periodic basis.
Capital / RWA allocations across business.
Periodic regulatory reporting and RBI Inspection requirements always on Ad hoc and urgent basis.
Reconciliation, Process controls and documentations
Managing and closing the statutory auditors requirements on the subject area.
Undertaking process improvements for speeding up the preparation process
Maintain close engagement with all the major stakeholders Business Units Heads, Business Unit Controllers, Compliance to understand and address business needs and concerns to facilitate franchise growth strategies.
Engaging with various business stakeholders, analyst teams/business for responding to queries on published P&L
Submission of performance related information to human resources department ie Scorecards for Business Divisions and Senior management.

Funds Transfer Pricing - Strategy, Implementation and Automation

Own the Banks Fund Transfer Pricing System from a techno-functional perspective and manage changes in the FTP system, smooth functioning of the system.
Framing of strategy/policy for funds transfer pricing to ensure effective transmission of funding cost in line with changes in business scenarios and product features.
Implementation of FTP policy entailing monthly computation of transfer pricing rates, application, review of rates, etc.
Engaging with businesses / treasury for modification/updation of pricing rules.
Overlooking enhancements and changes in the system; Working closely with the Software provider , IT to manage and effect business rule changes


Budgeting and planning

Own and manage the Hyperion Planning Solution Central Module for consolidation.
Preparation of budgeted financial statements in Hyperion top down in consultation with forecasting team.
Gap analysis and review of the top down and bottom up plans.
Review of budgeted transfer pricing rates, determination of planned asset/liability balances for Banks balance sheet, central office expenses/income, etc.
Top down Board presentation on business strategies and budget
Submission of Calendar of Review to the Board on budget achievement and variance thereof
Preparation of three year plan for regulatory capital projection
Updation of relevant sections of the Banks ICAAP document

Segment Financials -

Preparation and analysis of segment financials on quarterly basis for Indian & US GAAP
Undertake modifications for enhancing quality and meaningfulness of the reports
Undertake review with senior management; undertake query resolution, providing additional information, etc.
Engage with auditors for audit of statement and query resolution
Submission of information pertaining to segmental statement to RBI.


Key Skills-

Analytical, presentation skills
Basic understanding of Banks products and exposure to Fund Transfer Pricing ( not Taxation Transfer pricing )
Well versed with relevant accounting standards, RBI guidelines; conversant with Financial Accounting
Knowledge of banking business, banking industry and regulatory environment
Fluent Communication skills
Ability to manage and analyze large data using tools like Excel and Power BI and familiar with word/ppt softwares

Job Location-Mahalaxmi (Mumbai).
Keywords: Gaap Accounting, Fund Transfer Pricing, Asset Liability Management

Job Title: Hiring - Subject Matter Expert | WFH | Engineering
Job Description:
Subject Matter Expert (SME) - Content Fixer
Project Department: Chegg Portal (STA Project)
Location: Work from Home
Summary:
We are seeking highly motivated and experienced Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) to join our team as Content Fixers. In this role, you will be responsible for reviewing and revising existing solutions on the Chegg portal to ensure that they are accurate, comprehensive, and aligned with the latest guidelines. You will also be responsible for fixing the content of existing solutions to improve their clarity, precision, and accuracy. All Solutions must be typed on the portal with proper tool usage.
Responsibilities:
Review and revise existing solutions on the Chegg portal to ensure that they are accurate, comprehensive, and aligned with the latest guidelines.
Fix the content of existing solutions to improve their clarity, precision, and accuracy.
Identify and correct any errors in existing solutions.
Improve the overall quality of existing solutions by making them more clear, concise, and easy to understand.
Collaborate with other SMEs to ensure consistency in the quality of solutions.
Qualifications and Available Subjects:

Mechanical Engineering - B.Tech (Mechanical ) (75 INR/Solution)
Electrical Engineering -B.Tech (Electrical) (80 INR/Solution)
Civil Engineering - B.Tech (Civil) (75-80 INR/Solution)
Earning Potential: 10k to 60k by solving student's doubts on the portal.

There will be minimum target of 10 solutions per day.

Duration: 6 months+

Specific Tasks:
Carefully read and understand the existing solution.
Identify any errors or inaccuracies in the solution.
Make the necessary corrections to the solution, using appropriate terminology and notation.
Improve the overall quality of the solution by making it more clear, concise, and easy to understand.
Proofread the solution carefully to ensure that it is free of errors.
Guidelines:
Always make sure that your solutions are accurate, comprehensive, and aligned with the latest guidelines.
Write your solutions in a clear and concise manner, using appropriate terminology and notation.
Proofread your solutions carefully to ensure that they are free of errors.
Be respectful of students and other SMEs.
If you wish to apply provide details on the below link
https://forms.gle/D55wgg3RjWzkRFBC7

or you can also mail your resume along with your subject at hr@endeavoracademy.co.in

Job Description:
We are looking for a highly skilled and experienced e-commerce SEO Expert to join our team and drive organic traffic, improve search engine rankings, and optimize our e-commerce website TJC
The ideal candidate will have a deep understanding of e-commerce platforms, technical SEO principles, on-page optimization, website architecture, site speed optimization, structured data, XML sitemaps, mobile optimization, link building and analytics
You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement SEO best practices and ensure the strong organic presence of TJC across all the major search engines in the UK
You will have a pivotal role in one of the business most exciting and fast-growing departments, assisting in a digital transformation that will have the potential for a profound effect on the entire business
Role and responsibilities:
Conduct comprehensive technical SEO audits to identify and resolve website issues affecting search engine visibility, crawlability, and user experience.
Develop and execute comprehensive on-page and off-page SEO strategies for e-commerce, including optimizing category pages, improving internal linking, and building relevant external backlinks.
Implement and optimise XML sitemaps, robots.txt files, and canonical tags to guide search engine crawlers and manage duplicate content issues.
Identify and fix website errors, broken links, and 404 pages to improve user experience and search engine performance.
Conduct keyword research and analysis specific to e-commerce products to identify high-value keywords and phrases.
Optimize product pages for search engines, including meta tags, product descriptions, titles, and URLs, to improve organic search rankings and click-through rates.
Implement and optimise structured data markup (schema.org) to enhance search engine visibility and improve rich snippets in search results.
Ensure mobile-friendliness and responsiveness of the website.
Monitor website performance using SEO tools and platforms (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Search Console) and provide actionable insights and recommendations.
Track, analyse, and report on key technical SEO metrics, such as website speed, crawl errors, indexation status, and mobile usability.
Conduct keyword research and analysis to uncover SEO opportunities and improve website relevancy.
Stay informed about emerging technologies and trends that may impact technical SEO, such as voice search and mobile-first indexing.
Stay updated with the latest SEO trends, industry developments, and search engine algorithm updates.
Qualifications and Experience:
Bachelors degree in marketing, computer science, or a related field.
Minimum of 5 years of experience as a SEO Expert, with a proven track record of optimising websites for search engine performance.
Ecommerce Exposure is must.
Extensive experience with technical website optimisation techniques, including website structure, internal linking, XML sitemaps, robots.txt, and canonical tags.
Proficiency in using SEO tools and platforms, such as GA4, Google Search Console, Screaming Frog, SEMRUSH and other website auditing tools.
Strong knowledge of SEO best practices, search engine algorithms, and ranking factors.
Expertise in website speed optimization techniques, and performance analysis tools.
Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript as they relate to technical SEO.
Proficiency in mobile optimization best practices and mobile-friendly website design.
Familiarity with structured data markup (schema.org) and its implementation for enhanced search results.
Up-to-date with the latest SEO trends, industry developments, and search engine algorithm updates.
Excellent analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams.
Keywords: Computer science, Google Analytics, XML, Social media, Javascript, HTML, Customer service, Link building, SEO, SEO Expert

Job Description:
A Business Analyst is a professional who works closely with stakeholders to identify goals, develop best practices for data collection, and analyse current processes to determine what can be improved to achieve their desired outcome.
Responsibilities:
Identify different types of data that need tracking to improve business performance.
Generate easy-to-interpret reports based on collected data.
Work with the management team to prioritize suggested changes to each business segment.
Bring out data-driven insights that help support exploitation of strategic and tactical business opportunities, and be a champion for a data-driven, decision-making culture.
Exploit data using research and analytics to maximize the return on data assets, and develop methods to ensure consistent application and use of analytics.
Responsible of analysing the attribution & bring improvement areas in the same
Evaluation of New/Existing Market/platform/categories etc.
Requirement:
A Chartered Accountant, bachelors or masters degree in business administration, related field, or equivalent work experience. Academic qualification or professional training and experience are also desirable.
Three or more years of business experience, ideally in business management, financial or information or IT management. Broad business experience internally and within the vertical industry is desired.
Retail Industry experience preferred.
Excellent business acumen and interpersonal skills; able to work across business lines at senior levels to influence and effect change to achieve common goals.
Proven data literacy the ability to describe business use cases/outcomes, data sources and management concepts, and analytical approaches/options. The ability to translate among the languages used by executive, business, and IT stakeholders.
Analytical skills: outstanding analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Familiarity with business information generation and analysis methods.
Ability to effectively drive business, culture, and technology change in a fast paced, complex and global operating environment.
Excellent oral and written communication skills, including the ability to explain digital concepts and technologies to business leaders, as well as business concepts to technologists; the ability to sell ideas and process internally at all levels.
Keywords: Business Analyst, Renewable energy, Staffing, Social media, Business analytics, Data collection, SEZ, Customer service, IT management, Merchandising

=> Be part of fastest growing digital sales channel in financial services industry.
=> This will be permanently working from office only (Not a Work From Home).

===========================================================================


Job Designation: Phone Banking Officer (PBO)
Role Category: Customer Services (Inbound Voice Process)
Job Grade: Assistant Manager M-1 / Deputy Manager - M2
Job Locations: Noida (Sec-125, & Sec-16)
This is "Contact Centre Branch" (Non-Branch Banking) based Job,
Completely In-house / Office-based profile,

Must be Experience:
# Must be having at least 1 year experience into any kind of Customer Service with Voice/Calling with BPO, IT, Banking, BFSI & any other industry can also apply.
# Fresher candidate with Good Communication skills also can apply.

Key Role & responsibilities:
=> Must be flexible with 24/7 shift, late evening and night shifts and scattered 8 Week Offs in a month. (For Females: 9 hrs. shift in between 7.00 AM to 8.00 PM).
=>This position is primarily responsible for receiving / attending the inbound calls from existing customers to resolve their complaints & queries and give them the service against the banking products and services.
=> Developing and maintaining banking relationships with a select group of Individual customers by providing them exceptional individualized customer service, thereby achieving targeted growth and service norms.


Job Description:
To Attend the inbound calls of customers in Retail Liabilities and process the queries & requests to customer's satisfaction.
To identify and convert the opportunities for cross selling (banking product) on customer's call.
Responsible for quality communication and customer servicing within laid down productivity and service benchmarks.
Ensure customer delight and consistent service experience, including timely resolution of customer queries/issues.
Complete the logs specified by the process (End-of-day target).
Adherence to Information Security norms & quality process norms.
To be aware of and comply with any updates about the process.
Act on the feedback given by Team Leader/Team Coach or Quality or on the coaching provided to the team as guidelines for improving performance.


Candidate Desire Profile:
Must be Good Communication skills Verbal & Written.
Good listening skills and strong communication abilities.
Flexible to get scattered 8 Week Offs in a month with 9 hours with late evening and night shifts.
Freshers with communication skills also can apply.
Age should be 20-30 years only (Male & Female Both can apply).
Be Confident and willing to learn with a flair for knowledge. Possess an upbeat, positive can-do attitude & works with integrity.
Team Player, collaborative Self-motivated person including the ability to act as a role model within the organization. Should be able to establish rapport quickly with peers, managers & customers.
Team player Candidate must be able to work effectively with all levels of the organization.

Salary Package:
Annual CTC of Rs.3.00 to 4.00 Lac per annum plus performance based high Incentives.
Plus PF, Gratuity and Mediclaim & Insurance cover (as per policy).

Education Qualification:
Minimum Graduate with any stream Or
Post Graduate with any stream.


How To Apply:
=> Interested candidates need to apply on same or Send / forward CV's/Resumes at: hrs.empowercareer@gmail.com | And write in the subject line "Kotak-PBO-271"
or
=> Also can share updated CVs / Resumes via WhatsApp on: +91-95822-33177 write in the subject line "Kotak-PBO-271"
if your CV / profile got shortlisted with us we will contact you back.





Regards
Career Empower (Hr-Team)

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly detail-oriented and organized individual to join our team as a Data Enrichment Agent
This position will be responsible for accurately entering and maintaining provider credentialing data into our electronic database
As a Voice Data Enrichment Agent , you will be joining our Data Enrichment team to support the execution of licensing in the healthcare field for our clients
You'll be held to a high quality of work standard and will be a contributor to the quality control process
Key Responsibilities:
Involved with voice and non-voice processes
Manage either inbound/outbound calls in a professional manner
Verifying information provided to our client by 3rd party entities by using online databases to cross-check information
Entering information found on online databases into our databases
Conducting internal, or online, research into verifications
Purchase primary source verifications from third parties
Highlighting issues or negative trends to managers to address areas for improvements in business processes
Attending team check-ins and training as needed
Updating providers licenses on our database
Track and follow up on enrollment requests, ensuring provider numbers are established and linked to the appropriate group entity
Assists with a variety of special projects such as CAQH, etc
Performs other duties as assigned
Qualifications:
Willing to work on both, voice and non-voice processes.
Excellent command of the English language.
Great written and verbal communication skills.
Attention to detail and accuracy.
Able to support a Work from Home setup.
Own PC/laptop (Minimum of i3 processor, 4 gig RAM).
Internet speed no lower than 15 Mbps download, 10 Mbps upload.
Keywords: Online research, Training, Outbound, Database, Healthcare, Manager Quality Control, Licensing, data enrichment, Operations, RAM

Job Description:
Hiring for Medical Oncologist for a reputed hospital in Chennai

Job Location: Chennai

Eligibility Criteria: A medical degree in oncology and the successful completion of a residency and fellowship in oncology. (MBBS, MD Gen Med, DM Medical)


Job description:
We are looking for a caring, dedicated oncologist to join our team in diagnosing, treating, and caring for patients with various forms of cancer. The oncologist will work in medical oncology, using chemotherapy and other medications to treat cancer, surgical oncology, surgically removing tumors and surrounding tissues, and radiation oncology, performing radiation therapy for patients.
Oncologist Responsibilities:
Working with patients to explain a diagnosis and stage of cancer, discuss treatment options, and assist in managing the side effects and symptoms of cancer and its treatment.
Leading a cancer treatment team of various healthcare professionals.
Coordinating treatment plans and prescribing various types of treatment, including chemotherapy and immunotherapy.
Treating patients with radiation therapy.
Assisting patients with pain management.
Performing surgical operations to remove tumors and determine whether cancer has spread from the original starting point.
Performing basic administrative and clerical tasks, such as keeping records of test results, writing prescriptions, providing cancer information to patients, and monitoring treatment plans.
Oncologist Requirements:
A medical degree in oncology and the successful completion of a residency and fellowship in oncology. (MBBS, MD Gen Med, DM Medical)
A caring and compassionate nature when dealing with patients.
Keywords: Medical Oncology, DNB, Dm, Oncology, DM Oncology, medical oncologist

Student Engagement Associate

Roles and Responsibilities:
1. Collaborate with workshop organizers to define workshop objectives and content.
2. Maintaining good relationships with the college POCs and CRs of colleges where NxtWave conduits events.

Job description
ProSofos Inc. is searching for committed and deadline-driven Junior Associates to join our team of in-house staff. You will work directly on our prominent Canadian websites. Besides, you will be working on international projects and will get ample exposure of North American Markets.
Key Responsibilities:
Shall be responsible to make sales/ marketing calls to Canadian experts.
Shall be responsible to receive calls and address the queries of our clients and assist them.
Shall be responsible to work 8 hrs per day also night shifts as and when required.
Shall be responsible to document the status and conversation with the Clients in our system.
Shall be responsible to maintain high quality of work, dealing with the International Clients.
Conducting Internet research or gathering information through surveys or by speaking to clients and staff.
Attending and participating in meetings, workshops and events.
Updating documents and records.
Identifying potential weaknesses and offering improvement suggestions.
Assisting managers with negotiations.
Keeping a log of everything learned and delivering presentations to staff and other stakeholders.
Desired Candidate Profile:
Inbound and outbound call center experience
Should be able to work night shifts or according to the Canadian time zone
Proficiency in English language is a must
Experience in Marketing/sales field.
Excellent communication skills.
Ability to remain calm in fast-paced environments.
Perks and Benefits:
Work from homewith flexible working hours.
Excellent and consistent career growth.
Free training on Digital Marketing and Communication Skills.
Training completion and Internship Certificate.
Full time employment opportunity or placements in another Canadian firm.

ProSofos Inc. Canada, primarily focused on business & technology strategy development within the financial domain. The key areas supported are digital transformation and operational excellence with intricate solutions for Digitization, Automation & Solution development. The company also provides consulting services to various upcoming fintech entities.
We appreciate people who can join us immediately. We are an equal opportunity employer we celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees and make our hiring decisions without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, genetics, disability, age.

Job Description:
Summary:
The HR Technology Architect is responsible for administering, enhancing, and supporting all HR Technology Integrations and should have a detailed technical knowledge to do so. Our main IT systems are Workday and Kronos. The role serves as a technical point of contact for the deployment and maintenance of modules and will ensure data integrity, testing of system changes, report writing and process improvement opportunities. The technical advisor will also support any new release update testing as well manage the HR Eco Architecture. The incumbent will partner with various business stakeholders and accountable for the overall design and functionality of the applications Workday and Kronos.

Duties and Responsibilities:
Workday Integration tools - Creating Security Groups and connections within Workday
Configuring, implementing, and troubleshooting Workday.
Experience in all phases of the technology implementation lifecycle (requirements gathering, design, build, go live, testing)
Leading design session, reviewing, and assisting in the creation of project deliverables.

Workday Finance Integrations
Review and enhance the current setup with Workday Expense and Cost Center Hierarchy
Create API connections to Integrations with banks for expense credit card updates
Further automation to manual processes either by leveraging Workday tools including Integration studio OR by RPA automation

Workday Reporting and HR Datamart Integrations
Understand and enhance the current mapping of HR data into the DataMart built in Oracle database with Informatica
Designing, development, testing and deployment of workday integrations using custom report, EIB, Core connectors, APIs and Workday Integration Studio
Update Workday reporting calculated fields, xml file and XSLT document for integrations
Troubleshoot data flows to all downstream systems

HR Timekeeping, Payroll and Benefits Integrations
Understand and enhance the current mapping of HR systems for timekeeping, payroll and Benefits
Update local state and country level integrations to meet the new configuration changes as decided by business teams and governing entities
Lead design meetings of enhancements with IT and HR business teams
Lead Workday to UKG Dimensions bi-directional integration setup

Ongoing Responsibilities
Work directly with the corporate business and IT stakeholders to gather requirements & design,
Developing, testing, support and deploying integrations specific to Workday Financials to meet business requirements.
Analyzes Workday release updates to understand impacts of feature changes, in relation to clients existing integrations.
Accountable for Workday data integrity including data quality and data extracts.
Ability to work and a fast-paced environment and adjust to changing demands or needs of the business.
Ability to assess and design system functionality and actively participate in the entire project life cycle: requirement gathering, configuration, testing, training, deployment and change management.
Analyzes and provides technical support for technical issues related to the integrations designed in the application. Provides thoughtful resolutions or measures to prevent reoccurrences.

Minimum Qualifications: (To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily.)
Bachelors degree in Information Technology or Business Administration, Human Resources, or a closely related field.
More than 5 years of experience working with HR Technologies of Workday and preferably Kronos / UKG.
Certification in Workday Core Integrations and Integration Studio, Workday HCM and Advanced Integration

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities:
Ability to work unsupervised.
Strategic and creative thinking to analyze issues that may arise, and create solutions.
Ability to respond positively to feedback, and implement change in process and procedures as needed.
Experience working in Agile/Scrum delivery methodologies is preferred.
Familiarity with Time Clocks and maintenance
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.

Physical Demands: (The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.)
Employee is regularly required to lead, listen, talk, and participate in multiple conference calls throughout the workday
Employee is regularly required to work at a desk/computer for the full workday
Employee occasionally may be required to work outside of normal working hours and on weekends or holidays to support planned project implementations, software deployments, break/fix of critical applications, or business travel
Employee must be able and willing to travel, both domestic and internationally, per Wabtec travel policy

Work Environment: (The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job.)
Employee will normally work in a temperature-controlled office environment
Employee is expected to work from their assigned Wabtec office in accordance with the Wabtec policy in effect at the time
During occasional visits to areas of manufacturing operations, employee will be required to adhere to proper attire and PPE & safety requirements for that area. This may include, but is not limited to ear plugs, safety glasses, hardhats, steel toed shoes, removal of finger rings, etc.
Keywords: Workday Integration, Workday Studio Integration, Workday

Job Description:
Prime Function:
Assist the Engineering Supervisor Assistant Director of Engineering in maintenance and care of all the equipment.
Maintain quality of work in order to meet the standards.
To control and check all the equipment.
Ensure to work according to the policies and procedures of the hotel.
Ensure to handle and maintain all equipments properly.
Any matter which may effect the interests of hotel should be brought to the attention of the Management.
To abide by the mission statement of the Company and of the department.

Job Description:
Creating amazing-looking real-time FX with Unity.
Collaborate with the Art, Gameplay, Design, and Animation teams to develop in-game FX elements, from early look development and prototyping to final polished implementation.
Use our engine authoring toolset, 3D Max, Substance, and various other supplemental FX authoring packages to create stunning VFX particles, systems, textures, and simulations.
Directly implement VFX content, including in-world placement and scripting of systemic/gameplay-driven behaviours.
Contribute to the development and enhancement of our proprietary engine VFX systems, including particle effect authoring and scripting and sequencing tools and pipelines.
Placing and triggering FX within the world.
Working with the Art, Design and Engineering teams to find solutions to artistic challenges.
Develop a deep understanding of the art direction and create effects to support the vision.
Create effects to realistic performance budgets and take ownership of the memory and performance costs of your effects.
Qualifications Eligibility criteria:
Experience of creating Realtime particle effects in Unity.
Experience of using industry-standard content creation software (e.g. Maya, 3ds Max, Photoshop, Substance) to create assets to use in-engine.
Experience as a VFX artist in games, using a real-time authoring toolset (Unity).
Experience with various supplemental 3D and VFX authoring packages (Maya, Houdini, Substance, etc.)
Portfolio that demonstrates a breadth of both technical and artistic execution of real-time VFX.
Interest for games and the future of Virtual Reality.
Experience with shaders will be an added advantage.
Strong Unity skills and experience with other appropriate features.
Knowledge of game production pipeline and life cycle.
A critical eye for the timing, animation, and motion of real-world objects and visual FX.
Ability to create all art needed for the FX from prototype to final FX Desire and knowledge of how to push our effects, editing tools, and pipeline further.
Experience with scripting in Blueprint, Python, etc is a plus.
Abilities in secondary areas such as modelling, skinning, animation, or lighting.
Experience working with multiple games.
Passionate about games and art in games.
Keywords: 3D, Prototype, Packaging, Maya, Conceptualization, Animation, VFX, Photoshop, Python, Scripting

Job Description:
Ensures that appropriate quality plans are made that include all stages of the life cycle of the product and supports Quality Plan design
Validates key design inputs like usability, reliability, performance, supportability, manufacturability, localizability, safety, security, privacy, serviceability, sustainability, and costs
Provides effective oversight of the execution of the Quality Plan, any Risk Management activities, and of all design related activities during the product/system lifecycle
Performs independent technical assessment on product quality performance and post-market product quality analysis.
Can Lead quality related problem solving and root cause analysis during design and manufacturing
Uses post-market analytics and statistics to report on product quality performance in the field (provide feedback to manufacturing, suppliers or design teams) and initiates field actions when required.
Performs independent technical assessment on product quality performance and post-market product quality analysis
Provide leadership and oversight to ensure Quality Management System Compliance
Be able to plan, control, and assure product and process quality in accordance with quality principles, which include planning processes, material control, acceptance sampling, and measurement systems
Ensure the compliance requirements are met during Design review , design verification Design validation , Design transfer
Apply and facilitate Design for Quality Reliability best practices (FMEAs, robust design, VV, root cause analysis problem solving)
You are a part of
The Philips Hospital Respiratory Care business group, supporting products including invasive and noninvasive hospital ventilators, patient interfaces, sensors, and monitoring equipment. We believe that by understanding our customers problems we can ease the discomfort of ventilation by providing innovative solutions to improve the patient-ventilator experience, permit speech, and speed liberation. These technological breakthroughs allow the clinician to concentrate more on the patient and less on the device.
To succeed in this role, you ll need a customer-first attitude and the following
Bachelor s Engineering degree with 12+ years of related experience or Master s degree with 5+ years of related experience -Mechanical/ Electrical/ Electronic or Equivalent Engineering
Engineering Degree or equivalent experience in medical device industry
5+ years experience with a medical device company preferably
Can Lead quality related problem solving and root cause analysis during design and manufacturing
Applied knowledge of appropriate global medical device or consumer product regulations, requirements, and standards (21 CFR Parts 820, ISO13485, ISO14971, MEDDEV, EU MDR, etc.)
Experience or understanding of Software or Hardware development, Verification and Validation, Risk management, RCA, Requirements Management, Design, Usability.
Have an understanding of Sample Size Determination and Statistical Methods , Safety Risk Management (i.e ISO 14971) and Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) / Fault Tree Analysis-.
Have understanding of a quality system and its development, documentation, and implementation with respect to domestic and international standards or requirements.
Have an understanding of the audit process including types of audits, planning, preparation, execution, reporting results, and follow-up.
Be able to develop and implement quality programs, including tracking, analyzing, reporting, and problem solving.
Keywords: Product quality, Quality Lead, RCA, Root cause analysis, ISO, Design review, Ventilation, Sensors, Risk management, Monitoring

Job Title: Senior Engineer / Technical Lead - Power Supply/Power Electronics
Job Description:
Senior Engineer - Power Supply/Power Electronics.

Thales India Engineering Competency Center in Bangalore is seeking a Senior Engineer role to be part of Hardware engineering team. In this role he/she will be responsible for generating reliable, cost effective, customized Power Electronics systems design, Obsolescence redesign for Aerospace products to meet the customer requirements as well as governing regulatory standards (DO-160, DO-254, MIL-STD, etc.).

Qualifications: M.Tech/B.Tech in Electrical engineering or equivalent with 5 to 12 years of relevant experience.

Technical Skills and Competencies:
Strong skills in Discrete Power supply design for Power Electronic boards, Strong fundamentals in Power Electronics.
Mastering of electronic simulation and design software (Cadence, Allegro, ANSYS, Simplis, LTSpice).
Experience with Single phase AC to DC converter design for DO-160 Requirement.
Experience with DC - DC converter converters topologies (buck, boost, Sepic, Flyback).
Electromagnetic Interference (EMI) Analysis experience. Good understanding of grounding and shielding concepts, Chassis design.
Design and Development of Power Transformers and Inductors for Power Converters.
Hardware Testing and verification.
Experience with Power Input EMI Filter Design techniques for DO 160 requirements.
Component Selection, Schematic Capture and providing design guidelines for PCB routing and verification of component placement and Gerber files.
Excellent knowledge of regulation loops, stability, rejection, efficiency, etc
Experience with Protection Circuits like Over Voltage, Over Current, Temperature Monitoring, Lightning Protection, Inrush Protection, Reverse Polarity.
Good to have hands on experience in design robustness analyzes (Worst Case analysis, Failure Mode and effect analysis, Part stress analysis);
Good to have a hands on experience in Power Integrity Simulation (Preferred tool is Cadence Sigrity)
Should have experience of working with multi-disciplinary team (For effective design for power supply, understanding Load requirements, PCB layout team, Mechanical team, and suppliers)
Should have general understanding of Engineering Development lifecycles including design, development, testing, verification and validation phases
Having knowledge of different Communication Protocols (Example: SPI,I2S, SGMII, Ethernet Interface) is Plus
Test procedures definition and execution
Knowledge or aeronautics constraints (DO160, DO254) is preferable
Knowledge of CE certification is preferable
Keywords: DC-DC, power supply design, power converters, Power Electronics, Power Supply, DO160, DO254, SMPS, aerospace

Company Name: Quality Engineering Software Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
Job Description:
We are looking for humble geniuses, who believe that engineering has the potential to make the impossible, possible; innovators, who are not only inspired by technology and innovation, but also perpetually driven to design, develop, and test as a trusted partner for Fortune 500 customers.
The achievers and courageous challenge-crushers we seek, have the following characteristics and skills:
Roles & Responsibilities:
Developing 3D models and animations using Maya, as per the requirements of the project.
Collaborating with the art team, technical artists, designers, and developers to create high-quality 3D assets.
Creating and maintaining assets pipeline, tools and procedures for efficient asset production and management.
Creating textures, lighting, and shading for 3D models to create realistic environments and objects.
Testing and debugging models and animations to ensure that they are functioning correctly and are optimized for performance.
Keeping up-to-date with the latest developments and advancements in 3D modeling, animation, and design techniques.
Mentoring and training junior artists and engineers to improve their skills and ensure that they are following best practices.
Providing input on technical design and implementation for art assets, identifying areas for optimization or improvements.
Maintaining accurate asset documentation, ensuring that all 3D models and animations are properly catalogued, labeled and stored.
Working with project managers, producers and other stakeholders to ensure that projects are delivered on time and on budget.
Required Skills (Technical Competency):
3D modeling: A 3D artist Maya developer should have expertise in creating complex 3D models, including objects, characters, and environments.
Texturing and materials: They should have the ability to apply textures, create materials, and use various texturing techniques like UV mapping, PBR materials, and procedural textures.
Lighting and rendering: They should have experience in lighting and rendering 3D scenes, including the use of advanced lighting techniques like Global Illumination and High Dynamic Range Imaging (HDRI).
Rigging and animation: A 3D artist Maya developer should be able to create custom rigs for characters and objects, as well as create high-quality animations using keyframe animation and motion capture techniques.
Scripting: Knowledge of scripting languages like MEL and Python is essential for automating tasks, creating custom tools and plugins, and improving workflow efficiency.
3D printing and prototyping: They should have knowledge of 3D printing and prototyping techniques to create physical objects using 3D models.
Game engine integration: A 3D artist Maya developer may need to integrate 3D assets into game engines like Unity and Unreal Engine and optimize them for real-time rendering.
Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR): They should have experience in creating 3D assets and environments for VR and AR applications.
Collaboration and communication skills: They should have strong communication skills to work effectively with other team members, stakeholders, and clients.
Desired Skills:
Advanced modeling techniques: They should have expertise in advanced modeling techniques such as sculpting, retopology, and subdivision surfaces to create high-quality and detailed 3D models.
Advanced shading and texturing: They should have knowledge of advanced texturing techniques like displacement maps, normal maps, and procedural textures to create realistic and detailed textures for 3D models.
Advanced lighting and rendering: They should have knowledge of advanced lighting techniques such as physical-based rendering, image-based lighting, and ambient occlusion to create photorealistic 3D scenes.
Character rigging and animation: They should have expertise in advanced character rigging and animation techniques such as blend shapes, inverse kinematics, and motion capture to create complex character animations.
Programming and scripting: They should have knowledge of programming and scripting languages such as Python and C++ to develop custom tools and plugins to improve workflow efficiency.
Simulation and dynamics: They should have knowledge of simulation and dynamics techniques like particle systems and fluid simulations to create realistic effects and animations.
VR/AR development: They should have expertise in creating 3D assets and environments for virtual reality (VR) and augmented reality (AR) applications.
Project management: They should have skills in project management, including the ability to plan, prioritize, and manage tasks and deadlines effectively.
Keywords: Engineering services, 3D, C++, Simulation, Project management, Texturing, Maya, Animation, Python

Job Description:
Data Systems & Automation, Bangalore Global Development is one of the most competent and diverse team of professionals who are mainly responsible for building the trial database, providing functional and system support to execute clinical trials across Product Development Plan portfolio.
The team has strong understanding of Clinical Systems & interfaces with end-to-start mindset on standardisation of data-flow across systems.
The position
As s Senior Process Automation Specialist, an ideal candidate will be responsible for planning of competency development of Data Systems & Automation in Data Management
Assess use cases and internal processes to identify innovation opportunities aligned with DSA strategy
Identifies strength & weakness of business processes and organization especially Data Systems & Automation roles
Responsible for assisting in solving methodological or technical demanding tasks where innovation is a key element
Overall the job requires an independent, innovative, committed and result oriented person
Responsible to identify and implement the best practices within the department as well as to the global team
Responsible to work with Project Clinical Data Programmers from each project area to ensure the alignment across project areas, systems, and standards. Ensure to interpret business strategy as part of DSA Project team and determine innovative solutions supporting strategy implementation. Facilitate implementation of business processes introduced for one (Data Management) transformation. Manage projects for the development of innovative solutions. Lead and direct different cross-functional projects of varied sizes and types concurrently.
Responsible for planning of competency development of Data Systems & Automation, Data Management, ensuring the DM vision to implement and offer best-in-class systems and processes that are both efficient and sustainable to the projects in the Novo Nordisk Portfolio. Proactively keep the department informed about internal and external initiatives related to clinical data and processes which could lead to new regulatory demands.
Responsible to identify and implement the best practices within the department as well as to the global team. Work and collaborate closely with global DM process & Innovation and RD Quality department to implement and align the process decisions to the department. Responsible for global training and initiatives and implementing change management plans that minimize employee resistance and maximize employee engagement. Facilitate training and development via agile share better practice methodologies to ensure continuous and proactive learning.
Responsible for continuously improving way of working in close collaboration with the other departments in DaMaSys and their stakeholders. Liaise with stakeholders on innovative culture and harness knowledge across GBS and DK. Work closely with Internal and External Stakeholders.
Promote innovations to support DaMaSys through activities that test, pilot and implement innovative concepts . Instil and embed a passion for innovation; recommend strategies to department head for removing barriers to re-wire creative and innovative thinking solutions across the department. Monitoring and analyzing process and automation performance to identify areas for improvement.
Experience
M.Sc / B.Sc / Bachelor or Masters in Engineering / Life Science or comparable degree in computer science, Information Technology clinical information management, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning / NLP or equivalent qualifications.
Minimum 10+ years of experience in pharmaceutical industry across various streams
In-depth experience in Clinical Data Management Systems concepts.
Expert knowledge of computer systems involved in clinical data Management and mandatory experience in programming languages. Requires expert knowledge on AI & ML.
Expertise in data trends, predictive analysis, design thinking principles.
Sound knowledge with analysis and design of business processes and functional design within the area of drug development.
Knowledge of validation of computer systems.
Extensive experience with collaboration across professional and regional borders.
Experience with communication, presentations & mentoring.
Ability to work autonomously, deal with ambiguity and make clear and decisive decisions to effect successful outcomes.
Experience with project management and stakeholder management.
In-depth knowledge of drug development and guidelines within drug development.
Entrepreneurial mindset
Keywords: Automation, Project management, Machine learning, Clinical trials, clinical development, Business strategy, Continuous improvement, Monitoring, Clinical data management

Job Description:
To analyze and evaluate hardware designs to verify compliance with contractual reliability, availability, maintainability and safety (RAMS) requirements.
Perform component and system level reliability prediction at various lifecycle stages of the product.
Perform Functional Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) , piece part FMEA at component and subsystem level and/or Fault Tree Analysis (FTA) to identify all single failure points that are critical to operational success of the system.
Evaluates the reliability, availability and maintainability of designs and suggests design alternatives (i.e, redundancy, reliable components, preventive & corrective maintenance, diagnostic capabilities, etc.) where appropriate to enhance the RAM of the subsystem or system.
Reliability, Availability, and Maintainability apportionment to ensure hardware is being designed to meet contractual requirements.
Assures that RAM requirements are met by participating in hardware design reviews.
Reporting directly to the Manager of RAM Engineering, having direction from the Group Lead and work closely with other team members, both inside the RAM and Safety teams; and from other functional teams to meet the project objectives.
EDUCATION BACKGROUND/REQUIREMENTS:
Bachelor of Technology/Science in Electrical/ Electronics Engineering or equivalent
A detailed knowledge of electronic components and systems, circuit analysis, preferably in aero projects.
Past experience of executing reliability prediction and FMEA in aero projects
Knowledge of RAM analyses techniques.
Good command of the English language, both written and oral.
Computer skills, MS Office, experience with Reliability prediction software like PTC Windchill is desirable
Good knowledge of MIL-HDBK- 217F N1/N2 , FIDES, ARP 4761 standards.
Decision Making and Authority
Works with the Systems Engineering Dept. and other departments as a team player
Manages and schedules daily activities within budget & time allowances given.
Provide support in the development and the completion the formal Proof of Safety for specific project applications of our products.
Be part of a team that is responsible for the timely and effective execution of the combined tasks and
activities of RAM management and RAM engineering to achieve the system RAM requirements throughout the system life cycle
Keywords: Reliability prediction, Diagnostics, Aerospace, Electronic components, Hardware design, MS Office, Operations, Avionics, Electronics engineering, RAM

*Job Description:*
We are seeking a talented and creative Social Media and Video Content Graphic Designer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating compelling and innovative visual content for our social media platforms and video content. This role requires a high level of creativity, attention to detail, and project management skills.
*Responsibilities:*
1. Design and create engaging graphics for social media platforms that resonate with our audience and align with our brand guidelines.
2. Develop graphic and video content for various social media platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, YouTube, etc.
3. Create thumbnails, infographics, animations, and other types of visual content for digital platforms.
4. Work closely with the social media team to create content for campaigns and promotions.
5. Develop and maintain a consistent brand image and identity across all platforms and channels.
6. Edit video content to create engaging short clips for social media.
7. Stay up-to-date with the latest social media trends and best practices.
8. Provide creative input to other marketing needs such as presentations, brochures, trade shows, etc.
9. Review and maintain the quality of content over time, ensuring all content meets the company's standards and guidelines.
*Requirements:*
1. Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Fine Arts, or related field.
2. Proven experience as a Graphic Designer, Video Editor, or similar role.
3. Proficiency in graphic design software, including Adobe Creative Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, InDesign) and video editing software (Premiere Pro, After Effects).
4. Strong portfolio demonstrating high-quality graphic design and video editing skills.
5. Solid knowledge of design and visual principles.

Job Title: Treasury Operations Strategy and Change Driver
Job Description:
Our Treasury Operations team works on strategic and tactical change projects to continually enhance the securities and cash explain functions. You would be required to support securities and cash explain process, perform any day-to-day activities needed to publish daily explain reporting, support audit remediations, and change projects. You will be required to support business analysis, design, build, and production implementation of key initiatives. Our team will be there to coach and provide guidance to help you understand the organization and develop as a professional.
What We Offer You
A diverse and inclusive environment that embraces change, innovation, and collaboration
A hybrid working model, allowing for in-office work from home flexibility, generous vacation, personal and volunteer days
Employee Resource Groups support an inclusive workplace for everyone and promote community engagement
Competitive compensation packages including health and wellbeing benefits, retirement savings plans, parental leave, and family building benefits
Educational resources, matching gift, and volunteer programs
What Youll Do
Interacting with Subject Matter Experts within the team to support strategic and regulatory change, process improvement, and project management
Identifying opportunities for standardization, and continual process improvement with Subject Matter Experts within the team
Perform business level, data analysis on large sets of data, clearly articulating findings
Support and enable the proper functioning of the securities and cash explain applications, processes including functional specification documentation
Analyze and support the enhancements for the collateral reporting dashboard, cash explain or intra-day liquidity management capabilities on continuous basis
Skills Youll Need
Relevant experience in Change Management, Treasury Operations, or Collateral Management
Nostro Management, Reconciliation, Banking or Settlements experience is a plus
Data analytics and knowledge of coding (e.g., Structured Query Language (SQL), Python, Tableau, Alteryx, etc.) is a plus
Expert in Microsoft Office applications, especially Excel, is essential
Knowledge of financial instruments
Skills That Will Help You Excel
Proactive, analytical, and problem-solving attitude
Flexible and adaptable to changing environments
Expectations
It is the Banks expectation that employees hired into this role will work in the Jacksonville, FL office in accordance with the Banks hybrid working model.
Deutsche Bank provides reasonable accommodations to candidates and employees with a substantiated need based on disability and/or religion.
Keywords: Treasury Operations, Change Management, Alteryx, Tableau, Python, SQL

Quest Global Client is a Spanish Multinational and One of the world's leading engineering and construction companies providing sustainable solutions. Job Description:
Preparation and review of deliverables related to Technical Safety/Environmental, as minimum but not limited to such as Health, Safety & Environmental (HSE) Management Plans, HSE Philosophies/Specifications, studies & reviews, HAZOP Management and review, SIL Determination, Hazardous Area Classification, Consequence analysis, BAT/ALARP studies, QRA, FESA, COMAH, Noise Specification, Noise Report Management, Emission Modelling Report, Flare Assessment (distances, emission and radiation), HSE Action Tracking Management, impact and emission calculations and safety equipment specification.
Experience in participation in numerous workshop as Technical Safety/Environmental Engineer to advise on technical safety related aspect and concern at HAZOP, HAZID, ISD, BOW TIE, 3D Model Review, HFE Review, Construction HAZID, etc.
Ensure compliance HSE international and specific country legal requirements (Safety and Environmental)
Experience as facilitator
HAZOP, HAZID, SIL Determination, ALARP and ERP Workshop among others.
Experience developing Radiation and Dispersion modeling using Flaresim software (or any similar software) and review the simulations, analyses and Report.
Review engineering inter-discipline documents.

Monitoring manhour budget and prepare weekly workplan and update project progress
Ensure the schedule and deliverables date are meet with a high quality deliverables and action.
Prepare specification, RFI/RFP and TBE for technical safety items.

Bachelor of Engineering in Chemical discipline or equivalent.
Possess a minimum of 10 years of working experience as Technical safety specialists and demonstrate experience in EPC companies or Engineering Companies.
Significant experience in engineering design of oil and gas facilities.
Self-directed and self-motivated (SD/SM) employee
Able to work in a project with minimum supervision
A strong background in onshore facility and brownfield project experience is an advantage.
Skilled in Physical Effects Modeling and Quantitative Risk Assessment, experience with PHAST, FLARESIM, ALOHA, EFFECTS, EXsilentia software
Effective communicator who can influence key stakeholders
Strong knowledge on the Hazardous area classification, SCE/PS, EERA, FERA and other loss prevention analysis and risk assessment
Knowledgeable in technical safety design standard such as NFPA, EPA, NIOSH, IP, ISO, ASME, API, etc. Additional knowledge in Russian Normative is an advantage.

Job Description:
A Video Editor is tasked with taking the raw footage shot by director and turning it into the final product. Following an outline, script or shot list and assembling the footage into one video.It is the responsibility of the Video Editor to review all the footage and create the best output by cutting and connecting various footage, adding sound effects and graphics and fine-tuning the completed video.

Following a script, screenplay or outline
Inputting graphics to enhance footage
Digitally splicing film and video and synchronizing them into one rough cut file

Working closely with directors to present a final product that matches his or her vision
