Job Title: Opening For Fiction writer- Mumbai-Work from home-Pan India Can apply
Job Description:
Job Description
The idea is to localize given content and make it suitable for consumption by the American audience. The text given
would be rooted in Eastern culture, this needs to be edited and localized to make it sound American. This involves
changing names and locations, cultural reflections, etc. This also involves taking creative calls in liaison with your assigned
team lead and making creative decisions regarding the show. You will be the Single PoC and have complete ownership of
the show assigned to you. You will be required to edit and return ~130k words per month, broken down into weekly
deliveries. In addition to this, you will also be required to listen to the final episode and provide feedback on voiceovers
Responsibilities
Work closely with the team lead to ensure quality matches expectations, and make changes as required by the
team lead.
Write scripts for a targeted audience, using literary skills to develop themes for appropriate scripts based on the
team's content strategy.
Reviewing and revising existing scripts as needed to ensure they are consistent with current standards or
requirements
Content Supervision: Evaluating and assessing the performance of your show quantitatively as well as
qualitatively. In addition to writing/editing, you will also be required to listen to the final episode before it goes
live to the audience
Research & Planning: Working on a content pipeline that is grounded in data and insights derived from internal
tools and partner teams.
Working closely with the data analytics team and doing meaningful measurements of content performance.
Make interventions and revisions to achieve the desired goals.
Creating and maintaining documentation of all drafts, changes, and revisions to scripts throughout the writing
process.
End to End ownership of execution of scriptwriting as per weekly/monthly targets
You may be required to work closely with US-based Sr. Writers and leads to understand areas of improvement in
the scripts

Qualification
2-7 years of work experience in a writing/editing role as a leader in fictional content creation (television, OTT
Entertainment, Radio, Films & other media). Preference for background with Fictional Entertainment for TV.
Bachelors Degree in related fields. Preference for a Masters Degree
Exceptional communicator - ability to inspire and influence, and dexterity in presenting to large/ diverse
audiences. Native or bilingual proficiency in speaking and writing in English
Experience with creating compelling messages for different target demographics.
Should be passionate about data-driven digital content landscape
Strategic thinker with creative flair and project management skills crafting world-class creative strategy and
spearheading the execution.
Innately curious and thrives on gleaning insights from data, and able to identify creative opportunities in content
and translate these into sharp creative strategies.
Proactive, fast, and flexible problem-solver with superb time, resource, and stakeholder management.
Own and manage processes and reporting with cross-functional partners for tracking and monitoring
performance on content creation
Ability to interact meaningfully with people of diverse backgrounds, personalities, and expertise
Passion and curiosity toward building great product experiences for everyone
Self-motivated leader and strong collaborator/ team player - with the ability to maintain calm, make good
Keywords: Content Writing, Content writer, Content Creation, Creative Writing, Story Writing, Fiction writer, Fiction writing

1) Strong Knowledge of Post-Production workflow, video editing and design experience in Adobe Premier Pro, Final cut Pro, Illustrator, Photoshop, lightroom, Adobe Aftereffects, Adobe animate, Autodesk Maya, 3Ds Max, Foundry's Nuke, Blackmagic fusion, Cinema 4D etc.,

8) Must be skilled in using MS office applications (Strong Knowledge in power point presentations) and operating systems Windows 10 etc.,
9) Proven working experience in video editing and motion graphics, solid experience with digital technology and editing software packages. demonstrable video editing and motion graphics ability with a strong portfolio.

Job Title: User Experience : User Interface Design / Interaction Design
Job Description:
We are looking for a talented User Experience (UX) Designer who possesses a strong skill set in both designing intuitive software applications and creating engaging animation videos
As a UX Designer with animation skills, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and marketing, to create visually appealing and user-friendly software interfaces
Additionally, you will be responsible for producing animated videos that effectively communicate complex concepts in a concise and engaging manner
If you have a passion for creating exceptional user experiences and possess the ability to bring ideas to life through animation, we encourage you to apply
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with product managers, stakeholders, and developers to understand user requirements and translate them into intuitive and visually appealing software application designs.
Create wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes to communicate design concepts and gather feedback from stakeholders and users.
Conduct user research, including usability testing and user interviews, to gain insights and incorporate user feedback into the design process.
Develop a deep understanding of user needs, behaviors, and preferences, and use that knowledge to drive user-centric design decisions.
Design and implement animations and transitions that enhance the user experience, improve usability, and provide a delightful interaction with the software application.
Produce engaging and visually appealing animation videos that effectively communicate complex concepts, product features, and brand messaging.
Collaborate with the marketing team to create animation videos for promotional purposes, including product demos, explainer videos, and social media content.
Stay up to date with the latest design trends, animation techniques, and industry best practices, and incorporate them into the design process.
Work closely with developers to ensure the seamless integration of designs and animations into the software application, providing guidance and support throughout the development process.
Advocate for a user-centered design approach and collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure a consistent and cohesive user experience across different platforms and devices.
Qualifications:
Bachelors or masters degree in graphic design, interaction design, multimedia, or a related field.
Proven experience (X years) as a UX Designer, Interaction Designer, or a similar role, designing software applications with a focus on user experience.
Strong proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, or similar.
Solid portfolio demonstrating strong UX/UI design skills, including wireframes, mockups, and interactive prototypes.
Proficiency in animation software such as Adobe After Effects, Animate, or similar, with a strong ability to create engaging and visually appealing animations.
Excellent visual design skills, with a keen eye for typography, color theory, and layout composition.
Understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices, including usability testing and user research techniques.
Familiarity with front-end development technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) and their impact on design and animation implementation.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively present and communicate design ideas and concepts to stakeholders and cross-functional teams.
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment, manage multiple projects simultaneously, and meet deadlines.
Preferred Qualifications:
Experience creating animation videos for software applications or marketing purposes.
Knowledge of video editing software, such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro.
Familiarity with motion design principles and best practices.
Understanding of responsive and mobile-first design principles.
Keywords: Front end, User interface designing, Social media, Interaction design, Javascript, Animation, Video editing, HTML, Usability testing, Visual Design

Job Description:
The IT AOA BSI Operations Manager will be working across multiple vendors, markets and streams and must have a very strong leadership skill to promote the integration amongst Business, IT (Information Technology) Streams and Partners (at all levels of the organization) ensuring a high quality of sustain operations and continuous improvements on the IT products and processes fully supporting business evolution, where key focus areas are automation, AIOps and Continuous Improvement to ensure operational excellence.
A day in the life of ADI
Reporting to the Sr Global Vendor and Operations Manager for Business Solution Integration (BSI) in ADI, responsibilities of this role include:
Increase business centricity & Improve communication with the business and within IT streams.
Integrate the different IT areas and the business.
Problem management & root cause analysis leading to operational excellence.
Data analysis to discover problem area trends and opportunity for improvements.
Increase speed of response / resolutions through a higher sense of urgency.
Focus on AIOps, Automation and Continuous Improvement to reduce impact to our receivers and promote a sustainable operational environment.
Contribution to IT Strategy.
Documents training materials for the product area and delivers training to the end users, deployment and support teams.
Identifies gaps in existing functionalities, options for improvement and opportunities for process automation.
Responsible for identifying security & compliance requirements, including roles, associated with our scoped applications and services.
What will make you successful
Joining a collaborative team of Operations Managers, you will be a strong team player with a history of delivering results in a high pressure and dynamic environment.
Bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, business administration or related field, or equivalent work experience.
Strong communication skills
Curiosity & Quick learner. Proactivity & strong collaboration. Leading change to drive continuous improvement mindset, and Problem solving mindset driving insights to action.
4+ years of experience in IT, preferred with experience in agile methodologies
Understanding of various SAP and non-SAP solution integration technologies. Examples: Process Integration, Cloud Process Integration, Data Services - BODS; familiarity with SAP transactions, tables, navigation and data objects.
As a plus, if you have knowledge on OpenText Platform (B2B/EDI), Mulesoft (or API platform), Azure (Data Factory, Logic Apps, Event Driven Architecture), Service Now, Knowledge of Hybrid integration platforms spanning cloud and on-premise (iPaaS, PaaS, SaaS).
Experience supporting business critical operations.
Understanding of end to end (E2E) business flows.
Ability to review incidents and determine repeating trends in issues.
Experience in service management principles and execution
Demonstrated experience in establishing standard processes and managing performance to achieve key metrics
Experience explaining technical concepts and technologies
Experience working in a global environment and with virtual teams
Effective communication and presentation skills are vital as you develop working partnerships with internal and external stakeholders, such as service integrators, service provides and vendors across the globe (face-to-face and remote)
With stakeholders based in various time zones, flexibility is essential as you participate in teleconferences and activities outside of standard business hours.
Nestle offers flexible working hours and working from home, enabling you on how to get your job done and will help you balance your work with your personal commitments.

Job Description:
Closely coordinate with the company-wide external regulatory compliance team, which keeps track on and assesses upcoming legislative rules that affect Hitachi Energy. The incumbent of the position is responsible for managing all supply chain-related projects that address external regulations such the German Supply Chain Act.
In close cooperation with Supply Chain representatives from the various Business Units, develop and manage a global strategy to address external regulations.
Create cross-business supply chain project teams to focus on bridging any gaps in preparation for new rules. Before a regulation takes effect, Hitachie Energy aims to be compliant.
Work with the supply chain management team to make sure that all vendors and suppliers adhere to the rules and regulations.
Organize subject matter experts contributions to support regulatory compliance initiatives (such as SCM sustainability, SCM cyber security, and SCM material compliance).
Implement internal procedures for regulatory compliance that support external standards and requirements.
Track and evaluate compliance risks, then create mitigation plans.
Perform audits and evaluations to gauge our companys performance in terms of regulatory compliance.
Create and deliver training programs needed to drive compliance initiatives.
Remain informed of changes to regulatory compliance requirements and inform the appropriate stakeholders of these changes.
Living Hitachi Energy s core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.
Your Background:
Bachelors or Master s degree in Supply Chain Management.
More than 10 years of experience in similar positions.
Very good understanding of SCM day-to-day challenges.
Experience in working within a matrix organization.
Joined-up thinking and self-driven personality.
Project and change management experience in a leading role.
Excellent communication and analytical skills.
Fluent in English, both written and spoken.
Keywords: Analytical skills, Training, Change management, Supply chain management, Matrix, cyber security, Global Strategy, Regulatory compliance, German, SCM

Job Description:
About the job
Company Description
Lokal is a hyperlocal news platform, founded in 2018. Our mission is to strengthen hyperlocal communities by enabling our predominantly non-English speaking users to interact, transact and communicate in their regional language. We have users across various districts in South India, and our platform provides access to hyperlocal information such as local job listings, commodity prices, matrimonial listings, real estate, and local news. Our app is available in Kannada, Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam and Marathi, and has been supported by investors including 3one4 Capital, Y Combinator, and India Quotient. We are proud to count over 10 million downloads to date. Click here to learn more about us.
Role Description
Lokal is looking for a skilled Video Editor with fluency in Marathi to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for working with raw footage, reshaping it into engaging and entertaining videos for our audience.
Qualifications
Excellent video editing skills, with a proficient understanding of Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro or other editing software
Fluent in Marathi
Ability to work independently and to deadlines.
Good communication skills with an ability to articulate creative concepts
Strong attention to detail
Experience with color grading, sound mixing, graphic design, and special effects is preferred
Relevant degree or certification in Video Editing or a related field
Prior experience in media, journalism, or a related field would be beneficia
Keywords: Final Cut Pro or other editing software  Fluent in Marathi, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, with a proficient understanding of Adobe Premiere Pro, Marathi, Cinematography, Excellent video editing skills, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro

Job Description:
You will work with cross-functional global teams from product marketing, product management, regional category, strategic marketing, channel and sales organizations.
You will report to the US-based Head of Product Marketing for Transactional Edge. The position provides the hybrid model of working onsite and working from home.
Due to the global nature of the role, the position also offers flexible hour arrangement (start later in the day) and the ideal candidate must have the bandwidth to support US Eastern time zone from Monday to Thursday till 10:30 PM Bengaluru local time.
What you will be doing:
Use agile techniques to create management system for accountability of marketing and product launches, track progress against established processes and confirm all content, tools and activation package are ready prior to commercial launch
Own Global TE Marketing SharePoint Portal and take lead in embedding content in My Schneider Partner Portal
Maintain annual and quarterly launch calendars/windows and coordinate with stakeholders on timeline, launch assets and communication
Collaborate with product marketing managers, category, regional marketing team and global function teammates on internal external TE content deployment and adoption
Establish metrics on product marketing content, campaign and range landing pages; coordinate with global web analytics team to provide content improvement insights
Support product marketing managers on other content management needs


Bachelors degree in marketing, communication, project management or relevant fields
+ 5 years of marketing experiences with a focus on project/ program management
Prior experience in ma
Keywords: Product management, Content management, Web analytics, Project management, Analytical, Manager Program Management, Marketing campaigns, Agile, Windows, Product marketing

Job Description:
Aiding supply-chain and manufacturing in obtaining new and critical parts by first filtering through alternative component options and working with a larger team to determine the fitness of these options. This encompasses analyzing daily change-notices, EOLs, obsoletes and - mostly - elongated lead times.
Preparing Engineering Change Requests, Manufacturing Change Requests or Deviations to obtain old parts to support production - within our PDM system.
Review hardware drawings (schematics / PCB to understand component fitness.
Lead qualification of new electrical and/or mechanical components for NPD programs
Creating and maintaining a tracking list of issues per part that can result in an executive summary for periodic review.
Analyzing part failure; request part failure analysis reports from vendors.
Supporting design engineers in finding, selecting and documenting new components.
Coordinate with global purchasing and qualification team to do any sustaining activity for production smoothly
Writing Calculating Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) and MTBFs
Executing verification tests.
Executing Document tests and generating CIAs (Change Impact Analysis) to explain change etc.
Understanding the hardware architecture of the products
Company interface to component / parts suppliers and test and service suppliers.
Working in a diverse team environment, as well as independently
Required skills
Electrical Engineering, focused in components
Strong verbal, writing and organized
Good interpersonal communication skills and experience in working with global teams


BE / BTech in Electronics Communication, Electrical Engineering, Electrical Electronics Engineering or equivalent with 8+ years of experience in Power Electronics or similar product bas
Keywords: Electrical engineering, Supply chain, Technical Expert, Analog, Power distribution, Failure analysis, Power electronics, Operations, Electronics engineering, MTBF

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented and motivated Sr. Graphic Designer who has passion for entertainment industry to lead our companys creative department. The successful candidate must possess excellent leadership qualities, with the ability to maximise the talents of their team.
Qualification: Any Graduate / PG with Graphic designing course completed
Experience: 4 to 7 yrs of experience from Creative agencies only. Prefer working in Brand Identity Design, promotional campaign creations, social media posts creations and marketing collateral
Work location: Mumbai and currently Working from home till next notice. Head office at Noida, India

Experience in handling social media posts, creatives, are very well updated with all the social trends and can strategies the creative content.
Responsibilities:
As a Sr. Graphic designer, you will work closely with the graphic design and marketing department.
He/she must have good knowledge and understanding of the Instagram posts and creative and strong knowledge of typography, hierarchy, alignment, placement, and composition.
Direct brainstorming meetings and creative sessions.
Stay up to date with the latest design trends and set a tone for the brand content.
Awareness of current fashions in the visual arts, working knowledge of the latest computer packages and an understanding of material costs and time limits, all of which can impact on the design.
Creates professional designs and layouts for promotional material by creating templates, handouts, advertisements, posters, signs, logos, and other visual layouts.
Determines style, technique, and medium best suited to organization promotion strategies.
Prepare new and unique illustrations, innovative layout prints and rough sketches of presentation and organization brochures and designs graphics for App and website in line with branding guidelines.
Detail oriented, flexible, self-motivated and meeting deadlines.
Skills required:
Minimum of 4 to 7 years of experience in an advertising field or Mobile applications, Creative agency, E-commerce, Digital agency.
Degree in Graphic Design, Marketing, Art, or a related field, or equivalent field experience would be an added advantage.
Able to work on Mac osx, Windows, and different software: Adobe Photoshop, adobe illustrator, after effects, coral draw, in design.
Ability to think creatively and evidence of success in developing brands and delivering them to market.
Ability to manage multiple priorities in a fast-paced and deadline-driven environment.
Passionate about the quickly-evolving digital and social media environment.
Sincere curiosity about how people interact and are influenced online.
Ability to induct and mentor young designers.
Ability to work independently on projects and managing team responsibilities.
Keywords: Graphics, Graphic designing, Team management, Illustrator, Social media, Corel Draw, E-commerce, Windows, Mobile applications, Photoshop

Job Description: Introduction: The NPME (New Product Manufacturing Engineer) is responsible for commercialization of newly designed products and features, taking them from initial designs to volume manufacturing operations. Education and Experience: 3 - 7 Years of work Experience in the relevant Industry. Bachelors or Equivalent degree in mechanical / manufacturing or Equivalent. Primary Responsibility: Interfaces with Engineering functions to coordinate the release of New Products or/and product improvements. On Module/Product on PLC/CIP Program. Responsible to release Super BOM to support Phase Gate Exists. Performs Virtual build , to early detect mfg. build issues, and also determines the best & optimized mfg. strategy, sourcing strategy, packaging & shipping strategy for the responsible module. Launches, releases, approves, and implements engineering change orders / Non-Standard Requests or Orders as required to support design engineering and floor for new/existing products. Supports New Product documentation by OMS Creation for NPI/CIP Builds Create and maintain Master Layout. Coordinates with Design SMEs in the development of Tooling Design & Testing fixtures to achieve quality & Productive manufacturing build. Participate in the New Product Builds & Determines root cause analysis for issues that arise during assembly and/or test of systems; drives Short term & Long-term corrective actions. Interfaces between operations, design engineering & Global Product management to implement most feasible solution to resolve supplier, Build & Field issues following Corp processes. Evaluates work methods, procedures, and policies. Develops and maintains new business processes; edits as necessary to ensure current practices are documented. Mentors and trains lower level engineers. Other Responsibilities: Applies DFx principles (Design for Manufacturing, Aesthetics, Ergonomics, Producibility, etc.) to reduce product costs and improve delivered product quality. Participates in the development and maintenance of new business processes ; edits as necessary to ensure current practices are documented Performs other duties as assigned. Duties will vary according to the project in progress and/or the specific goals of the department in which the incumbent works. Performs Process Failure Mode , Effects and Criticality Analysis when working with New Product Development. Job Specific skills/Knowledge: Requires demonstrated knowledge of manufacturing engineering discipline, theories, practices, and principles. Product structure, bill of materials, product safety requirements, material handling, and root cause analysis. Min. 3 Years of hands on experience on Creo / TCAI CAD Tools. (1-3 Years: Min. 1-year hands on experience on 3D CAD modeling tool) Working experience in interpreting manufacturing drawings with complex (1-3 Years: Basic) GD&T requirements. Requires knowledge necessary to perform the job function such as an understanding of the engineering processes, DFx (Design for Excellence) engineering principles, value engineering, Producibility / manufacturability analysis, test & tooling (1-3 years: Optional) Experience in handling Supplier problems and root cause analysis for short term & long-term corrective action. Experience in Teamcenter recommended. (1-3 years: optional) Experience in understanding basic function of an ERP systems preferably SAP & apply them to perform activities efficiently. Very good communication & interpersonal skills in collaborating with various stakeholders in and outside. Other Skills (Good to have): DFm & DFp knowledge & experience PFMECA process knowledge Six sigma & Lean principles Requires strong skills in Product technology, change management, problem solving, communication skills, customer orientation, personal effectiveness, team skills, and quality. Must be able to manage dynamic priorities. Additional Information Travel:Yes, 10% of the Time Relocation Eligible:Yes.
Keywords: Manufacturing engineering, Value engineering, CAD, New Product documentation, product improvement

Job Description:
Description:
Join GlobalLogic, to be a valid part of the team working on a huge software project for the world-class company providing M2M / IoT 4G/5G modules e.g. to the automotive, healthcare and logistics industries. Through our engagement, we contribute to our customer in developing the end-user modules firmware, implementing new features, maintaining compatibility with the newest telecommunication and industry standards, as well as performing analysis and estimations of the customer requirements.
 
Requirements:
  Role Description: Technical Architect is responsible for defining and reviewing of solution architecture to build complex and scalable applications/products. He/she is critical member in defining the technology roadmap, identifying architectural bottlenecks and suggesting solutions, evaluation of technology alternatives and choice of tools, including comparison with multiple technology options.
 Should have 12+ years of experience with strong Technical Architecture skills, with expertise in multiple technologies and domains
 Bachelors degree in computer science, engineering, or a related field
 Should have architected and designed complex application applications and product features
 Excellent communication and articulation skills.
 Advanced knowledge of Object Oriented Design, Microservices, Service Oriented Architecture and Application Integration Design Patterns
 Strong technical depth across cloud technology areas, Micro-services, Java stack having in depth in several areas, and breadth and interest across a much larger range.
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Articulates thoughts and ideas clearly, concisely, and persuasively. Create and deliver presentations articulating vision, findings, and approach to all stakeholders

Job Responsibilities:
 Develops High level Architecture, Technical Design of complex features. Work hands-on with development team to review the Technical Design
 Defines strategy and solutions for handling of NFRs, to address Performance, Scalability, Availability and Security requirements
 Document architecture problems, evaluation of various solution options, trade-offs and recommend the most optimal architecture solution
 Oversees the development application/product strategy and architecture (strategic blueprints, roadmaps, migration, application, standards, and methods to achieve strategic and tactical goals
 Defines the strategy and adoption of new-age technologies including but not limited to Generative AI, DevOps and Cloud services
 Provide technical approaches, point-of-view on next-gen technologies, develops as PoCs
 Identification of Architecture bottlenecks in existing products/applications and suggests improvements
 Evaluation of Technology Alternatives and Choice of Tools, comparison with multiple technology options
 Contributes to the various initiatives of the Enterprise Architects group, within the organization
 Creates external value through patents, white papers, or speaking at conferences

What We Offer:
Exciting Projects: We focus on industries like High-Tech, communication, media, healthcare, retail and telecom. Our customer list is full of fantastic global brands and leaders who love what we build for them.
Collaborative Environment: You Can expand your skills by collaborating with a diverse team of highly talented people in an open, laidback environment  or even abroad in one of our global centers or client facilities!
Work-Life Balance: GlobalLogic prioritizes work-life balance, which is why we offer flexible work schedules, opportunities to work from home, and paid time off and holidays.
Professional Development: Our dedicated Learning & Development team regularly organizes Communication skills training(GL Vantage, Toast Master),Stress Management program, professional certifications, and technical and soft skill trainings.
Excellent Benefits: We provide our employees with competitive salaries, family medical insurance, Group Term Life Insurance, Group Personal Accident Insurance , NPS(National Pension Scheme ), Periodic health awareness program, extended maternity leave, annual performance bonuses, and referral bonuses.
Fun Perks: We want you to love where you work, which is why we host sports events, cultural activities, offer food on subsidies rates, Corporate parties. Our vibrant offices also include dedicated GL Zones, rooftop decks and GL Club where you can drink coffee or tea with your colleagues over a game of table and offer discounts for popular stores and restaurants!
Keywords: stack, soa, integration design patterns, articulate, interpersonal skills, dbms, technology, redis, microservices, docker, cloud, amazon ec2, spring boot, technical architecture, application integration, java, devops, oops, aws, aws api gateway, aws devops, communication skills, architecture

Job Description:
EC Engineer is responsible for the development and management of the Engineering Change Request process for assigned groups and/or product families or lines from documentation of initial problem statement through implementation and execution of the engineering change. Mediates problems across division lines to remove barriers preventing effective implementation of engineering changes. Ensures rapid and efficient processing of ECRs, resulting in cost-effective change implementation.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
 Prioritizes Review of ECRs and expedites release of ECR, in the implementation cycle.
 Review ECR's for content completeness, Structure of Bill of Material, customer impact (internal and external), organizational impact, and functional product impact
 Determines effect of ECRs on products and processes; adequately ascertains who needs to be included in the evaluation, disposition, assignment, definition, approval and implementation of the ECR; routes ECRs.
 Coordinates with other impacted EC analysts; verifies that appropriate CIB (Change Implementation Board) members are included on the ECR based on Product Family, Product Line, Change Category, planner/buyer and product option tree, as applicable.
 Communicates issues logged with EC Analysts or EC engineers to ensure for correctness of the ECR
 Analyzes part structure to determine the scope / impact of product changes; conducts where-used searches.
 Trains / coaches ECR participants in their functional areas; advises ECR participants on possible solutions for ECR related problems, issues or situations; routinely mediates conflicts between ECR participants. Evaluates ECR process for continuous improvement opportunities; assists in KPI development, and document the process.
 Regularly participates in ECO PMs meetings.
 Participates in projects; may lead a ECO CIB project. Reviewing ECOs and recommending material related changes through the Change Control Board, identifying ECO impacted kits and assemblies and updating ECO notification summary comments to reflect current status.
Knowledge:
 Knowledge of Engineering Change Order (ECO) processes, forms, instructions, and policies
 Knowledge of ECO roles and responsibilities.
 Knowledge of PDM and BOMs & item master theory.
 Knowledge of supplier manufacturing processes and the ability to engage with suppliers to resolve issues.
 Knowledge of manufacturing methods and materials to include basic lean philosophy and principles.
 Knowledge of safety procedures and cleanroom protocol.
 Knowledge of cross cultural communications.
Skills and Abilities:
 Demonstrated ability to write and track ECOs.
 Working Knowledge on different Engineering change management software packages like, Oracle, SAP etc.,
Knowledge on PLM software like, TCE (Team Center Engineering).
Knowledge on CAD Packages UG NX 10
 Demonstrated computer skills to include MS Office, Lotus Notes, Visio and/or other software / systems necessary for the performance of the job
Project management skills:
 Ability to work with Cross Functional Teams.
 Time management skills.
 Effective negotiation skills.
 Effective presentation skills.
 Problem solving and conflict resolution skills.

Note: Interested candidate can share CV's to : ArketNaveen.Kumar@techmahindra.com

Job Title: Vulnerability Management and container security Specialist
Job Description:
Responsibilities

 Security Architect with strong network security expertise and understanding of network and infrastructure threats
 Document, maintain, and implement standards, policies, and procedures within security disciplines that may include vulnerability management, forensics, host and network-based intrusion detection, anti-virus/malware management, or data loss prevention.
 Review the IT changes proposed and provide security inputs and risks
 Work with the respective customer/vendor stakeholders to coordinate on implementation of security measures suggested and remediation of the issues identified.
 Conduct research, analysis, and correlation across a wide variety of source data to identify and prevent compromise of the client networks, host systems, and data.
 Analyze network traffic and host data to identify anomalous activity and potential threats
 Establish alerting thresholds/triggers, analyze alerts from various sources within the enterprise, and determine possible causes and effects on the systems and data
 Perform regular and ad-hoc vulnerability and malware scans to identify unauthorized access to the clients data systems and malicious code activity such as trojans, root kits, backdoors, bots, or malware.
 Participate in IT security audits as required
 Planning and Reporting activities
Additional Responsibilities:

 Good knowledge on software configuration management systems
 Strong business acumen, strategy and cross-industry thought leadership
 Awareness of latest technologies and Industry trends
 Logical thinking and problem solving skills along with an ability to collaborate
 Two or three industry domain knowledge
 Understanding of the financial processes for various types of projects and the various pricing models available
 Client Interfacing skills
 Knowledge of SDLC and agile methodologies
 Project and Team management

Vulnerability Management and container security
Preferred Skills:
Vulnerability Management
